87a4(mdo sde): mdog 'jam dang ni 'od bsil dang // mnyan pa dang ni spos ngad ldan// dri med gdangs snyen zhes bya ba// sde chen dag tu bstan pa yin// tsan dan zhes bya ba ni//
87a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon #
87a6(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti
87a7(mdo sde): byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod
87a8(mdo sde): cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams
87b1(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ma ka tan ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ gang ga'i klung gi 'dram du byin to// de'i tshe gang ga'i klung gi 'dram
87b2(mdo sde): nas thag mi ring ba zhig na/ mchod rten zhig rab tu brnyed par gyur pa rlung dang nyin mtshan bgyis bshis pa zhig 'dug pa de/ dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das
87b3(mdo sde): la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchod rten 'di su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas tsan dan zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de'i yin no zhes/ dge
87b4(mdo sde): slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas tsan dan gang la byung lags/ ming ni ci las brtags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
87b5(mdo sde): slong dag rang sangs rgyas can dan gang las byung ba dang / ming ci las btags pa nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lo// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
87b6(mdo sde): dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer ba ra na si na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba zhig
87b7(mdo sde): rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / brtsod pa dang thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang //
87b8(mdo sde): nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras dang / gu mar shing dang / ba glang dang / ma he dang / ldan par 'dug go// rgyal po de yang chos dang ldan
88a1(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po chos bzhin byed do// de bu med nas bu 'dod pa des/ gung lang dang / ku be ra dang / rgya byin dang / tshangs pa las stsogs pa dang / lnga'i
88a2(mdo sde): khyed par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs ste/ 'di lta ste kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags 'tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len
88a3(mdo sde): pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang / chos mthun pa'i lha dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so// 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i
88a4(mdo sde): mthus/ bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i gtam yod mod kyi/ de yang de lta ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los
88a5(mdo sde): sbyar ba'i rgyal po bzhin du/ re re yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// de'i gnas gsum tshogs pa las/ bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis
88a6(mdo sde): 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa te/ 'di gsum tshogs pa las/ bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ de yang gsol
88a7(mdo sde): ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ de'i skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po zhig yod pa de'i nang nas kyang pad ma tshad las 'das pa che ba zhig skyes te/ de nyin cig bzhin cher skyes pa/
88a8(mdo sde): kha ni mi 'byed pa zhig yod do// de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas rgyal po la gsol to// de nas rgyal pos kang pad ma de legs par srung shig ces bsgo'o// nyi ma shar kar pad ma
88b1(mdo sde): de kha phye bas/ pad ma de'i snying po la khyi'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can/ mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/
88b2(mdo sde): dpral ba'i dbyes che ba sna mtho ba/ sna legs pa/ smin ma stug pa dang / lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byed bzang po brgyad bcus
88b3(mdo sde): mdzes par byas pa/ zhig dkyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug pa las/ de'i kha nas ni pad ma'i dri byung la/ lus la tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo // de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas kyang /
88b4(mdo sde): rgyal po la gsol to// de nas rgyal po blon po dang / btsun mo dang bcas pa bskyed mos tshal du dong nas/ khye'u de mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/ yab tshur gshegs/ bdag ni khyod
88b5(mdo sde): la sras lags so// de nas rgyal po dga' zhing dgu la yid rangs nas smras pa/ bu de ni khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin no// de nas rgyal po rdzing gi nang du bzhugs nas pad ma'i snying po
88b6(mdo sde): las khyi'u blangs nas/ lag pa bzhag go/ de nas khyi'u des gang dang gang du rkang pa gzhag pa de dang der bad ma dag byang ngo // de nas da'i ming tsan dan zhes btags so// gang
88b7(mdo sde): gi tshe khye'u tsan dan khad kyi cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha bdag cag gi grong khyer 'dir dus ston byung na/ lha rdzas tsan dan byung ba'i
88b8(mdo sde): ris so// 'on kyang bdag cag kyang lhan cig du dus ston myong bar 'gyur/ gnas thams cad kyang pad mas brgyan par 'gyur lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar bya'o// de
89a1(mdo sde): nas tsan dan brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ blon po'i bu rnams kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa/ rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs byed cing / grong khyer
89a2(mdo sde): gyi dus ston byang bar bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ngo // de nas der 'gro ba na gom pa re re la pad ma lta na sdug cing 'phrog pa dag byung ste/ de dag nyi ma'i 'od zer gis
89a3(mdo sde): pog ma thag tu snyis shing bsnyams so// de nas sems can dag pa dge ba bsam pa/ sngon sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa des de mthong nas/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa skyes nas/
89a4(mdo sde): ji ltar pad ma 'di dag skyes pa'i mod la ni mdzes par 'dug nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi gdungs pas ni/ snyis shing bskams par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lus 'di yang de dang 'dra'o snyam mo//
89a5(mdo sde): de de ltar sems shing 'jal la nye bar rtogs pa na byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/ des skye'o tshogs kyi nang na 'dug bzhin du/ rang sangs rgyas
89a6(mdo sde): kyi byang chub mngon sum du byaso// de nas re shig na gnas rtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de la gos tshon can bskon no// de nas bgos nas na mkha' la 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam
89a7(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs byas nas de mthong bas/ rgyal po dang blon po dang / grong brdal gyi mi rnams dang bcas par dga' ba chen po thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyang bskyed do// bco
89a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rang sangs rgyas can ngan de las byung ste/ ming yang de las btags so// dge slong rnams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
89b1(mdo sde): zhus pa/ btsun pa rang sangs rgyas tsan dan gyis/ las gang bgyis shing bsags na/ de'i 'di'i lung kyang dri gda' la/ dbang po yang rno bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das
89b2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bstan pa la rab tu byung te/ des der dbus skra dang sen mo kri mchod rten la spos chus dbang bskur ba yang pul me tog
89b3(mdo sde): dag kyang btags te/ des rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam yang bsgoms so// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par byas ste/ ston pa la bkur sti bya'o// bla mar bya'o//
89b4(mdo sde): ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// ston pa la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas nas brtan te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par
89b5(mdo sde): bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
89b6(mdo sde): pad ma zhes bya ba na// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon
89b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha'i lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen
89b8(mdo sde): po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar bya'o// ri mor byas mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
90a1(mdo sde): po rnams kyi mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang /
90a2(mdo sde): gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
90a3(mdo sde): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe yul dbus na 'khod pa rnams kyis lugs kyis na kun dga' ba'i srungs ma rnams kyi pad ma dag blangs te/ srang du tshong zhing song ngo // de nas ba
90a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das snga dro shams thabs dang / chos gos gsol te lham bzed bsdams nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod bsgoms la gshegs so// bud med cig kyang khye'u gcig pad tu
90a5(mdo sde): thogs te/ srang du song ba las/ khye'u de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byed bzang po brgyad cus mdzes
90a6(mdo sde): par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes nas
90a7(mdo sde): blo bur tu lag pa brkyang nas kun dga' ba'i srungs ma las pad ma blang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la bor ro// de nas pad ma de shing rti phang lo tsam du gyur te/ steng gi nam
90a8(mdo sde): mkha' la 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la/ bzhes na ni sdod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad ma ra ga'i 'dog 'dra ba'i 'od zer dag kye nas/ des mnyan
90b1(mdo sde): du yod pa ril gyis snang bar byas so// rgyu des na rgyal po dang // blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gi mi rnams dad par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//
90b2(mdo sde): 'di na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa 'dzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/
90b3(mdo sde): kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bdud 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang /
90b4(mdo sde): du 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol pa dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chus zer dang / ud pa la
90b5(mdo sde): ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag du ni gsil bar gyur te 'bab po// grang
90b6(mdo sde): ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag du ni gro bar gyur te 'bab po// de na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar 'gyur ro// de nas de dag 'di snyam
90b7(mdo sde): du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on ste gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de na de dag dga' ba skyes pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par
90b8(mdo sde): mdzad de/ de dag gi sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung
91a1(mdo sde): bya/ ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems
91a2(mdo sde): mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur der nying
91a3(mdo sde): 'tshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan
91a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshang ris rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung
91a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras
91a6(mdo sde): che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /
91a7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas
91a8(mdo sde): bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim na glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gzhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i
91b1(mdo sde): 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis/ stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
91b2(mdo sde): bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las su lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis snrums logs
91b3(mdo sde): su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las su lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/
91b4(mdo sde): zhabs kyi 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed
91b5(mdo sde): na ni/ zhabs kyi the bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por
91b6(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los rgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyags g.yas pa'i 'thil du mi snang
91b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang
91b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na/
92a1(mdo sde): ni/ dbu'i tsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gi bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin 'tsham
92a2(mdo sde): kyi mdzod spar mi snang 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te// bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// tshon snang stong gi spel ba sna tshogs can/ mang po zhal gyi sgo nas
92a3(mdo sde): byung ba yis/ de'i phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshig su bcad de gsol pa// rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dge spangs pa'i
92a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thul rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa'o 'dzum
92a5(mdo sde): pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gi the tshom skyes pa gsal bar gsol/
92a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brten pa'i// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa'o 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skyes po phal chen
92a7(mdo sde): nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
92a8(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum par mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dad pa skyes pas// de bzhin gshegs pa la pad ma bor ba mthong nas// btsun pa
92b1(mdo sde): mthong lags so// kun dga' bo khyi'u 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang // sems bskyed pa dang // sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtor ba 'dis bskal pa co lnga'i bar du log par lta
92b2(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur te// lha dang mi'i bde ba nyams su myong nas// rang sangs rgyas pad ma'i zla ba zhes bya bar gyur te// de sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa
92b3(mdo sde): 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste// sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes// dge slong khyed
92b4(mdo sde): kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge slong de dag yid rangs ste// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la mngon par
92b5(mdo sde): bstod do// // 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la// rgyal po rnams dang // blon po chen po rnams dang // phyug po rnams dang // pho brang 'khor
92b6(mdo sde): gyi mi rnams dang // chongs dpon rnams dang // ded dpon dang // lha rnams dang // klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin rnams dang // lha ma yin rnams dang // nam mkha' lding rnams
92b7(mdo sde): dang // mi 'am ci dang // lto phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas// bla mar byas/ ri mor byas// mchod par byas te// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
92b8(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal bas
93a1(mdo sde): dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos rnams kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab
93a2(mdo sde): 'od ma'i tshal/ bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab nas/ ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po nang na zhugs nas/ de'i chung ma lang tshe dar la bab de/ khyim thab
93a3(mdo sde): la gdungs shing yongs su yi chad pas smre sngags 'don kyang / de'i khyim bdag ma 'ongs nas/ des sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal nas dam bcas pa/ gal te bdag gi khyim bdag
93a4(mdo sde): myur du 'ongs nas/ bdag gi khyod la gser gyi 'khor lo dbul lo// zhes byas so// de nas de'i tshe khyim zab rgya mtsho chen po'i nas/ myur du phyir 'khor te/ nyes zhom med par bde bar
93a5(mdo sde): 'ongs so// de nas des gser gyi 'khor lo byed du bcug ste/ de bran mo'i tshogs kyi bskor bas 'khor lo dang / pos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog khyer te lha khang du chas so// de'i
93a6(mdo sde): skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtog pa 'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
93a7(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa srung ba cig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang /
93a8(mdo sde): lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i bzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu
93b1(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi 'thil shin tu brtan pa/ bdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa khyu mchog gi yang dag
93b2(mdo sde): par sing ge'i sgra sgrog pa so// yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/
93b3(mdo sde): rtag tu gnas pa bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gi phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ thar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la
93b4(mdo sde): mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pa kun tu rgyas pa brgya phrag bcu dbang byed pa/ bas kyang tshe khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyi
93b5(mdo sde): nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyis spyan gyi 'jig rten la gzigs de/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni 'phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga bar 'gyur/ su ni gnod
93b6(mdo sde): pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang / gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song nas phyung ste/ tho ris thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni
93b7(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug gi dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge
93b8(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par gro
94a1(mdo sde): bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa la 'jug go/ 'dir smras pa// rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyis gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul
94a2(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i sras rnams las// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo des nga mthong na// rang byang chub kyi dge ba ba'i rtsa ba bskyed zin par 'gyur/
94a3(mdo sde): ro// snyam du gzigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhum bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te// dge slong gi dge
94a4(mdo sde): snyen gyi 'dun du bdar nas/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la gshegs so// de nas bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs
94a5(mdo sde): par brgyan pa/ dpera' byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas
94a6(mdo sde): bzang ba mthong ngo // de nas mthong ba'i mod la dag pa thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi 'khor lo dor bar byas so// de nas bran mos bkag ste/ 'di ni sred med kyi bu ma
94a7(mdo sde): yin no// zhes byas so// 'on kyang de bkag shin du// dad pa drag pos yid 'dun par gyur pas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du gser gyi 'khor lo bor ro// spos dang /
94a8(mdo sde): me tog dang / gdug pa yang phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/
94b1(mdo sde): de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa
94b2(mdo sde): de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thing nag dang / bdud 'joms dang / du 'bod dang / du 'bod chen po dang / tshe ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur
94b3(mdo sde): can dang / chu bur rdol pa dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por
94b4(mdo sde): song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab po// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni gro bar gyur te bab po// /
94b5(mdo sde): de nas sems can de dag gis gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar 'gyur ro// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag 'di nas shis 'phos sam 'on te gzhan
94b6(mdo sde): du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag
94b7(mdo sde): cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes med kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus// bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par
94b8(mdo sde): rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams
95a1(mdo sde): kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying 'tshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal
95a2(mdo sde): chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum rnams dang / 'bab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /
95a3(mdo sde): tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od
95a4(mdo sde): gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu chen pa rnams dang/
95a5(mdo sde): mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang // 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
95a6(mdo sde): dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de// nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor ba
95a7(mdo sde): gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim na blang chen gzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skyes pa'i 'khor ba rab
95a8(mdo sde): spangs nas// sdug bsngal zed par byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcon
95b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las su lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur
95b2(mdo sde): ro/ ma 'ongs pa'i las su lung ston par bzhed na ni// mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi 'thil du mi snang
95b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skyes par lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi 'the bor
95b4(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag
95b5(mdo sde): g.yon pa'i 'thil tu mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ g.yas pa'i 'thil tu mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston
95b6(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyis byang chub du lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston
95b7(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni// smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang
95b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe
96a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa kun dga' 'os/ thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon rna stong gi spel ba sna tshogs can/ mang po zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar/
96a2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ de'i phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar gyis/ nyi ma shar bar ji ltar bgyid pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dge spangs pa
96a3(mdo sde): yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thul rnams ni rgyur rkyen ma mchis par// pad ma'i rtsa dang dung 'dog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// bstan po
96a4(mdo sde): nyid kyis blo'i dus bab mkhyen lags na/ dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gis ni gsung mchog bstan pa dang // bzang po dag gis/
96a5(mdo sde): the tsom skyes pa gsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da mdzum mi ston// gang gi don dpa'o 'dzum pa
96a6(mdo sde): ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo bu mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa de ni de bzhin no//
96a7(mdo sde): de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga'
96a8(mdo sde): bo bu mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la gser gyi 'khor lo bor ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo bu mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa
96b1(mdo sde): dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bskal pa bco lnga'i bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i bde ba nyams su myong nas/ rang sangs rgyas
96b2(mdo sde): 'khor lo bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na/ 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs
96b3(mdo sde): rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
96b4(mdo sde): dge slong de dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la mngon par bstod do// // mgo bcu pa zhes bya ba ni// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
96b5(mdo sde): la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams
96b6(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas// bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/
96b7(mdo sde): mchod par byas ste/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
96b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang kha zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / sun gsos dang / sman zod rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge
97a1(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ma ga tan ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ gang ga'i klung gi 'gram du phyin to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis thag ring
97a2(mdo sde): po zhig nas/ mchod brten rnying pa rlung dang nyi tshan gyis bshigs pa zhig 'dug pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa mchod rten 'di su'i lag/
97a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa'i yin no// dge slong de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa ga las byung
97a4(mdo sde): lags ming ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyod rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa ga las byung ba dang / ming ci las btags
97a5(mdo sde): pa nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa btsun pa nyan par 'chal lo// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// dge slong
97a6(mdo sde): dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed do// de nas rgyal ba dang rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang
97a7(mdo sde): pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug pa dang / mchom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu ram shing dang /
97a8(mdo sde): ba lang dang / ma he dang / ldan par 'dug go// rgyal po de yang chos can chos dang ldan pa zhig ste/ chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do// de nas rgyal po de bu med nas/ bu 'dod de gu lang
97b1(mdo sde): dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / rgya byin dang / tshangs pa las stsogs pa dang / lha'i khyed par can gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs ste/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i
97b2(mdo sde): dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi 'do'i lha dang / sum 'do'i lha dang / tor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang / chos mthun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin
97b3(mdo sde): 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so// 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyas bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi//
97b4(mdo sde): de yang de lta ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong stong yod par rigs so//
97b5(mdo sde): yang na gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab te zla mtshan dang
97b6(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las/ bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ de yang gsol ba 'deb pa la lhur byed cing 'dug pa de'i skyed mos tshal
97b7(mdo sde): gyis rdzing chen po// ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar pos gang ba/ 'gram dang pa dang / dur ba dang / zal mo las stsogs pa bya sna tshogs kyis
97b8(mdo sde): mdzes par byas pa zhig yod pa de'i nang nas kyang / pad ma chad las 'das pa che ba zhig blo rdol du skyes te// de nyid cig bzhin cher skyes pa las/ kha ni me 'byed par
98a1(mdo sde): bzhag yod do// de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas/ rgyal po la gsol te/ de nas rgyal pos kyang pad ma de legs par srung shig ces bsgom
98a2(mdo sde): phyis ri shig na nyi ma 'char kar pad ma de kha phye nas/ pad ma de'i snying po la khyi'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ 'dog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can//
98a3(mdo sde): mgo bo gdug ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ snam tho ba/ sna legs pa/ smin ma stug pa lus skyes bu chen po'i 'tshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis
98a4(mdo sde): legs par brgyan pa/ dpe' byed bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa zhig dkyil mo krung cas shing 'dug ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas kyang rgyal po la gsol to//
98a5(mdo sde): de nas rgyal pos thos nas/ blon po dang / btsun mo dang bcas pas/ bskyed mos tshal du dong ste/ pad mi'i snying po la de lta bu mdzes shing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas
98a6(mdo sde): kyang dga' zhing 'gu la rab du dga' ste/ yid rangs nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas khye'u de blang ste/ bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas/ rang gi
98a7(mdo sde): po brang du song ste/ dge slong dang / bram ze dang / mtshan mkhan dag la brnyed de/ zhag bdun gsum nyi shu cig gi bar du bcas ston rgyas par byas nas/ mgo bcu pa zhes ming
98a8(mdo sde): du btags so// de nas khri'u mgo bcu pa pang du 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
98b1(mdo sde): ma ma brgyad la gtad do// de nas ma ma brgyad kyis/ zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang po chog gis bskyed srings
98b2(mdo sde): te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye grag par gyur to// khyi'u de yang dang pa dang ldan pa/ bsam pa bzang zhing dge ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs
98b3(mdo sde): pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig ste/ des yab rgyal sa na 'dug na/ kha na ma mtho ba dang bcas pa/ kha na ma mtho ba med pa'i
98b4(mdo sde): las byed pa dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khye'u de mi dga' nas/ yab la gsol pa/ yab bdag legs par bsrungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar snang
98b5(mdo sde): bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so// yab kyis kyang gnang ste/ de ska dang kha spa bregs nas/ gos tshon can bgos te/ yang dag pa'i khyim skyed par rab du byung ngo // de nas
98b6(mdo sde): de lung nos pa med par byang chub kyi mchog dang mthun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas nas nam mkha' la
98b7(mdo sde): 'phags te/ ya ba la cho 'phrul rnams pa sna tshogs bstan/ de nas yab kyi zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos la spyan drangs so// de nas de lus thogs pas yongs su skyo nas/
98b8(mdo sde): cho 'phrul rnam pa snang tshogs bsten te/ shing med pa'i me bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par song ste/ de'i mchod rten 'di yin no// de nas dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom
99a1(mdo sde): thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pas las gang dag bgyis na/ ma'i mngal du ma
99a2(mdo sde): skyes te pad ma las skyes pa legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag mgo bcu pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs parnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan
99a3(mdo sde): ste/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bstsags pa na/ mgo bcu pa nyid kyis las byas shing bstsags pa de dag/ gzhan su zhig gis nyam
99a4(mdo sde): su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong las byas shing bstsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la
99a5(mdo sde): rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba rnams byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par
99a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
99a7(mdo sde): dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
99a8(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jigs rten du gshegs so//
99b1(mdo sde): de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams par gzigs de/ rgyal po'i phong brang gnyen ldan zhes bya ba na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
99b2(mdo sde): rnams par gzigs/ snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lham bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gyi tshogs kyis zham rim byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis 'dun
99b3(mdo sde): du bdar nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la gshegs so// de dpon zhig kyang pad ma khyer de srad du zhugs so// de nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
99b4(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs sku skyes bu chen po'i 'chan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byed pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan
99b5(mdo sde): pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas mthong ma thag du pad ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du bor te/
99b6(mdo sde): bor ma thag tu pad ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la/ bzhugs na ni sdod do// de nas re shig na yang dag
99b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams par gzigs kyis ded dpon de rang byang chub du lung bston to// de nas dga' zhing 'gu la rab tu dga' nas/ rang gi khyim du song ba dang / de'i
99b8(mdo sde): bskabs su de'i chung ma bu brtsas zhing song nas/ skad ngan thos nas des bran mo la de ci zhig ces dris so// des kyang de bzhin du bskrad do// de nas ded dpon de mi dga' bar 'gyur
100a1(mdo sde): nas/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag rnams kyang 'khor ba na ma'i mngal du skye bar ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ dge
100a2(mdo sde): slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang sangs rgyas mgo bo bcu pa de yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig
100a3(mdo sde): gi bar nam kyang ma'i mngal du ma skyes la/ srid pa tha ma la yang de'i 'byor pa de 'dra bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang /
100a4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes/ dge slong khyed kyi de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
100a5(mdo sde): mdog 'jam zhes bya ba ni// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong
100a6(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam kha' lding rnams dang / mi
100a7(mdo sde): 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang // nam ma
100a8(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /
100b1(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon
100b2(mdo sde): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na chongs dpon phyug cing nor mang la long spyod che ba/ 'khor dang yo byad mang ba/ bdag dbang ba mang nga
100b3(mdo sde): mdza bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs mang ba zhig yod de/ khyim bdag de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang pa/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la
100b4(mdo sde): phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go// de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ long spyod 'di dag ni chu zla lta bu rang bzhin can/ smig rgyu dang
100b5(mdo sde): 'dra ba/ mi rtag pa/ mi tan pa/ ther zug ma yin pa/ yid brtan du mi rung ba'i chos can/ gnod pa chen po lnga dang / thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyis/ bdag gis sangs rgyas
100b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/ cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus gsol la/ zhal zas bzang pos tshim par bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas des btse
100b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyas thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol ba dang / gdugs tshod gsol bar spyan drangs so// de nas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'ang/
100b8(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham rim byas pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'dun du bdar nas/ chos ga dang ldan pa'i khrus la gshegs so//
101a1(mdo sde): de nas tshong dpon de til mar spos can khyer te/ bsro khang du song nas/ bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
101a2(mdo sde): la bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol zin pa de'i tshe/ khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
101a3(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba tsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas nas/ ci bzhed pa bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol
101a4(mdo sde): zin nas/ gsang sder ni rgyu/ phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de la btso
101a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam gyi yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas/ yang dag par bzed bstod// yang dag par dga' bar mjed do// chos kyi
101a6(mdo sde): gtam rnams grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par bzed bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas tshong dpon de
101a7(mdo sde): dad pa brnyed nas/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sems la rtas par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
101a8(mdo sde): kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang /
101b1(mdo sde): dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos/ thig
101b2(mdo sde): nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / du 'bod dang / du 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab du tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams
101b3(mdo sde): dang kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin/
101b4(mdo sde): pa de dag tu gsil bar gyur te 'bab po// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag du ni gro bar gyur te 'bab po// de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad
101b5(mdo sde): par rnam rtse zhil bar 'gyur ro// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa
101b6(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad do// de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos
101b7(mdo sde): par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/
101b8(mdo sde): snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa
102a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying 'tshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /
102a2(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / tshad med rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang /
102a3(mdo sde): tshangs lha nye phan rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge
102a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams/ 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams
102a5(mdo sde): dang shin tu mthong nams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad
102a6(mdo sde): pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed do// nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim na glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom
102a7(mdo sde): par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zed par byed par 'gyur/ zhes brjod par
102a8(mdo sde): byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang nas/ gal te bcom ldan 'das
102b1(mdo sde): kyis 'das pa'i las su lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snum logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las su lung ston par bzhed na ni/ ma
102b2(mdo sde): logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston
102b3(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi 'the bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar
102b4(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i 'thil du mi/
102b5(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni//
102b6(mdo sde): lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhe
102b7(mdo sde): na ni/ smin 'tshams kyi 'dzed spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor tu mi snang bar 'gyur ro//
102b8(mdo sde): de nas 'od zer de dag gi bcom ldan 'das la len gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
103a1(mdo sde): dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// tshon sna stong gi spel ba sna tshogs can/ mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar 'gyur/ de'i phyogs rnams kun tu sna
103a2(mdo sde): bar bgyis/ nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dge spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i
103a3(mdo sde): rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thul rnams ni rgyur rkyen ma mchis par// pad ma'i rtsa dang dung 'dog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan po nyid kyi blo'i dus bab mkhyen lags na// dge sbyong
103a4(mdo sde): rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'chal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa gsal bar gsol// rgya batsho dang ni ri rgyal
103a5(mdo sde): lta bur brtan pa'i// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyi nad 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa'o 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bca
103a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni
103a7(mdo sde): rgyu rkyen med par 'dzum par mi mdzad na/ kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'di nga la 'dis lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo tshong dpon
103a8(mdo sde): 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas 'dog 'jam zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos
103b1(mdo sde): ni gang nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslabs par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur
103b2(mdo sde): sti bya'o zhes/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// // bam po bdun pa// / 'od
103b3(mdo sde): gsil zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la// // rgyal po rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong
103b4(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang /
103b5(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
103b6(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gdan dang /
103b7(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon
103b8(mdo sde): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnams thos kyi bu'i
104a1(mdo sde): nor dang ldan pa/ rnams thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'dren pa zhig yod de de yang dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang /
104a2(mdo sde): gzhan la phan pa zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa zhig go// de nas de 'di snyam du sem+ba te longs spyod 'di dag ni chu zla'i rang
104a3(mdo sde): bzhin can/ glang po che'i rna ba ltar g.yo ba/ mi rtag pa/ mi rten pa/ ther zug ma yin pa yid brten du mi rung ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos can gnod pa chen po lnga dang / thun mong du
104a4(mdo sde): 'dug pa yin gyis/ gdag gis longs spyod snying po med pa la/ snying po blang bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// des sos ka'i dus la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
104a5(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/ khyim yang rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas te/ tsan dan gyi chu ni chag chag btab/ spos rna chog
104a6(mdo sde): kyi snod ni bkram/ dri zhim po'i gdug pas ni bdug go/ me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/ me tog gi gdan rnams ni bshams so// de nas khu ba bsil ba'i btung ba rnams
104a7(mdo sde): dang / khur ba dang / bshos rnams kyang lha gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin las gdug tshod bskal ba/ btsun pa gdugs la bab ste/ bshos lags na/
104a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la bab par dgongs te/ gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/
104b1(mdo sde): lham bzed snams te/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te/ byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan
104b2(mdo sde): bzhams pa la bzhugs so// de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas las stsogs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs pa rig nas/ rang gi lag nas bza' dang /
104b3(mdo sde): bca' ba bzang pos tshim par byas/ te ci bzhed pa btabs so// rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed
104b4(mdo sde): pa btabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te gsang sder ni rgyu/ phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom
104b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par stan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag pa bzeng
104b6(mdo sde): bstod// yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par bzengs bstod//
104b7(mdo sde): yang dag par mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas khyim bdag de dad pa brnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ sems la rtas par
104b8(mdo sde): byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal
105a1(mdo sde): nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / mar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro
105a2(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar
105a3(mdo sde): med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol pa dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas dang / pad ma ltar
105a4(mdo sde): gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag du ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab po// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin de dag tu ni gro bar gyur
105a5(mdo sde): te 'ab bo// de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan
105a6(mdo sde): du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag
105a7(mdo sde): cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par
105a8(mdo sde): rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// skam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong ba'i las de zed de/ lha dang mi rnams
105b1(mdo sde): kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung rab 'gyur ba der nying 'tshams mdzin par gyur to// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /
105b2(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / tshe ma rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs
105b3(mdo sde): pa 'dun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams
105b4(mdo sde): dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyed rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya noms snang rnam
105b5(mdo sde): dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su
105b6(mdo sde): bcad pa gnyid kyang brjod par byed de// nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas brtan la sbyor bar bgyis// 'dam bu'i khyim na glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag
105b7(mdo sde): sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zed par byed par 'gyur//
105b8(mdo sde): zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/ gal
106a1(mdo sde): te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las su lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las
106a2(mdo sde): su lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror
106a3(mdo sde): skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi 'the bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar lung
106a4(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang 'gyur ro// stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//
106a5(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro//
106a6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// // rang sangs rgyas kyis byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin 'tshams kyis
106a7(mdo sde): mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer
106a8(mdo sde): de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal
106b1(mdo sde): mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gi spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de'i phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma
106b2(mdo sde): shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// rgod dang bral zhi la rgyags dang mi dge spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gis dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//
106b3(mdo sde): rgyal ba dgra 'thul dag ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad ma'i rtsa dang dung 'dog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na// dge sbyong rgyal dbang
106b4(mdo sde): nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gis ni gsungs mchog bstan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa gsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta
106b5(mdo sde): bur brtan pa'i// mgon po rdzogs rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa'o 'dzum ston mdzad pa// de na khyod las skye bo bal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'dra
106b6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'di de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya
106b7(mdo sde): rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum par mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'dis de la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo
106b8(mdo sde): khyim bdag 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas 'od bsil zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par
107a1(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dad pa 'di yin no// de bas ni 'di ltar bslab par byas te/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /
107a2(mdo sde): thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o// zhes dge slong khyed kyi de ltar bslab par bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs ste/
107a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la mngon par bstod do// // mnyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon chen po rnams dang /
107a4(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding
107a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
107a6(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nam chen po dang ldan pa/
107a7(mdo sde): nam bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul mu ta na ljongs
107a8(mdo sde): rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ gang gi'i klung gi 'gram du byon to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyi zham rim byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'dun du
107b1(mdo sde): bdar nas mnyan pa rnams ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ mnyan pa rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to kye chu klung 'di las nga 'di las nga sgrol cig/ mnyan pa rnams
107b2(mdo sde): kyis gsol pa/ gru bcas stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga yang sngon mnyan pa byed byed de/ ngas dga' bo/
107b3(mdo sde): ni 'dod chags kyis chu klung du ltung ba las sgral/ sor 'phreng ni zhe sdang gi rgya mtshor ltung ba las bsgral/ bram ze'i bu lnga brgya yis khyed pa ni/ ngar rgyal gyi rgya mtshor lhung
107b4(mdo sde): ba las bsgral/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ni gti mug gi rgya mtshor ltung ba las bsgral te/ 'on kyang ngas gru btsas ma bslangs so// de skad ces bka' stsal kyang / bsgral
107b5(mdo sde): bar khas ma blangs so// de nas mnyan pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yang thos// gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yang mthong nas/
107b6(mdo sde): dad pa skyes te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das bsgral lo zhes nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bsgral bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/ de nas dge slong rnams grur zhugs
107b7(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul kyis mnyan pade bas kyang ches lnga pha rol gyi 'gram du bzhugs par gyur to// de nas mnyan pa des rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul mthong nas sems
107b8(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par bya ba de lta bu'i chos ston te/ mnyan pa des de
108a1(mdo sde): mthong nas/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu yi shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so//
108a2(mdo sde): nas bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig len gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi mi'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i ri las
108a3(mdo sde): bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang
108a4(mdo sde): ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang gi mi dang gnyen gyis tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi tshun rnams kyis kyang
108a5(mdo sde): ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang gsol ba// nyes pa mang pos kyang ma song nas// shin tu mi zad khyod kyi mthu' yis bcad/
108a6(mdo sde): bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gi thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brtan nas thob/
108a7(mdo sde): bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dges pa zhi ba'i go 'phangs thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rgas dang 'chi ba'i nad rnams spangs/
108a8(mdo sde): srid pa stong du mthong ba dka' ba las// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de'i nang nas mnyan pa gcig gis 'gyod pa chen po skyes nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
108b1(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bshos gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//
108b2(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de// de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung
108b3(mdo sde): nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang
108b4(mdo sde): du 'bod dang / du 'bod chen po dang / cha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang /
108b5(mdo sde): ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag bsil bar gyur te 'bab po//
108b6(mdo sde): grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni gro bar gyur te 'bab po// de nas sems can de dag gi snod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// snyam mo// de nas
108b7(mdo sde): de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'dis nas shi 'phos sam/ 'o na ste gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das
108b8(mdo sde): sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod/
109a1(mdo sde): kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gis gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo//
109a2(mdo sde): de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong ba'i 'gyur ba'i las de zed de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnam
109a3(mdo sde): snod du rung ba der nying 'tshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / zab bral
109a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa 'dun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs pa
109a5(mdo sde): chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dges rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang /
109a6(mdo sde): sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams
109a7(mdo sde): dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams gyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod/
109a8(mdo sde): par byed de// nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim na glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang
109b1(mdo sde): zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod par byed do// de nas
109b2(mdo sde): 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das
109b3(mdo sde): pa'i las su lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las su lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su
109b4(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni//
109b5(mdo sde): zhabs gyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgos su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi 'the bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni//
109b6(mdo sde): pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur
109b7(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos
109b8(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyis byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin 'tshams kyi mdzod srur mi snang bar 'gyur ro//
110a1(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i cug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od
110a2(mdo sde): zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das len gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan
110a3(mdo sde): pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldanas 'das la zhus pa// tshon sna stong gi spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de'i phyogs rnams
110a4(mdo sde): kun du snang bar gyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar gyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dge spangs pa'i// sangs rgyas
110a5(mdo sde): 'gro ba dag gis dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// pad mi'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan po nyid kyi blo'i dus bab mkhyen legs na// dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan
110a6(mdo sde): pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gis ni gsung mchog brten pa dang // bzang po dag gi the tshom skyes pa gsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dag ni ri rgyal
110a7(mdo sde): lta bur brtan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin da 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa'o 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa de ni khyod las skyes po phal chen nyan par
110a8(mdo sde): 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
110b1(mdo sde): rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen med par 'dzum par mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo mnyan pa 'dis nga la sems dga' ba bskyed pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun
110b2(mdo sde): dga' bo mnyan pa 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba
110b3(mdo sde): rgal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par byas ste/ sangs rgyas
110b4(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyi de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
110b5(mdo sde): dge slong de dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung ba la mngon par bstod do// // spos kyi ngad ldan zhes bya ba ni// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan
110b6(mdo sde): 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnam
110b7(mdo sde): dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / namakha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/
110b8(mdo sde): bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas/ wa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi/
111a1(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang /
111a2(mdo sde): snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams bsnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab 'od mi'i tshal bya ka len 'da' ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe
111a3(mdo sde): yul dbus na 'khod pa'i mi rnams kyang lugs kyis na/ phal chen byug pa sna tshogs kyis lus skyed par byed do// de nas re shig na khyim bdag gi bu zhig yod pa de'i bran
111a4(mdo sde): dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa de/ tsan dan dmar po 'dar zhing 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/
111a5(mdo sde): lham bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham rim byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod bsgoms la gshegs so//
111a6(mdo sde): de nas bu mo des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i 'tshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpa' byed bzang po brgyad pa kyi mdzes par byas/
111a7(mdo sde): pa 'od 'dom gang gi brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas ldog pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bu mo de dad pa chen
111a8(mdo sde): skyes so// de nas dad pa snyed nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi 'di lta bu'i zhing rnyed kyang / dbul ba'i nyes pas bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti byed mi nus na/ bdag
111b1(mdo sde): gis tsho ba 'di 'dra ba ci rgos snyam mo// de nas des rang gi srog la yang ma bltas ste/ lag pa gnyis gtsan dan dmar pos byugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
111b2(mdo sde): la bskus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer ril gyis tsan dan dan po'i dris gang bar mdzad do// de nas bu mo de cho 'phrul de mthong
111b3(mdo sde): nas sems dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ sems la rtas par byas te/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin pa
111b4(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni
111b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/
111b6(mdo sde): kha cig ni 'og tu 'gre'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos/ thig nag dang / bdud 'joms dang / du 'bod
111b7(mdo sde): dang / du 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud
111b8(mdo sde): pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo//
112a1(mdo sde): grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar
112a2(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom
112a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod
112a4(mdo sde): kyi 'on kyang sngon ma gyur pa'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par
112a5(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zed de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying 'tshams 'jidzi
112a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang /
112a7(mdo sde): 'phrul dag rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa 'dun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang /
112a8(mdo sde): tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams
112b1(mdo sde): dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar tu song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug
112b2(mdo sde): bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa nyis kyang brjod par byed de// nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas brtan
112b3(mdo sde): la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu khyim na glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i
112b4(mdo sde): 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zed par byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham
112b5(mdo sde): bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyi 'das pa'i las su lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis snams log
112b6(mdo sde): su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las su lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed
112b7(mdo sde): na ni/ zhabs kyis 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung
112b8(mdo sde): smyon par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi 'the bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mer skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su me snang bar 'gyur ro// bstobs kyis 'khor los
113a1(mdo sde): sbyar ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par
113a2(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan zos kyi byang chub tu lung ston
113a3(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin 'tshams kyi mdzod slar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang
113a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
113a5(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// tshen
113a6(mdo sde): sna stong gi spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang
113a7(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dge spangs pa'i/ sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ rgyal ba dgra thul rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma
113a8(mdo sde): mchis par/ pad ma'i rtsa dang dung 'dog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan po nyid kyi blo'i 'dus bab mkhyen lags na// dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/
113b1(mdo sde): thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa gsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyalta bur brtan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs
113b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ gang gi don du dpa'o 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
113b3(mdo sde): stsal pa// kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu me
113b4(mdo sde): rkyen med par 'dzum par mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo bu mo 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo bu mo 'di
113b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rang sangs rgyas spos kyi ngad ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//
113b6(mdo sde): de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni/ gang nga la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par byas te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
113b7(mdo sde): dang / dam pa'i chos nyid de/ de tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//
113b8(mdo sde): 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bdud 'joms dang / ngu 'bong dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu
114a1(mdo sde): ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud dpal
114a2(mdo sde): ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag du ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo// grang ba'i
114a3(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag du ni gro bar gyur te 'bab bo// de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar 'gyur ro// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems
114a4(mdo sde): te kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyid par mdzad de/ de dag
