165b7(mdo sde): cing nyams thags pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang / de zong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang / khron pa rnams
165b8(mdo sde): skams par 'gyur ro// gang gis che char 'bab pa de'i tshe/ de'i steng du me stag 'gro ba'i mngag char 'bab pa dang / phyis bzhin du dring zhing / mchod du dri ngab zas su phyis 'tshal
166a1(mdo sde): lags/ de yang bde lag du mi rnyed pa zhig mthong nas/ yang gsol pa/ nyams thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su
166a2(mdo sde): myong // gang na phyi sa'i gnas yod pa// der ni sdig shin brgyag par bgyid// phyi sa bza' 'am btung snyam nas// de yang bde blag rnyed mi 'gyur// des na mi'i 'jig
166a3(mdo sde): rten du// sdig pa rab 'jigs ci bgyis na/ des na sdig pa 'di 'dra ba// 'jigs su rung ba nyams su myong // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu
166a4(mdo sde): yi dgas mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnams pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// mo'u 'gal gyis bu 'o na legs par nyon la
166a5(mdo sde): yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer ba ra na sen/ rang sangs rgyas sdug cing 'phongs pa 'di la snying rtse ba
166a6(mdo sde): bas mthi' gnas mal gyis mtsho ba zhig yod la/ de yang nad bu ci zhig ste/ ba ra na sir bsod snyoms la song ngo // re shig na de la sman pas mthun pa'i zas brtan nas/
166a7(mdo sde): de tshong dpon zhig ga la 'dug pa der song ba dang / tshong dpon des kyang mthong nas/ dris pa 'phags pa khyod ci bzhed/ des smras pa/ mthun pa'i kha zas 'dod do//
166a8(mdo sde): de nas tshong dpon des 'phags pa la kha zas mthun pa phul cig ces mna' ma la bsgo'o// de nas de'i mna' ma ser sna skyes te/ gal te bdag gi der 'di la kha zas byin
166b1(mdo sde): du zin na yang 'ongs par 'ong bar 'gyur ro// snyam nas pogs cig du song ste/ lhung bzed phyis bkang nas steng du 'bras chen gyi bkang ste/ rang sangs rgyas de la phul lo//
166b2(mdo sde): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de phul lo kye bar shes pa'i mthong ba mi 'jug te/ des blangs nas tshor te/ 'di dri nga ba las na 'di byi sas bkang gor ma chag go snyam mo// de nas
166b3(mdo sde): bdag nyid chen po des/ de zhig du bor nas song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu ji snyam sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi mnar
166b4(mdo sde): mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dgas mo 'di yin te/ des sdig pa'i las de lta bu byas nas/ de byin cad rtag du sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams
166b5(mdo sde): su rtag du skyes te/ rtag du zas su phyis za bar 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bas na ser sna spang ba las brtson pa byed ste/ ci nas yi dgas mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag
166b6(mdo sde): 'ong bar ma 'gyur ba de lta bu mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang /
166b7(mdo sde): lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po las stsogs pa gzhan dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
166b8(mdo sde): par bstod do// mo'u 'gel gyi bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug
167a1(mdo sde): po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / dad dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang /
167a2(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/
167a3(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
167a4(mdo sde): 'das/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / smen zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge
167a5(mdo sde): bdun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od mi tshal bya ka lan 'da' ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i rgyal po'i khab kyi pha rol/ 'od ma'i tshal gyi ni tshur
167a6(mdo sde): rol yi dgas de'i bar skams na/ yi dgas sdom du ma mi rag ma 'dra la/ gcir bur 'dug cing / rang gis skas g.yog pa/ lto ni ri rab tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi
167a7(mdo sde): mig tsam te/ 'bar zhing rab du 'bar la/ kun tu rab du 'bar la/ me lce gcig du 'bar nas tshig cing nyams thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal grag pa dang / mi bzad
167a8(mdo sde): pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba nyams su myong ba lnga brgya kha khrus sdig pa bzhin du nam ma kha' la 'khor te/ gang du yang 'dug sa mi rnyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan
167b1(mdo sde): ba mo'u 'gal gyi bu la snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos dgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la song bas/ des yi dgas de dag mthong
167b2(mdo sde): do// yi dgas de dag gis kyang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mthong ngo // de nas de ngag gcig du 'dril nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i thad
167b3(mdo sde): du 'ong ste/ phyi nas snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la/ gti zhing smra bas tshig mthun par smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ bdag cag ni rgyal po'i khab du
167b4(mdo sde): tshong dpon lnga brgyar gyur te/ bdag cag ser sna can 'jungs pa/ yo byed rnams la kun tu 'dzin par gyur nas/ bdag cag nyid kyis kyang sbyin pa ma byin la/ gzhan dag byin
167b5(mdo sde): pa la yang bgyegs byas so// sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la yang / yi dgas kyis tshig lta bus mang du spros te/ khyod ni yi dgas skyes gzhin du gzhan gyi khyim phyi nyu gu po zhes
167b6(mdo sde): byas so// de nas bdag cag shi ba'i 'og du 'di lta bu'i yi dgas su skyes so// btsun pa mo 'u 'gal gyi bu chen po// de bas na bdag cag gi nye du/ rgyal po'i khab na gan
167b7(mdo sde): pa de dag la/ bdag cag gi las kyi rnams pa shes par mdzod la/ dad pa'i dris te/ sangs rgyas las stsogs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas/ bdag cag gi
167b8(mdo sde): slad du nga yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig/ 'on kyang bdag cag yi dgas kyi skye nas thar yang spang ngo // zhes gsungs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bus/
168a1(mdo sde): kyang / yi dgas rnams la cang mi gsungs pas khas blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bus de dag gi nye du dag rnams kyi khyim khyim du dang
168a2(mdo sde): pa dris nas byid nyid sangs rgyas las stsogs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs so// yi dgas rnams la yang smras te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong
168a3(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos la spyan drangs kyis/ khyed kyang der gshegs shig ces byas so// de dag gi nyi du rnams la yang / khyed kyang gshegs shig dang / nye du'i
168a4(mdo sde): mchod sbyin byed pa der yi dgas de dag mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu nyid chos ston gyi zhal ta byed pa la bzhugs so// de nas nam langs
168a5(mdo sde): nas zhal zas bshams te/ gdugs tshod la bab nas/ yi dgas de dag mi snang ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos lha'i mig gis yi dgas de dag bas
168a6(mdo sde): na/ yul ma ga ta thog thag na yang mi snang la/ thar gyi gling bzhi'i bar ltas na yang / de na yang mi snang ngo // de nas ji srid du de'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa/ de srid du bltas kyang
168a7(mdo sde): de na yang mi snang ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sbyin bdag de rnams ma
168a8(mdo sde): bda' lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi ma mthong ba khyed mi dga' ma byed cig/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa las 'das
168b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'jigs rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag yod de de dag dus las kyi rlung gi 'phangs mong gi 'on kyang mo'u 'gal gyi bu deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la ltos shig/ thams
168b2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzigs pa snang bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rdzu 'phrul gyi rnams par 'phrul pa yang bstan gyis/ 'gan rdo rdungs pa dang / de nas bcom
168b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'gan de brdungs pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyang 'dus/ yi dgas mo rnams kyang nye du rnams dang / yi dgas mthong bar 'dod pa'i sems can rnams gzha
168b4(mdo sde): ngag kyang ltad mo la lhags te 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ci nas/ yi dgas rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ bshos
168b5(mdo sde): gsol ba mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag cag gi phyir nye du rnams kyis sangs rgyas las stsogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bshos gsol zhing 'khod do// snyam du dran pa
168b6(mdo sde): brnyed par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul bstan to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi gsungs yan lag lnga dang ldan pas yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa de'i bsod nams gang //
168b7(mdo sde): de ni yi dgas bye bzhin song // yi dgas 'jig rten rab 'jigs las// de dag myur du thar gyur cig/ ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi de las brten te/
168b8(mdo sde): de dang mthus pa'i chos brten te/ de thos nas srogs chags 'bum phrag du mas sna'i dri ma spangs nas/ bden pa mthong bar gyur to// yi dgas ngag kyang bcom ldan 'das la
169a1(mdo sde): @sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mor skyes nas ring por ma lon par ni chos nyid
169a2(mdo sde): kyi sems rnams pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes/ las gang gi skyes snyam mo// de nas yi dgas las shes 'phos pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i
169a3(mdo sde): lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo // de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu dag 'di snyam du sems te/
169a4(mdo sde): bdag cag zhan lon de bzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir/ 'gre ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhan ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo //
169a5(mdo sde): snyam mo// de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu/ rna cha gdub dkor dag cing dgu la ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / sen mo ngos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod
169a6(mdo sde): pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ta ma la' la ma dang / sbri ka las stsogs pas/ byugs pa de rnams kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo// lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad
169a7(mdo sde): ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man 'da' ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan 'da' ka gnas pa/ kho ra khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/
169a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la me togs gis gtor te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i
169b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis bsam pa dag bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas/ sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu dag gis
169b2(mdo sde): khyed par chen po thob bo// de bdag tshong pa khyed bogs phyin pa bzhin du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das lan gsum bskor bar byas nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur to// der bcom ldan
169b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyi yi dgas mang po dge lha'i nang du dkod nas/ de dag kyang mdangs sum nga'i thad du 'ongs
169b4(mdo sde): te/ de dag la ngas chos bstan nas de dag gi chos rnyed par bya ba rnyed de/ ma thob par 'gyur ba brnyed nas dong ba de ni/ khyod kyi yi dgas zhal ta byas pa 'bras bu yod par gyur te/ legs
169b5(mdo sde): so legs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'ga' gyi bu chen pos/ de dag gi nye du rnams la yang shes par byas te/ de dag gis thos nas/ mchog du ya mtshan du gyur te/ bcom ldan
169b6(mdo sde): 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas/ bkur sti byas so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bas na/ khyod kyis ci nas yi dgas de dag gi nyes pa de lta bu dag mi 'byung ba'i phyir/ ser sna spangs
169b7(mdo sde): pa la brtson par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
169b8(mdo sde): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po las stsogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// chu smad zhes bya ba ni/
170a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / bo zang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang
170a2(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha'i lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
170a3(mdo sde): bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldeng dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
170a4(mdo sde): kyi mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong
170a5(mdo sde): rnams rnyed pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od mi tshal ka len 'da' ka gnas pa na brten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab gyis grong khyer na//
170a6(mdo sde): tshong dpon byug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lo
170a7(mdo sde): pa dang / bu byung ste khye'u zhig brtsas nas/ de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas/ khyi'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par bya/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di rgyu skar chus
170a8(mdo sde): slad la btsas pas na de'i phyir/ ming du chung slad ces gdags so// de nas khye'u chu smad bskyes bsrings te/ cher skyes te/ de'i ba shi ba dang / rang gi khyim gyi bdag por
170b1(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas des tshong dus bkram nas/ nye tsheng byed cing rko tsong gi tshor ba byed pa las/ de nyin cig gzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zad du song ste/ de bcom ldan 'das mthong
170b2(mdo sde): ba dang / dam pa'i chos thos pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par gyur nas/ de rab du byung ba'i sems skyes te/ des ma la gsol ba btab pa/ yum dag bcom ldan
170b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis bstan pa la/ rab du byung gis gnang bar mdzod cig/ de nas de'i mas smras pa bu khyod ni bu cig pa yin gyis/ bdag ji srid 'tshe'i bar du byung shig/ bdag shi ba'i
170b4(mdo sde): 'og du ci bya ba byos shig ces zer ro// chu smad des kyang ci rnyed pa de dag thams cad ma la byin te/ yum 'dis dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa dang / bkres pa/
170b5(mdo sde): rnams la sbyin pa dag gyis shis ces byas so// de'i ma de ni bskam chags can du 'jungs pa/ yo byed rnams kun tu 'dzin pa zhig te/ kar sha pa ni ngag spangs nas dge sbyong dang
170b6(mdo sde): bram ze gang dag zas 'dod de/ khyim der 'ongs pa de dag la rgyu zhing khyed ni yi dgas skyes pa bzhin du khyi phyi nyug cing slong ngo zhes zer ro// bu de la yang slu ba byed byed de/ bdag
170b7(mdo sde): gi nyin cig bzhin du dge slong 'di rnyed cig la zan sbyin no zhes zer ro// phyis re shig ni de shi'i ba dang / yi dgas su skyes nas/ bu chu smad dang bral ba'i mya ngan byed de/ sbyin pa
170b8(mdo sde): dag byin zhing bsod nams ngag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab du byung ngo // de nas brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas/ bol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba
171a1(mdo sde): 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brten par rig nas/ 'du byed thams cad bzil ba dang / ltung ba dang rnams par mthong ba dang / rnams par 'jigs
171a2(mdo sde): pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid sngon sum du byas ste/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral
171a3(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong ba mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa ye/ tsan dan spangs pa bzhin du bsil bar gyur pa/ rigs pas sgo
171a4(mdo sde): lnga'i skabs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang /
171a5(mdo sde): nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjod pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas gyur nas/ des chu klung gang gi'i 'gram du lo ma'i sgril po byas bsam tan byed de/
171a6(mdo sde): de'i ma yi dgas su skyes pa de yang sdong du ma me rag ma 'dra la/ gcir bur 'dug cing / rang go skas g.yog pa lto ni ri rab tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing
171a7(mdo sde): rab du 'bar la/ kun du rab du 'bar/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyams thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa chu srad kyi thad du song nas/ re shig na tshe dang ldan
171a8(mdo sde): ba chu smad kyis/ yi dgas me de mthong nas dris pa/ 'di kho na 'dra ba'i khyod su zhig yin/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ bu cig la brtse ba'i/ byams pa'i ma ni bdag yin te/
171b1(mdo sde): zas dang snyoms dang bral ba'i/ yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skyes/ bdag ni shi ba'i dus 'das nas/ lo drangs nyi shu lnga lon te/ chu'i bag kyang ma mthong na/ kha zas lta zhig
171b2(mdo sde): ga la mthong / 'bras bur ldan pa'i shing rnams kyis// drang srong de dag 'bras med gyur// gang ba'i mtsho 'gram bdag song yang / de dag yang ni skams par 'gyur// btsun
171b3(mdo sde): ba'i shing drung bde ba legs// khyod ni snod nang du yang bsil// bsres pa bdag la thugs rje bskyed// skom gyi gdungs kyi chab skyog cig/ de nas chu smad kyis ma la smras
171b4(mdo sde): pa// yum khyod mi rung gyur pa'i tshe// bdag gis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing // bsod nams dag byed du ma bcug gam/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ bu cig bdag ni ser sna gnon
171b5(mdo sde): pas/ sbyin pa dag kyang ma byin bsod nams dag kyang ma byas te/ nor rnyed pa de dag thams cad sdig pa'i sems dong du skabs so// bu cig de bas na dad pa dris la bdag gi
171b6(mdo sde): phyir/ sangs rgyas las stsogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bshos gsol bas nas/ yon gyi rabs bdon par gsol cig/ 'on kyang bdag gi skyes gnas nas thar srid do//
171b7(mdo sde): chu smad kyis smras pa/ de ltar bgyis khyod kyang gral dpon gyis mdun du 'dug shig/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ bu cig bdag ni cig pur 'dug pas ngo tsha ste ngos mi thub po// /
171b8(mdo sde): chu slad kyis smras pa/ yum khyod gang gi cha/ sdig pa byed pa de'i tsheng chen/ de ltar 'bras bu myong ba'i tshe ci ngoH/ yi dgas mos smras pa'o na de bzhin du 'ong bar bya'o// de nas
171'a1(mdo sde): chu smad kyi nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas/ phyid nyin sangs rgyas las stsogs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas bshos la spyan drangs nas/
171'a2(mdo sde): gdugs chod la bab nas/ sangs rgyas las stsogs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun kyang 'dus yi dgas mo de yang gral dpon gyi 'dun du 'dug ste/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus
171'a3(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis/ yi dgas mo de mthong ngo // de dag gi yi dgas mo de'i lus mi sdug pa de mthong nas/ shin du skyo ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' gyur to// de nas
171'a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa chu smad kyis sangs rgyas las stsogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas/ yi dgas me'i phyir yon gyi rabs gdon par gsol to// de nas
171'a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis/ gsungs yan lag lnga dang ldan pas/ sbyin pa'i rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di'i bsod nams gang / de ni nga yi dgas phyi bzhin seng / de ni yi dgas 'jig
171'a6(mdo sde): rten rabs 'jigs las/ de ni myur du zar gyur cig/ ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi de las bsten nas/ yi dgas mo de dang / skye bo mang po la de dang mthun pa'i chos
171'a7(mdo sde): ston to// srogs chags 'bum phrags du mas de thos nas/ bden pa mthong bar 'gyur to// yi dgas mo de yang sems dgas gyur te/ shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes so// tshe
171'a8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa chus smad kyi kyang yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis smras pa/ yum da ni ma thabs yod kyis sbyin pa yongs su btang ba dag gyis shis/ yi
171'b1(mdo sde): dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mos smras pa/ bu cig bdag ni sbyin pa la dga' bar med de mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis/ yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mo la smras pa/ chags pa'i mun pas
171'b2(mdo sde): mig ni rabs bsgribs te/ khyod kyi yid dgas 'jigs rten bsgrub pa'i/ khyod kyi ros bu chen po sha med pa/ rus pa lpags pa skyi rnams nga dung 'dug ces byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad
171'b3(mdo sde): kyis/ lan mang du spyod de smras pa/ de'i 'og de las ras zung cig thob po// de nas chu smad kyis dge slong la phul lo// gang gis dge slong las ras zung cig po nyos pa'i dge slong des/ gos
171'b4(mdo sde): gos kyi rdang la gzhag go de nas yi dgas mo de mtshan mo 'ongs te rkus so// de nas dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa chu smad la brnyas nas/ chu smad song te/ yi dgas mo spros te/ phyir bkug ste byin
171'b5(mdo sde): no// de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du dge slong de las brkus nas/ de bas na tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis phyir bkug ste byin pa dang / dge slong des kyang de bshags nas/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong
171'b6(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun gyi phyir sten la klan no// de nas de phyin chad ma brkus so// de bas na sems can rnams la/ de ltar ser sna tho tsam par byed pa mthong nas/ ci nas yi dgas mo'i de'i nyes de lta bu
171'b7(mdo sde): ngag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
171'b8(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po las stsogs pa gzhan dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'das// dmus long zhes
172a1(mdo sde): bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /
172a2(mdo sde): tsheng dpon rnams dang / dad dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen
172a3(mdo sde): po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnam
172a4(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams
172a5(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tsha la/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan
172a6(mdo sde): pa dga' byed snga dro shams thabs dang / chos gos bzhags ste/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo // mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms byas nas/ zan
172a7(mdo sde): zos te/ zas phyis ma len pa spangs nas/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos gzhag ste yi dgas kyi yul du rgyu zhing song ba las/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis yi dgas sdong dum me rag
172a8(mdo sde): ma 'dra la/ dmus long 'dug pa/ rang gi skas g.yog pa/ lte ni ri rab tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ du khrod bzhin du dri nga ba/ khA dang / bya dgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis
172b1(mdo sde): bskor nas/ phyogs kun nas sha 'bad cing za ba dang / de gdan la bab ste/ dkos thag nas/ nyams thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ srin mo khyod kyis sngon sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas nas/
172b2(mdo sde): des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug yi dgas mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar na sgron me mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gis las kyi
172b3(mdo sde): rnam par lung ston par 'gyur ro// de thos nas sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang lnga pa dga' byed bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i
172b4(mdo sde): tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skom pa dang / 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston to// 'khor brgya phrag du
172b5(mdo sde): ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar/ bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gsong por gsung snyam par gsung ba/ tshur
172b6(mdo sde): shog 'ongs pa legs so// zhes ga las 'ongs/ dga' byed kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas rgyu ba'i nang nas mchis te/ der bdag gi yi dgas mo sdong dum me rag ma 'dra
172b7(mdo sde): la/ dmus longs du mchis par rab gi skas g.yog/ lto ni ri rab tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ du khrod bzhin du dri nga la/ khra dang / bya rgod dang / khri dang / wa rnams kyis bskor nas/
172b8(mdo sde): phyogs kun nas sha kum zhing 'tshal ba dag de bangan la bab ste/ dkas zag nas nyams thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzang ba dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ongs
173a1(mdo sde): ba myong zhing / mchis pa zhing mthong lags so// yang gsol ba/ lus can ri bo thon po 'dra ba la// chu dang rkog ma skem shing shin du bsdug/ rang gi sgra ni gdong
173a2(mdo sde): g.yog cir bur mchis// mchu sgo brag khab mig 'dra rab du rid// de ltar cir bu skras gdong g.yog pa dang // rus pa'i khrul 'khor sgeg zhing zong ba thogs// mi zad du zhing kun
173a3(mdo sde): tu rgyug par bgyid// bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis// dub cing sdug bsngal dag gi nyan// nyams thags skad kyang 'byin par byed// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyam su myong // de'i mi'i
173a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten du// rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na// des sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba// 'jigs su rung ba myong bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' byed/ yi
173a5(mdo sde): dgas mo de ni/ sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnams par nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// dga' byed 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la
173a6(mdo sde): yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// dga' byed sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
173a7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyis
173a8(mdo sde): ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer ba ra na se na/ drang srongs smra ba ri dgas kyi gnas na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas grong
173b1(mdo sde): khyer ba ra na se de na/ tshong dpon gyis bu mo zhigs 'dug pa de la/ chos thos nas/ 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur te/ nges pha ma la/
173b2(mdo sde): gsol pa te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // de nas de'i phyir nye du rnams kyis/ dge slong ma'i tsug khang byas nas/ de de na slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i dge
173b3(mdo sde): slong ma dag dang lhan cig du gnas pa las/ re shig na des bag med pa'i dbang gis bslab pa'i bzhi la lhod byas so// de nas dge slong ma rnams kyis tshul khrims 'chal chal
173b4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir bskrad do// de nas des sbyin bdag khyims bdag rnams dad pas nges par dbul ba yang bcod du bcug/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyis sngags pa ma yin/
173b5(mdo sde): pa yang brjod/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag mthong na yang mig btsum de 'dug go/ dga' byed ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon bu mo gang yin pa de ni yi dgas
173b6(mdo sde): mo 'di yin te/ des tsug lags khang ser sna byas pa des ni yi dgas su skyes so// des nar ma bcad pa des ni/ khra dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis bskor to// des slob
173b7(mdo sde): pa dang / mi slob pa'i dge slong rnams kyis sngags pa ma yin par brjod pas ni/ de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to// dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams mthong na/ mig btsums pas ni/
173b8(mdo sde): dmus longs tu gyur to// dga' byed de ltar na/ las cig du nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang cig du nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// dga' byed de bas na/ las
174a1(mdo sde): cig du nges par gnag pa rnams dang 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las cig du nges par bkar ba rnams ni 'ba' shig la gtan par byas ste/ dga' byed khyod kyis de
174a2(mdo sde): ltar bslab par bya'o// chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bstan pa na/ srog chags sa yas bden pa thob par gyur ro// der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
174a3(mdo sde): dag ser sna dang / ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i nyes migs de dag la/ gzhan dag kyang rtogs nas ser sna dang / ngag gi nyes par spyod pa spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de
174a4(mdo sde): ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po las
174a5(mdo sde): stsogs pa gzhan dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / tshong dpon zhes bya ba ni// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
174a6(mdo sde): la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyis mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang /
174a7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas
174a8(mdo sde): te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po
174b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu'i
174b2(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyis tshal/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe nyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug la nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ dang yongs su 'dzin
174b3(mdo sde): pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyis bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyis bu'i nor dang 'gren pa zhig gnas te/ de phyi zhig na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas ba
174b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dpe' byed bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong
174b5(mdo sde): bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin por che'i ri bo 'gro ba kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom
174b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las sko bar 'gyur ba'i chos sten te/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'ad ba la yon
174b7(mdo sde): tan du lta bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la rab du byung nas/ kun lo grags pa dang / bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan
174b8(mdo sde): dang / nad gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes par 'gyur to// de nas yongs su bzung ba'i yo byed rnyed do cog stsogs par byed dang / des tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis 'gan
175a1(mdo sde): de mjug pa med bsrungs nas rus bu phyir phyung ngo // de nas de'i ros bu la/ ros bu'i mchod pa byas nas/ phyir gtsugs lag khangs su lhags so// de nas gnas
175a2(mdo sde): khang gi sgo bye ste/ chos gos dang lhung bzed g.yar sa 'drim pa la bzhugs pa dang / re shig na yi dgas rka lags dang mi sngags la/ las mchog du 'jigs pa chos gos dang lhung bzed zin
175a3(mdo sde): cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de ltar mi gdug pa de mthong nas/ dge slong dag mi 'gyur bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyis bu de la/
175a4(mdo sde): phan btags pa dang / slob mi'i tshogs rnams skyo ba skyes pa dang / ser sna'i rnams par smin pa mi sdug pa yang dag par bsten pa'i phyir dge slong gi mtshogs kyis zhabs rings byas te
175a5(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar te/ gnas der gshegs so// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par
175a6(mdo sde): brgyan pa dpe byed bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od mdom gang gyi brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas las lhags pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang
175a7(mdo sde): ba mtho ngo ma pa ga du// mthong ma thag du/ de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyes nas/ de ngo mtshar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis char sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur zab pa da /
175a8(mdo sde): lnga sgra lta bu'i gsung gis yi dgas de spyod de/ bzhin bzang khyod nyid kyis/ bdag nyid phung po'i phyir/ chos gos dang lhung bzed 'di bsgrubs te/ des na yi dgas su skyes pa yin
175b1(mdo sde): gyis/ de yang sems dga' bar bgyis la/ yo byad 'di la yang sems ma chags par byas legs so// 'di las kyang shi nas/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes re/ de nas yi
175b2(mdo sde): dgas des/ chos gos dang lhung bzed dge 'dun la phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyags 'tshal lo// nyen pa gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yi
175b3(mdo sde): dgas kyi phyir yon gyis rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di'i bsod nams gang // de ni yi dgas phyi bzhin song // yi dgas 'jigs rten rab 'jigs las// de ni myur du mthar gyur
175b4(mdo sde): cig/ de nas yi dgas de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so// de nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po// rna ba bdub bkor
175b5(mdo sde): ngag gi 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do zhal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i bcod pan can lus gur gum ta ma lI lo ma dang / spri ka las stsogs pas byags
175b6(mdo sde): pa des/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man 'da' ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang te/ 'od mi 'tshal bya ka lan 'ang
175b7(mdo sde): ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od chen po snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis tor te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom
175b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis kyang de la de dang mthun pa'i chos bsten te/ des thos nas dga' ba skyes te song ngo // de'i tshe dge slong srong dang tho rang mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas pa dedang
176a1(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // de mthong nas the tshom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
176a2(mdo sde): ci lags/ 'dangs gsum mi mjed kyis bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam de ma dang gsungs de'i thad du 'ongs nas ngas de la chos bstan te/ de dga' ba skyes nas song ngo // /
176a3(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas nas/ ci nas tshong dpon las yi dgas su gyur pa de'i nyes pa lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur bar/ ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab
176a4(mdo sde): par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye na chen po las stsogs
176a5(mdo sde): pa gzhan dag kyang yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / bu zhes bya ba ni// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
176a6(mdo sde): la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
176a7(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/
176a8(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dkyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen
176b1(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na
176b2(mdo sde): 'od mi tshal bya ka len 'da' ka gnas pa de na bstan cing bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos dgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/
176b3(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms byas nas/ zas zos nas/ zas phyis ma len pa spangs nas/ chos gos dang lhung bzed bzhags ste/ yi dgas gi yul du rgyu zhing song ba dang / des bya rgod
176b4(mdo sde): phung po'i ri'i nyan kor du/ yi dgas mo gshin rje srin mo 'dra la/ lus khrag gis gshos pa/ du khrod na 'dug pa bzhin du/ keng rus kyi bskor ba/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo bu lnga lnga bcas zhing
176b5(mdo sde): de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong la/ bu la byams pa yid bzhin du/ de dag za zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas gnas rten 'dam bu sbyin gyi bus de la dris pa/ khyod kyis sngon las ci zhig byas
176b6(mdo sde): nas/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug/ yi dgas mo smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron me mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi/
176b7(mdo sde): kyi rnams par lung ston par gyur te/ des thos nas sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu byin gyis bu/ bcom ldan 'das
176b8(mdo sde): ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la/ sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog
177a1(mdo sde): ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang / dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do// /
177a2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gsong por gsungs pa/ snyan par gsungs pa/ tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so// zhes gsungs pa/ sngar mdzum pa yin te der bcom ldan 'das
177a3(mdo sde): kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu'i sprin gyi bu tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa legs so// khyod bzod ga las 'ongs 'dam bu sbyin gyis bus gsol pa/
177a4(mdo sde): btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas kyis nang du mchis pa las/ slar mchis ste/ der bdag gis yi dgas mo gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra la/ lus khrag gis bshos la/ du khrod na 'dug pa bzhin
177a5(mdo sde): du keng rus kyis bkor ba/ zhig mthong legs so// yang gsol pa/ bdag ni nyin re zhing bu lnga btsas/ mtshan yang de bzhin lnga btsas ste/ btsas na de dag na zos na yang / 'grangs
177a6(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur zhes mchi na/ de'i mi'i 'jig rten du/ rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis pa/ de na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ 'jigs su rung ba myong bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'
177a7(mdo sde): stsal pa/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu yi dgas mo de ni/ sdig pa'i las byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnams par nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal legs so// 'dam bu'i sbyin
177a8(mdo sde): gyi bu 'o na legs par rab du nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// mdam bu sbyin bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer ba ra na si na/ tsheng dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs
177b1(mdo sde): spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yang shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyis bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig du rtse zhing dga'
177b2(mdo sde): la/ dga' 'gur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' 'gur spyod kyang / bu yang med bu mo yang med do// lag pa la skom tshugs bcas nas/ bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang /
177b3(mdo sde): bu yang med bu mo yang med pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og du ni bu med pa'i phyir/ ci bdog thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro// snyam ste sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas bu med
177b4(mdo sde): de bu 'dod pa'i phyir/ ku lang dang chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / rgya byin dang / tshangs pa la stsogs pa dang / lha'i khyed par gzhan dag yang dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga'
177b5(mdo sde): ra ba'i lha dang / nag 'tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang / chos mthun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang
177b6(mdo sde): ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs la/ 'jigs rten yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skyes par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i gtam yod mod kyi/ de yang de lta ma yin te/ gal te
177b7(mdo sde): gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skyes par 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los rgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du/ re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// yang na gnas gsum tshogs
177b8(mdo sde): pa las bu dang bu mo skyes par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhes na/ ba ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / mdus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di ga tsu
178a1(mdo sde): tshogs pa las/ bu dang bu mo skyes par 'gyur te/ de la mnyes par byas kyang / bu yang ma byung / bu mo yang ma byung nas/ de'i blo 'di lta bu zhig blangs nas/
178a2(mdo sde): rgyal bu yid par 'gyur lta srid dam snyam te/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// rtse zhing dga' la dga'
178a3(mdo sde): dgur spyod pa las/ phyi zhig na bu chags par gyur nas/ de dga' zhing 'gu la rab tu dgas nas/ khyim thab la sbran pa/ jo bo lags bdag la sras chags te/ bdag gi rum g.yas
178a4(mdo sde): logs na rten cing gnas pa lags na khye'u gyur pa nges kyi/ dgyid pa skyes du gsol/ zhes byas so// de yang dga' ches te ros stod ni bteg lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/
178a5(mdo sde): bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ongs ngo // bdag gi bu rung bar shog shig/ mi rung bar ma gyur cig/ bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog shig/ nor gsos
178a6(mdo sde): pa'i len phyir gsol bar shog shig/ bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog shig/ bdag cag 'das te/ shi ba'i 'og du yang bdag phyir mang yang rung / nyung yang rung ste/
178a7(mdo sde): sbyin pa dag byin la/ bsod nams dag byas nas/ de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'dir song shig ces yon sngo bar shog shig ces dga' ba'i tshigs brjod do//
178a8(mdo sde): de nas bu chags par rig nas/ bu'i rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir// khang bzang gi steng du nyams rangs su bzhag ste/ grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byed rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i
178b1(mdo sde): zas rnams dang / ha cang kha ba ma yin/ ha cang skyur bar ma yin rnams dang / ha cang lan tsa che ma yin pa dang / ha cang sngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams
178b2(mdo sde): dang / ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / khu ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tsa ba dang / dngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis stan cing do shal dang / sem mo dos
178b3(mdo sde): lus rnams par bklubs te/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal du rnams par rgyu ba bzhin du/ khri'i steng nas khri'i steng du rgya zhing / 'og gi sa bzhi la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi
178b4(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so// de nas chung ma snga ma des de bkur zhing ces par byed pa mthong nas/ pra dog skyes te bsam pa/ gal te 'di las bu btsas par gyur na
178b5(mdo sde): ni/ bdag la gnod par gyur gyis/ ci nas de'i thabs shig bya dgos so snyam mo// 'dod pa la yongs su snyan pa la ni/ sdig pa'i las mi bya ba'i bag ci yang med de/ mi sdug pa'i lA
178b6(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i g.yang sar kha ltas pa des/ yid ston du bcug nas gang thos pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa de'i bu phyil bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngal rlug pa'i ci byin no// de nas chung ma
178b7(mdo sde): phyi ma des nyes du thams cad sdus nas/ chung ma snga ma de zhal ce la bkug ste khyod kyi bdag yid ton du bcug nas/ mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin te/ des bdag gi bu 'phyil to zhes
178b8(mdo sde): byas so// de nas chung ma snga ma des nye du rnams kyis nang du mna' bor te/ gal te bdag gis khyod la ma mngal drug pa'i rtse byin par gyur na/ bdag yi dgas mor gyur te/ bu byung ngo /
179a1(mdo sde): cog za bar shog shig ces byas so// 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu ji snyam du sems tshong dpon gyi bu'i chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ yi dgas mo de yin te/ de sngon phra dog
179a2(mdo sde): byas pa des ni yi dgas mor skyes so// des rdzun byas te mna' bor ba'i las kyi rnams par smin pa des ni/ nyin mo dang mtshan me bu lnga lnga btsas par gyur to// 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu de bas na/
179a3(mdo sde): khyod kyis gang gi nyes pa spangs pa las rtson par byas te/ ci nas yi dgas me de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ de ltar 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu khyod kyis bslabs par bya'o// bcom
179a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la stsogs pa gzhan dag
179a5(mdo sde): yi kyang yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // bam po bcu gnyis pa//
179a6(mdo sde): sa khud zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang /
179a7(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur
179a8(mdo sde): sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing
179b1(mdo sde): shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na za' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes dang /
179b2(mdo sde): nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yangs pa can na/ spre'u brdzing gi 'dram gyi khang pa brtsogs pa'i gnas na brten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe yang pa can na grong khyer gyi 'obs
179b3(mdo sde): shig gi nang na yi dgas zas su sbyar ba za ba/ bor ba za ba/ ngar snams dang / gcing gyi 'tsho ba dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / phyi sa za la/ mi bzad pa dang rang bzhin gyi sdug pa/ lnga brgya
179b4(mdo sde): gnas so// yang smras pa skyugs pa za zhing bor ba za/ ngar snabs cig gis 'tsho dang / rnag khrag dang ni phyi sa za/ mi bzad rang bzhin sdug cing 'dug/ yangs pa can de na bram ze zhig
179b5(mdo sde): 'dug te/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig du rtse zhing dga' la/ dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags
179b6(mdo sde): nas/ de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to// de nas bram ze des/ mtshan mkhan rnams bkug ste/ dris na de dag na re/ 'di ni lton khye'u 'dug pa de'i mthu yin no zhes zer ro// re shig na de zla ba brgyad
179b7(mdo sde): dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ khyi'u mdog ngan cig/ lta na mi sdug la byad ngan pa/ lus mi tsang bas sgos pa/ dri nga ba zhig btsas so// de mchog du mi sdug mod kyang byams pa'i dbang gis
179b8(mdo sde): 'brel bas pa ma gnyis kyis gsos so// de mi tsang ba'i gnas rnams 'ab shig du dga' la/ phyag dar gyi bu po dang / phyis khung du skra 'bal zhing / khang mi cang ba 'jud nas/ de'i ming phyi sa
180a1(mdo sde): khung zhes byang nga bar gyur to// re shig na dpan tshun du khyam pa las 'od srungs rdzogs byed kyis mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di de lta bu'i gnas rnams
180a2(mdo sde): la dga' ba las na/ 'di ni gor ma chags par grub pa'i skye bu zhig yin gyis/ bdag gis 'dir rab du byung ngo snyam mo// des de rab du byang nas/ gcir bur khyam zhing 'dug la/ legs
180a3(mdo sde): par byed pa la yang gnas so// de nas 'khyam zhing song ba las/ yangs pa can gyis 'obs kyis nang nas/ yi dgas lnga brgya 'khod pa rnams mthong nas/ de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par
180a4(mdo sde): smin pa dang / 'bral bas grong khyer gyi 'obs de'i nang du song nas/ de dag dang lhan cig du 'dus zhing 'phred de/ dga' bar gyur nas grogs por gyur to// phyis re shig na khye'u phyis khung do//
180a5(mdo sde): zhig la 'brel te/ yangs pa can du song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyang grong khyer gyi 'obs der byon nas/ yi dgas de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skra skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
180a6(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byed bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas nas/ 'od mdom gang gi brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo
180a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag du bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed ces 'phongs yi dgas
180a8(mdo sde): mo smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag ni skom legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag sor lnga las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun lnga phab ste/ des yi dag
180b1(mdo sde): lnga brgya po de dag tshim par mdzad do// de nas de dag bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar te/ shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo
180b2(mdo sde): skyes nas ring por ma lon pa'i chos nyid kyis sems rnams pa gsum skyes par 'gyur to// gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas yi dgas las shi
180b3(mdo sde): 'phos pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das las sems dga' bar 'gyur ba/ de dag gis mthong do// de nas yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i
180b4(mdo sde): bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhan lon de/ bzod bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhan ma lon par bcom ldan 'das
180b5(mdo sde): la blta ba'i phyir dong ngo snyam mo// de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu/ rna cha gdub 'khor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / sem mo ngos brgyan pa/ nor bu rna tshogs
180b6(mdo sde): kyi spras pa'i spyod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig kaM las stsogs pa byug pa de rnams kyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta
180b7(mdo sde): dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man 'dar ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ khang pa skyegs pa'i gnas thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me to gi gtor te/
180b8(mdo sde): chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams
181a1(mdo sde): dang / rang bzhin thug su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te// de thos nas lha'i bu lnga brgyas/ 'jigs cho gas la
181a2(mdo sde): lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo thon po nyi shu/ ye shes rdo rje bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/ tshong pa khye bogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar
181a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / dpa'o g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar bzhin du/ 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldanas kyis 'dun du lhags pa'i 'byor pa nyid kyis bcom ldan
181a4(mdo sde): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ rang gis gnas su dong ngo // de nas khye'u phyi sa khung grong khyer kyis 'obs su 'bongs su 'ongs pa dang / yi dgas de dag mthong ngo // de nas tshol
181a5(mdo sde): ba la zhugs te/ de de dag yongs su tshol bas skyo bar gyur la/ de dag ni mi rnyed do// de'i bskabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni mi 'khyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtog
181a6(mdo sde): pa 'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jigs rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig dang ldan pa/ gcig
181a7(mdo sde): du dpa' ba zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsungs pa/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i
181a8(mdo sde): bzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi 'thil shin du bstan pa/ sdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi
181b1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa bzhi mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug
181b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas pa bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug
181b3(mdo sde): ba/ lam yan lag brgyad pa bston pa/ thar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu brgyas pa
181b4(mdo sde): brgya phrags bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang che khyed par du 'phags pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyi nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du/ sangs rgyas kyis spyan gyi 'jig rten la gzigs
181b5(mdo sde): te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni 'phongs shing sdug/ su ni nyamos nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni 'phongs pa dang / nyam nga ba dang / gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du bob/ su
181b6(mdo sde): ni ngan song du ltung / su ni ngan song nas phyung ste/ tho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhags par byas/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las/ lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags
181b7(mdo sde): pa'i nor bdun med pas/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bzhugs par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed par byas/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams skyed zin
181b8(mdo sde): pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa la 'jug go// 'dir smras pa// rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyis gnas/
182a1(mdo sde): dus rlabs yol ba la 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// bcom ldan 'das/ rig ska bu
182a2(mdo sde): phyi sa khung la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed snams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyi zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'du
182a3(mdo sde): gyi mdun du bdar nas/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re shig na mthar gyis bsod snyoms bskor de srad du gshegs na phyi sa khung yang phan tshun 'khor
182a4(mdo sde): khor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga na 'dong ngo // de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sums bcu rtsa gnyis kyi legs par brgyan pa/ dpe
182a5(mdo sde): byed bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od mdoms gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma steng bas lpags pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang
182a6(mdo sde): ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de'i mod la/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar byas so// de dga' skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs phyag 'tshal te/
182a7(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lag te/ sems can bdag cag lta bu yang / legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la/ rab tu byung ba mchis
182a8(mdo sde): te/ chud par 'gyur na/ bdag kyang rab du byung bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la
182b1(mdo sde): nyal ba mkhyen pas/ de shin du bskal ba dang ldan par thugs su chud nas/ phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
182b2(mdo sde): dge slong dag tshur shog tshangs par sprad pa skrod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba'i mod la/ skra dang kha bu ni bregs nas zhags bdun lon tsam du
182b3(mdo sde): gyur/ spyod lam ni rdzogs par brten nas/ lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par 'gyur/ lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par 'gyur to// 'dir smras pa de bzhin gsheg
182b4(mdo sde): pas chur shes bka' stsal pa/ de na mgo bregs lus la snrums sbar gyin/ sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos dgos nas/ mod pa dbang po rab du zhi ba gnas/ de nas bco
182b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de la/ yid la byed pa'i lung phogs ste/ des btson pa dang / grub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi rten par
182b6(mdo sde): rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par mthor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
182b7(mdo sde): spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lags 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems
182b8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ tsan ngan spangs pa lta bur gsol bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo lnga'i sbubs bcom par rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/
183a1(mdo sde): srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la brgyab kyi phyogs pa dang / dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa lha rnams kyis/ mchod cing brjod pa dang /
183a2(mdo sde): gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin na yang la dga' bar gyur nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di lta ste/
183a3(mdo sde): nga'i dge slong gi phyis khung 'di ni/ las ci bgyis na des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag phyis khung nyid kyis sngon
183a4(mdo sde): tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen thub pa dang ldan de dag dga' bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ongs pa'i las de dag byas shing skyugs pas na/ byi sa khung nyid kyis las
183a5(mdo sde): byas shing btsags pa de dag/ gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur//
183a6(mdo sde): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing btsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang /
183a7(mdo sde): skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// skal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshegs shing dus la ba bA na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//
183a8(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ skal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu che lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas reg pa dang / zhabs su
183b1(mdo sde): ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skye bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyis bston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya
183b2(mdo sde): ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan zhes bya ba na brten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang der khyim bdag cig gis gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/
183b3(mdo sde): der phyogs dang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge 'dun dag 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang gnas par sems so// gtsug lag khang de na/ so so'i skye bo'i dge slong zhig gnas te/ de yi
183b4(mdo sde): gnas la shin du ser sna che ba zhig ste/ dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa rnams mthong nas/ tshig pa za zhing 'khrug pa dang / gnod sems byed de/ zhul zhul phul 'dug cing / 'khrug pa skyed
183b5(mdo sde): par byed do// dge slong gang dag cug lag khang de nas gung du 'gro ba de dag mthong na ni/ shas cher dga' zhing mchog du dga' la skye la smra bar byed do// phyis re shigs na/ ga zhig gyi
183b6(mdo sde): yul nas/ dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig 'ongs so// gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de yang phyir mi 'ong ba yin te/ nges spyod lam gyi sgo nas/ de nas dga' ba skyes nas/ phyid nyin dge
183b7(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par tshogs dang ldan pa'i khrus dang / gshos spyan drangs so// dge slong bzhi po de na med pa las re shig na phyi na nyin cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus kyang phul ba shes
183b8(mdo sde): kyang bshams pa dang / dge slong bzhi pa de yang 'ongs te/ de yang chos ldan pa'i khrus sar song nas/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po khyed res su byung te/ dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa'i
184a1(mdo sde): byi dor byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas de phra dog skyes nas des/ sdang ba'i dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po las stsogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid
184a2(mdo sde): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rtog pa brjod pa brgyad pa las// // sdoms kyi tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa rdzogs so// /
184a3(mdo sde): sdoms ni sbrul nag dang ni bla ba dang // sa la dang ni dpal ldan ma// gos dang ni tso pho nya dang // ma he dang ni gso sbyong dang // ngang pa tha mar brjod pa yin// sbrul nag po zhes byas pa ni/
184a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams
184a5(mdo sde): dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas
184a6(mdo sde): bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing
184a7(mdo sde): shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bzung dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams rnyes
184a8(mdo sde): pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan 'da' ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na/ khyim
184b1(mdo sde): bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa/ zhig yod de de yang ser sna chen 'jungs pa/ yo byad rnams
184b2(mdo sde): kun tu 'dzin pa/ kha la yang gtor ma mi gter ba zhig te/ des dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa dang / bkren pa dag mthong nas/ sems sdang bar byed
184b3(mdo sde): do// de nas des rang gi skyed mos tshal du gser dngul gyi phung po sbas te gzhag nas/ de de la chags te/ lhag par zhen bzhin du shi'o// de shi nas de nyid kyi steng du sbrul nag po
184b4(mdo sde): chen po mi sdug pa zhig du skyes so// de nas skyed mos tshal der skyed po'i tshogs gang song ba de dag bstas pa tsam gyis gsod par byed do// rgyal po'i khab kyis grong khyer thog
184b5(mdo sde): thag du yang che ge mo'i skyed mo'i tshal du song ba de dag thams cad blag par 'gyur ro zhes skrag sgrags par 'gyur to// skye ba'i tshogs kyis kyang rgyal po gzugs can snying po la
184b6(mdo sde): gsol to// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyams du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs par/ de 'dul nus pa su zhig yod snyam mo// de nas rgyal
184b7(mdo sde): po gzugs can snying po skye bo mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig du
184b8(mdo sde): 'dug go// phyogs cig du 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la/ chos kyis gtam gyi yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/
185a1(mdo sde): yang dag par bzeng stong/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// chos kyis tam rnams grangs du mas yang dag par bsten/ yang dag par 'dzin du chud
185a2(mdo sde): yang dag par bzengs stod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/ cang mi gsungs par bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bstan las langs te/ bla
185a3(mdo sde): gos phrag pa cig du gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
185a4(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na/ skyed mos 'tshal ga ge mo zhig na sbrul bsdug pa/ sbrul nag mo chen po ma gdug pa zhig mchis te/ skye bo mang po
185a5(mdo sde): rlag par bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rtse ba'i slad du de gdul bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi
185a6(mdo sde): gsungs par snang ngo // de nas bcom 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ snga dro shams thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed snams nas/ skye mos tshal
185a7(mdo sde): ga la ba der gshegs byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gser gyi kha dog can/ nyi ma stong gi 'od bas lhag pa dag bkye ste/ de dag gis skyed mos 'tshal de dag
185a8(mdo sde): thams cad snang bar byas so// bskal pa stong gis bar du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag du rab tu
185b1(mdo sde): sim par gyur to// de nas sbrul gdug pa des phan tshun du sbas te/ su'i mthus bdag gi lus sim par gyur cig gu snyam pa dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku
185b2(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gsum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byed bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong
185b3(mdo sde): bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri 'o 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag du des bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i sems skyes de/ dang ba'i
185b4(mdo sde): sems dang ldan par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das pa'i chos bstan te/ bzhin bzangs khyod nyid kyis/ rdzas 'di sgrubs pa des na khyod sbrul gdug par ltung bar byas so// /
185b5(mdo sde): de yang nga la dad pa'i sems skyed la/ gter 'di la yang sems chags par ma byas na legs so// 'di nas shis 'phos nas sems can dmyal bar skye ba re/ de nas gang gi
185b6(mdo sde): tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis// de'i tshe rabs dran par mdzad pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror
185b7(mdo sde): skyes pa la// da ni nga'i ci byar med// mi khom par ni skye zin gis// don med dus pas ci la phan// 'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can// nga la dang pa'i sems skyed la// dud
185b8(mdo sde): 'gro skyes gnas spangs na legs// 'on kyang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas re shig na/ bcom ldan 'das sbrul de lhung bzed kyis nang du bcug ste 'od ma'i tshal du
186a1(mdo sde): snoms so// de'i skabs su rgyal po dang / yul ma ga ti'i skye bo'i mchogs kyis/ sbrul gdug pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btul ba thos so//
186a2(mdo sde): nas sbrul gdug pa des rang gis lus la smad de/ kha 'tshos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so//
186a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring por ma lon pa ni/ chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shis 'phos gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo//
186a4(mdo sde): de nas sbrul gdug pa las shis 'phos te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par de mthong ngo // de nas sngon
186a5(mdo sde): sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di skams du sems te/ bdag zhan lon nas/ bzod bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gis cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon
186a6(mdo sde): ber bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir 'gro'o skam mo// de nas sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu/ rna cha gdub bkor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo ngos brgyan pa/
186a7(mdo sde): nor bu sna tshogs kyi spras pa'i bcod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka las stsogs pas byugs pa des/ de'i nyid kyi mtshan mo// lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /
186a8(mdo sde): ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma bkar po dang / man 'da' ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan 'da' ka' gnas pa na thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan
186b1(mdo sde): 'das la me tor gi gtor te chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus/ 'jigs tshogs la lta
186b2(mdo sde): ba'i ri'i rtse mo thon po nyi shu/ ye shes rdo rje bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshigs du brjod pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/
186b3(mdo sde): bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i bsgral ba dang / rgyal pos ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams pa phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi
186b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi chung ma
186b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin du rnams dag khyod la rten nas thob/ bdag
186b6(mdo sde): ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i 'og 'phags thob/ mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong
186b7(mdo sde): bar bka' ba'i// thub pa brgyad ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thul la ni skor bar byas nas/
186b8(mdo sde): kyang // lha'i 'jig rten pa ltas lha'i yul song // de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de/ tshong ba khye bogs phyin pa dang shing ba 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dab 'o g.yul las
187a1(mdo sde): rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du/ 'byor pa gang gi bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ mtshan mo rgyal po gzug
187a2(mdo sde): can snying po'i thad du song nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas ste/ khyod su shig ces dris so// de na re bdag ni skyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das kyis/
187a3(mdo sde): sbrul gdug pa btul te shi nas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang por skyes pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la yang bdag gis snyen bkur byas nas/ bden pa mthong bar gyur
187a4(mdo sde): to// de bdag gis khyod la bstan gyis/ khyod la song la skyes mos chal de'i phyogs go ge mo zhig nas gter chen po phyung la bdag gi phyir/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bcas
187a5(mdo sde): pa bshos gsol te/ yon gyis rabs kyang gdon par gsol cig/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ lha'i bu la cang mi gsungs par khas blangs so// de nas sngon sprul pa/
187a6(mdo sde): gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus rgyal pos cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig na/ de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ de nyid mtshan mo//
187a7(mdo sde): yul ma ga ting pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams la/ sgo nas skyed mos tshal der song nas/ gter phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar
187a8(mdo sde): bshos gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i las gang dag bgyis na/ des sbrul gdug par skyes la/ las gang
187b1(mdo sde): dag bgyis na/ des lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des shas cher chags pa skyed de/ des dge sbyong dang bram ze
187b2(mdo sde): dang / bsngags cing 'phongs dang / bkren pa rnams la sdang sems skyed pa des ni/ sbrul gdug par skyes so// nga la sems dad par gyur pa des ni lha'i nang du skyes so// yang dag
187b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring la dge snyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang / bslab pa'i bzhi blangs pa de na bden pa mthong bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po de bas na
187b4(mdo sde): ser snang spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ ci nas sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de nyid lha'i bur gyur nas/ yon tan gyi tshogs de dag
187b5(mdo sde): de lta bur 'gyur bar rgyal po khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// rjes su yid rangs
187b6(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // zla ba zhes bya ba ni// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang /
187b7(mdo sde): blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyis mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams
187b8(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkun sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang
188a1(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
188a2(mdo sde): 'das/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ nam za' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas
188a3(mdo sde): pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ bram ze zhig 'dug pa des/ rigs mnyam
188a4(mdo sde): pa las chung ma blangs nas/ khye'u de de lhan cig du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba rgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang
188a5(mdo sde): zhing mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/ skye bo thams cad mig sim par byed par byed pa zhig btsas so// de yang brams ze de dga' rnyed pa yin te/ de la bu dang bu mo gzhan yang med nas/ de skyed
188a6(mdo sde): bsrings te/ cher skyes nas 'jig rten thams cad la sim par bya ba'i phyir bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis khye'u de'i ming zla ba zhes btags so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u zla ba grong
188a7(mdo sde): khyer thams cad du ba rgyug nas/ bskor bas bram ze de la yang khyi'u de la lhag par gyur te// 'chag pa dang 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dag gi tshe yang rtag du legs par bsrungs bu lhur byed
188a8(mdo sde): cing 'dug cing 'dug go// bram ze de'i khyim yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nye ba zhig na 'dug go// de nas bram ze'i khye'u khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang rten nas/ rgyal du
188a9(mdo sde): de rtse zhig dka' la dga' dgur spyod pa/
188b1(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed do// de yang tshe thung ste/ shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lhar skyes so yul
188b2(mdo sde): bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring por ma lon par ni/ chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skyes par 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes/ las gang gis
188b3(mdo sde): skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha las yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo //
188b4(mdo sde): de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par
188b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das lta ba'i phyir/ 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams rna cha gdub dkor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/
188b6(mdo sde): nor bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i bcod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma li'i lo ma dang / spri ka las stsogs pas byugs pa/ de de nyid kyi mtshan mo'i// lha'i me tog ud pa la
188b7(mdo sde): dang / pad ma dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man 'da' ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me
188b8(mdo sde): tog gis gtor te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal
189a1(mdo sde): ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston te/ de thos nas sngon bram zer gyur
189a2(mdo sde): ba'i lha'i bus 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo 'thon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ nges bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan
189a3(mdo sde): gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i lnga las sgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris nga
189a4(mdo sde): thar pa'i rgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag gi phas kyang ma gyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma
189a5(mdo sde): bgyis/ nang gi mi dang gnyen rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi btsun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ legs so// yang smras pa/
189a6(mdo sde): nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin du mi zad khyod kyi mthu'i bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring
189a7(mdo sde): nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin du rnams ngag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phangs thob// mi mchog dbang
189a8(mdo sde): po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ srid pa stong du mthong ba bka' ba yi/ thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga'
189b1(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ btud cing zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ dgra thul pa ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha'i 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu/
189b2(mdo sde): des tshong pa khye begs phyin pa dang / zhing par 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa'o g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad las thar bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ong
189b3(mdo sde): pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rangs gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar rtson par lhur len te/ de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung
189b4(mdo sde): ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ma dang gsum mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/
189b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la lta ba'i phyir/ 'ongs pa yin lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po rgya byi
189b6(mdo sde): nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la lta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyis/ bram ze'i bu cig pa tshe thung ste shi nas/ des nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul
189b7(mdo sde): bzang por skyes nas/ de ma dang gsum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bston nas/ bden pa mthong bar 'gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // de'i bskabs su bram ze de'i bu cing
189b8(mdo sde): pa sdug cing 'phongs pa/ snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa/ mi mthun pa med pa de du khrod du khyer nas/ pang bar bzhags ste/ kyi hud bu kyi hud bu cig pa zhes
190a1(mdo sde): zer zhing 'bod do// de'i nye du rnams kyis de ltar bcugs kyang bslang ma nus nas/ da khA dang chun lag dang / brgod dang / wa rnams kyis ni bskor/ bud med
190a2(mdo sde): skra bshig pa dag dang ni 'grogs// skye bo mang po ni lta zhing 'dug go/ de nas lha'i bu lhar skyes pas/ pha smre sngags 'don pa mthong nas/ snying rjes snying po bskyed de/ pha'i mya ngan
190a3(mdo sde): bsal ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid drang srong che lugs su sprul nas/ du khrod kyi 'dab su dka' thub lnga mdzad cing 'dug go// de nas bram ze des drang srong de la dris pa/ kye drang srong chen po
190a4(mdo sde): khyod dka' thub 'dis ci zhig bsgrub/ drang srong gis smras pa/ da ni rgyal srid bsgrub ste/ de'i gser gyi shing rta rin po che rna tshogs kyis spras pa nyi ma dang / zla ba gnyis kyis shing rta'i 'khor lo
190a5(mdo sde): byas nas/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni 'dug nas 'dren te/ shing rta de la nga zhon zhing sa chen po 'di bskor nar 'dod te// bram ze smras pa/ gal te lo brgya thams pa'i bar du rgyun du dka' thub sbyar
190a6(mdo sde): byas te/ dka' thub chog gi sbrang byas kyang / gnas de khyod kyis ri mi 'thob/ drang srong gi smras pa/ khyod kyang shi ba'i khog pa mchog du 'dam zhing / mi tsang ba'i shing 'dra bar gyur pa 'dis/
190a7(mdo sde): zhig bsgrub/ bram zes smras pa/ sdug pa'i bu cig pa shing ste bsgrub po// drang srong gi smras pa/ gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar du rgyun du du ba'i las byas kyang / bu de khyod kyi ma'i thob/ khyod ni
190a8(mdo sde): dus kyang ci la phan/ de nas bram ze ded drang srong gi tshig bden no snyam nas dang pa skyes so// dad pa skyes nas/ khyod su zhig ces byas so// de nas drang srong gi cha lugs de mi snang bar gyur nas/ rang
190b1(mdo sde): gi cha lugs su 'dug ste/ pha la smras pa/ bdag ni khyod kyis bu cig pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas/ shi te sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul lha yul bzang por
190b2(mdo sde): skyes nas/ khyod kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir/ 'dir 'ongs so// yab khyod tshur spyon bcom ldan 'das la bskyabs su gsol nas khyod kyang 'khor ba las 'da' bar gyur yang srid de// de nas
190b3(mdo sde): bram ze nges sha'i ros bu bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'du
190b4(mdo sde): go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu bstan par mdzad de/ de thos nas bram ze des 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse ma thon po nyi shu
190b5(mdo sde): ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po// des mthong bar 'gyur ba thob cing rnyed nas thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum
190b6(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas song ngo // de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad spyod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'dis 'di ltar pha'i mya
