190b7(mdo sde): ngan bsal nas/ bden pa mthong ba la yang dag gzhag pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar 'dis bden pa mthong nas pa yongs su bskyabs pa
190b8(mdo sde): 'di ltar nga la ngo mtshar che yod/ 'dis ni 'das pa'i dus na so so'i skye bor 'dug pa'i tshe yang / pha gsad pa la thug pa yang lan gsum bskyab byas te/ de legs par du nyon la yi
191a1(mdo sde): la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// dge slong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer ba ra na sen/ gzhan gyi chung ma la spyi byed pa zhig yod de/ de'i bu ni dad pa dang
191a2(mdo sde): ldan pa/ dge zhig bsam pa bzang ba/ mi rnams shin du'ang drang ba zhig go// de nas re shig na/ de'i pha rkun mo byas nas/ rgyal pos gshed ma rnams la so cig ces bsgo'o// de nas len
191a3(mdo sde): gsum gyi bar du rgyal po la gsol nas srog 'phangs pa byin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gzhan gyi chung ma la byid
191a4(mdo sde): byed byed pa de ni bram ze 'di yin no// byi byed pa'i bu de ni bram ze 'di yin no// dge slong rnams kyi gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das las ci zhig bgyis na/ nges pha dang bu gnyis gang bden pa
191a5(mdo sde): mthong bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs gi ring la/ gnyi ga dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang /
191a6(mdo sde): bslab pa'i bzhi blangs pas na de'i phyir da ltar bden pa mthong bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bas na 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / mya ngan las
191a7(mdo sde): 'das pa ni zhi ba'o// snyam du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bad par byas te/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag
191a8(mdo sde): dang lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po las stsogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la mngon par bstod do//
191b1(mdo sde): sa la zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams pa
191b2(mdo sde): tshongs dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lte//
191b3(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto la
191b4(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyan gsos dang /
191b5(mdo sde): sman zong rnams rnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
191b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe mnyan du yod par sa le'i mchog pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus nas/ shing sa le'i me tog blangs te rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spong
191b7(mdo sde): do// de nas re shig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis sa le'i me tog blangs te/ mnyan du yod pa'i nang du song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs kyi zham ring byas te/
191b8(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bad nas/ nyan du yod par bsod snyoms mdzad de/ slar gshegs nas/ bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
192a1(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byed bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od
192a2(mdo sde): mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la sa li'i me tog gi gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
192a3(mdo sde): la bskor ba byas nas/ phyir logs nas khyim du dgos pa'i phyir yang / gzhan yang blang ngo snyam pa dang / re shig na de sa la'i shing la mdzegs las lhung ste shi nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
192a4(mdo sde): snyen bkur byas pas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lhar skyes so// de nas re shig na nga lus dang gzhal med khang sa le'i me tog gis brgyan te/ lha'i mdun sa'i nang du song ngo // de'i tshe lci
192a5(mdo sde): dbang po rgya byin yang lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang lha'i tshogs kyis nang na/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la sngags pa brjod cing 'dug pa las/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis/ lha
192a6(mdo sde): bu mo lus dang gzhal med khang sa le'i me tog gis brgyan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis lus mdog da
192a7(mdo sde): pa'i gser 'dra/ pad ma ud pa la ltar gyur/ 'di la lus dpal tshungs med khyod kyi las 'od byung de dag ci las gyur/ ci'i phyir na/ khyod kyi gzhin 'dog pad ma rgyad 'dra ga ser 'dog
192a8(mdo sde): lta bur gyur/ las rnams gang gis 'bras bu lhong 'gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smos/ lha mos smras pa/ mtshan mchog dag gis brgyan pa'i// mi'i nyi ma nyan thos bcad// sa
192b1(mdo sde): lo'i me tog rdul med pa// bzang po dag gi legs par gtor// las dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir// bdag la lhag par mngon du mdzes// bzhin 'dog pad ma zla ba ltar// rnam dag 'od
192b2(mdo sde): ldan lta na sdug/ rgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi bzhin// nyes pa thams cad rnams spangs pa// mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir// de la khyod kyis sa bon btab// bzhin ma
192b3(mdo sde): pad ma'i mdab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma/ bud med mchog rnams deng ni/ gang la bkur sti byas pa'i// sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i// 'dabs yang 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba
192b4(mdo sde): gser 'chog phung po lta bur 'dangs bkar de las su mi mchod/ lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring por ma lon par ni chos nyid kyi sems rnams pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas
192b5(mdo sde): shi 'phos gang du skyes/ las gang gi skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar
192b6(mdo sde): gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas lha'i bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhan lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'dro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhan ma lon
192b7(mdo sde): par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o// skam mo// de nas lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub bkor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin chen
192b8(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i bcod pan can/ lus gur dgum dang / ta sa la'i lo ma dang / s+thi ka las stsogs pas byugs pa de/ lba'i bu mo 'bum thag du mas g.yog byas nas/
193a1(mdo sde): de nyid kyi mtshan po sa le'i me tog gi bzhal med khang de nyid dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gi
193a2(mdo sde): gtor te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang
193a3(mdo sde): bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i de lta bu'i chos bstan de de thos nas lha'i bu mo des 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo thon po nyi shu
193a4(mdo sde): ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/ bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshigs lan gsum brjod nas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdag gi khrag
193a5(mdo sde): dang 'chi ma'i rgya mtsho skam pa dang / rus pa'i ri la sgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / tho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyis nang du bzhags
193a6(mdo sde): pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang mas kyang ma gnang / rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi gnyen gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyis mchun
193a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin du mi zad khyod kyi sa mthu
193a8(mdo sde): yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gi thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin du rnams dag khyod la
193b1(mdo sde): bstan nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dges pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phangs thob/ mi mchog dbang po mi dang lha'i mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad
193b2(mdo sde): pa spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dga' ba'i// thub pa khyod ni der mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' 'gyur te// gtud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal
193b3(mdo sde): te/ dgra thub la ni skor bas byas nas kyang // lha'i 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / de nas lha'i bu mo tshong ba khye srog phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa'o g.yu
193b4(mdo sde): las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa bzhin du gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge
193b5(mdo sde): slong dag srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar rtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du 'od chen po byung ngo // de mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ sangs rgyas
193b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ma dang gsum mi 'jed kyis bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das
193b7(mdo sde): la lta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhid la blta ba'i phyir
193b8(mdo sde): 'ongs pa yin no// bu mo gang gi las kar me tog gis gtor ba de khyod mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// do na nga la sems dga' ba skyes nas shi ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i/
194a1(mdo sde): lha yul bzang por skyes so// de nga'i thad du 'ongs nas ngas de la chos bsten te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur nas/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag de bas
194a2(mdo sde): na 'di ltar bslab par byas te/ ston pa la bkur sti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// ston pa la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas nas
194a3(mdo sde): bstan te gnas par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
194a4(mdo sde): bam po bcu gsum pa// dpa ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas com ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang /
194a5(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha
194a6(mdo sde): ldeng rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
194a7(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim
194a8(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od mi 'tshal bya ka lan 'dar ka gnas pa na brten cing
194b1(mdo sde): bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi
194b2(mdo sde): mang po gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug zhi ba dang / chom rkan dang mu khe dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang
194b3(mdo sde): dang / ma he dang ldan pa 'dug te/ gnod pa med la tsher ma bkrugs la/ bu cig pa la bya bzhin du rgyal srid sbyangs so// de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan
194b4(mdo sde): 'das las bde ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ btsun mo 'khor dang bcas te/ dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi zad du 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po// phyi zhig na sgyid kyis dus
194b5(mdo sde): la bab pa'i tshe/ shing ljon pa rnams las me tog rgyas pa/ dang pa dang khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne rtso dang / re skyegs dang / khu byag dang / shang shang de'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nag khrod
194b6(mdo sde): dang bskyed mos 'tshal gyi sar/ btsun mo dam pa dang / btsun pa mo 'khor dang bcas te/ dong nas der btsun mo'i 'khor gyi rgyal po la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchi' mi'i
194b7(mdo sde): rngo mi thog na/ lha btsun me'i 'khor gyi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbus skra dang / sen mo'i mchod brten brtsigs te zhal sro bar ci snang / 'on tam bdag cag gis de la rgyun du mar me
194b8(mdo sde): dang bdug pa dang me tog dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gis bkur sti bgyi'o zhes gsol to// de nas re shig na/ rgyal po gzugs can
195a1(mdo sde): snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la dbus skra dang / sem mo sprul du gsol/ 'on kyang bdag gis mchis po brang
195a2(mdo sde): 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod brten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar bgyi'o zhes gsol to// de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das kyis dbus ska dang sen mo nas/ rgyal
195a3(mdo sde): po gzugs can snying po btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbus skra dang / sen mos mchod brten rtsigs te/ zhal bsros nas de
195a4(mdo sde): la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis kyang mchod par
195a5(mdo sde): byed do// des gang gis rgyal po ma skyes dgra lha byin gyis sprad de/ yab chos dang ldan pa chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa de gsad nas rang rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan
195a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bstan pa la/ sbyin par bya ba'i chos thams cad de su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bkur sti ma byed ces khrims kyang bcas so// de nas gang gi tshe tshes
195a7(mdo sde): co lnga la skabs 'byed pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe/ dbus skra dang sem mo'i mchod rten de la su yang phyag dar byed pa 'am/ mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog 'bul ba med do// de
195a8(mdo sde): nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dbus skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten de de lta bur gyur pa yang mthong // rgyal po gzugs can snying po yang dran nas/ snying rje rjes skad du ngu zhing / kyi hud chos dang /
195b1(mdo sde): ldan pa'i rgyal po dang bral bas/ bdag cag bsod nams las 'gribs so// zhes mdzer to// de'i nang nas bcu na mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba des/ rang gi srog dang sngos te sangs rgya
195b2(mdo sde): kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dbus skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la phyag dar byas te/ mar me'i 'phreng ba mngar ro// de nas re shig na rgyal po ma skyes dgra khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du
195b3(mdo sde): byung te snang ba chen po de mthong nas/ 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang / re shig na gzhan gzhig gis/ dpal ldan mas dbus skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i 'phreng dmar ba lags
195b4(mdo sde): so// zhes byas so// de nas dpal ldan ma bkug te/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis rgyal po'i bka' cag ces smras nas/ bdag gi khyod kyi bka' bcag du lags kyang bdag gis chos dang ldan
195b5(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i bka' cag go zhes zer ro// de nas khros te 'khor lo 'bangs nas bsad do// de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas shis nas sum
195b6(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// de'i tshe 'dun mi zhig kyang 'dus nas/ lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma/ lha'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba 'khor khor yug du/ dpag tshad
195b7(mdo sde): gcig yod pa dang ldan pa de lha'i nang du song ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis snang ba chen po de dang / lha'i 'od dpag tshad gcig mthong nas/ dris pa ci'i phyir khyod kyis lus 'das
195b8(mdo sde): gser 'dra pad ma ud pa la ltar gyur/ 'di na su zhig lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyis lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur/ ci'i phyir na khyod kyis bzhin 'dog pad ma rgyas
196a1(mdo sde): 'dra gser 'dog lta bur gyur// las rnams gang gi 'bras bu myong 'gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smros// lha mos smras pa/ 'jig rten gsum mgon
196a2(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i sgron cig pa// mtshan mchog rnams kyi phyug pa'i sangs rgyas mthong // smra mchog nyon mongs mun pa sel ba la// mun pa sel ba'i mar me yon du phul// zla ba'i 'od zer mdog
196a3(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba'i 'od// mthong nas thub pa'i snying nas dad pa bskyed// 'od zer mthong nas dga' bar gyur pa yis// ston pa smra ba'i mchog la phyag kyang bgyis// las dge de 'dra byas pa'i
196a4(mdo sde): phyir// bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes// bzhin mdog pad ma zla ba ltar// rnam dag 'od ldan bstan sdug/ brgya byin gyi smras pa// kye ma yon tan nyid kyi bzhi/ nyes pa thams cad rnam
196a5(mdo sde): spangs pa// mtho ris bsdug par skyes pa'i phyir// de la khyod kyis sa bon btab// bzhin mdzes pad mi'i 'dam ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma/ bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang
196a6(mdo sde): la bkur sti byas pas ni/ sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dam yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba// gser mchog phung po lta bur 'dangs kar de la su mi mchod/ lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes
196a7(mdo sde): nas/ ring por ma lon par ni chos nyid kyi sems rnam pa gsum skyes par gyur te/ gang nas shi 'bos gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum
196a8(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa mthong ngo // de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag
196b1(mdo sde): lon nas bcom ldan 'das lta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gis cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma
196b2(mdo sde): lha'i 'od kyis snang bas gang ba des/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / bad ma dkar po dang / man 'da' ra ba dang / rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/
196b3(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan 'da' ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar
196b4(mdo sde): 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par
196b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i chos bstan nas/ de thos nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan mas/ 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo thon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rje bcom nas/ rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden
196b6(mdo sde): pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho skams pa dang / rus pa'i lnga las bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo
196b7(mdo sde): rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gzhag pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang
196b8(mdo sde): ma gyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mchun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dag bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma
197a1(mdo sde): mi mchog dbang po mi dang las mchod pa/
197a2(mdo sde): bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa ngan song lam// shin du zad khyod kyis mthu yi bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ mya nga
197a3(mdo sde): 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin du rnam dag khyod la rten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes
197a4(mdo sde): ba'i zhi ba'i dgo 'phangs thob// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar rga ba yis// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur
197a5(mdo sde): te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal te// bitad cing zhabs gnyis la na phyag 'tshal te// dgra thub pa'i skor ba byas nas kyang // lha'i 'jig rten kha ltas yul song // de
197a6(mdo sde): nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan mas// tshong pa khye bogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa'o g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las rgyal bzhin du/ 'byor pa gang
197a7(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ rangs kyi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag tho rangs mi nyal bar rtson pa lhar byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan
197a8(mdo sde): 'das kyis thad du snang ba chen po 'byung bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi 'jed kyis
197a9(mdo sde): bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir mchos lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi
197b1(mdo sde): 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la lta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dpal ldan ma
197b2(mdo sde): zhes bya bas/ rang gis srog dang sngos te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjes su dran nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbus ska dang / sen me'i mchod rten la mar me'i 'phreng ba dngar nas/ rgyal
197b3(mdo sde): po ma skyes dgra 'khros nas bsad de/ de nga la dga' ba'i sems skyed nas shi ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de ma dang gsum nga'i thad du 'ongs ste/ ngas
197b4(mdo sde): de la chos bstan te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur nas/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur sti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya/
197b5(mdo sde): mchod par bya'o// ston pa la bkur sti byas// bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas nas/ brten te gnas par bya'o// zhes dge slong khyed kyi de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan
197b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung ba la mngon par bstod do// // gos shes bya ba ni// /
197b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / dede dpon rnams
197b8(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/
198a1(mdo sde): bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
198a2(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bzla dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnam
198a3(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas gang gi tshe khyim par/
198a4(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sangs rgyas las stsogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal des/ thar gyi gser bye ba phrag brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la phul nas/ de'i
198a5(mdo sde): tshe de'i blo skyes pa/ ma la bdag sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa/ 'di lta la ngo mtshar ci yod kyis/ bdag gi skye bo dbul po sa la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ mnyan du yod pa na/
198a6(mdo sde): gnas skye bo rnams dad pas bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bkur sti bya'o// de ltar byas pa dang bdag gi skyes po mang po la phan gdags par 'gyur la/
198a7(mdo sde): bsod nams mang po yang skyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ji ltar bsam pa de rgyal pos kyang mnyan du yod pa thams cad du dril sgrags s+ho// mnyan du
198a8(mdo sde): yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyis mi nyon cig ding nas zhag bdun na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir/ glang po che la zhon te/ de bzhin gsheg
198b1(mdo sde): pa'i nyan thos rnams byir dad pas sdud pa la zhugs te/ der gang dag la ji tsam bdog pa de tsam sbyin par byed de/ kha cig ni mgul gyi ngo sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gdub bu sbyin par byed/ kha
198b2(mdo sde): cig ni dpung rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser gyi 'phreng ba sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni sor ba dub gyi rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni mu tig gi do shal sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser sbyin par
198b3(mdo sde): byed/ kha cig ni dngul sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser tha na zho'i brgya ca tsam yang sbyin par byed do// khyim bdag de yang gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ len par byed do// de nas re shig na bu med
198b4(mdo sde): shin du dbul mo zhig gi sha thang ste zla ba gsum gyis ras yug cig rnyed nas/ des ras de gyon te srang du bzhugs pa dang / des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dung 'bud cing / rnga zlum rdung zhing
198b5(mdo sde): du rgyang nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ des dge snyen zhig la dris pa/ ji te khyim bdag 'di/ phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba te/ gter sa'i 'og du sbas pa rnams kyang mthong na/ ci'i phyir gal
198b6(mdo sde): gyi phyin nas slong zhing skor bar byed ces byas pa dang / dge bsnyen de na re/ gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ bshos gso
198b7(mdo sde): mi nus pa de dag gi don du phan 'dogs par byed de/ ci nas nas mang po spongs te/ bcom ldan 'das la dbul du 'jug go zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo de'i blo skyes pa 'o na bdag gi bsod
198b8(mdo sde): nams ma byas pa yin la/ bdag gcig pus bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ bshos gsol ba'i 'bru ba dag la med kyi/ bdag gi 'di la cung zad dbul bar
199a1(mdo sde): bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas bdag nyid la ci bdog ces bltas nas/ ras yug cig ma togs pa gzhan ci yang ma mthong ste/ des bsams pa/ gal te
199a2(mdo sde): gdag 'di na 'dug bzhin du ras 'di phul na ni/ bdag gcer bur byung gi/ bdag khang thog du song la ras yug dor ro snyam mo// de nas khang thog du song nas rang gi lus las ras bud
199a3(mdo sde): dekhyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi steng du bor ba dang / khyim bdag des kyang 'phrigs te/ 'dis khang thog nas bor ba las na 'di la nor 'di las med gor ma chag snyam nas/
199a4(mdo sde): rang gi g.yog rnams la sgo ba/ khyed deng 'dir ras 'di sus dor ba ltos shig ces byas te/ de dag gi ltas pa dang / re shig na bud med de tsog pur 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas de dag gi
199a5(mdo sde): dris pa dang / de na re bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan brjod pa bdag gis thos nas dbul ba'i 'jigs pas skrag ste/ bdag gi gos rnyed pa de/ de bzhin gash+ye pa las stsogs pa dge slong
199a6(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun la phul lo zhes zer ro// de nas de dag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mchog du ngo mar du gyur nas/ bu mo de la gos dang / brgyan snum pa rna tshogs skon to// de
199a7(mdo sde): nas de che thung nas shis nas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ skyes ma thag du lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gzhan su la yang med pa de lta bu'i gos dag de las byung ngo //
199a8(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni/ chos nyid kyi sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur to// gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi
199b1(mdo sde): las shi 'phos pa dang / lus do shal dang / sen mo ngos rgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i gcod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spri ka las stsog
199b2(mdo sde): pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo// lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man 'dab ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi/
199b3(mdo sde): tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das
199b4(mdo sde): kyis sngon ras 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan
199b5(mdo sde): ste/ de thos nas ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mos/ 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo thon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/ des bden pa
199b6(mdo sde): mthong nas dga' ba'i tshigs lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdag gi khrag dang 'chi mi'i rgya mtsho skams dang / rus pa'i sa las bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo
199b7(mdo sde): rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams 'byed pa dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhags pa 'di lta bu/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal
199b8(mdo sde): po kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mchun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram zes rnams kyis kyang
200a1(mdo sde): ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa ngan song lam// shin du mi zad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris
200a2(mdo sde): 'gro ba 'phye/ mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang dag gi thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin du rnam dag khyod la rten nas thob// bdag gi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/
200a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i 'gyes pa zhi ba'i 'phangs thob// mi mchog dbang po lha dang mi mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar bka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni
200a4(mdo sde): deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' 'gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thul la ni skor ba byas nas kyang // lha'i 'jigs rten kha ltas
200a5(mdo sde): yul song // de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bu mo de// tshong pa khye bogs byin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa'o g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar
200a6(mdo sde): ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gi bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci
200a7(mdo sde): lags 'dang gsum mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la lta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyis/ ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bud med des khyim
200a8(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang bas bsdud pa la ras bul nas shi ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de ma dang gsum nga'i thang du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan
200b1(mdo sde): nas bden pa mthong bar gyur nas/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na/ 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge slong rnams la bkur ti bya'o// bkur
200b2(mdo sde): ti med par mi bya'o// zhes dge slong khyed kyi de ltar bslab par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
200b3(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do// // ne rtso zhes bya ba ni// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po
200b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyis mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding
200b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
200b6(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams phung po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang /
200b7(mdo sde): gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyed pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
200b8(mdo sde): ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye
201a1(mdo sde): bo mang po dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / brtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang /
201a2(mdo sde): 'bras sa dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang ma he dang ldan pa 'dug te/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid sbyangs so// rgyal po de yang
201a3(mdo sde): dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge zhing bsams pa bzang la/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig
201a4(mdo sde): go// de nas re shig na/ bcom ldan 'das mthong bar smon te/ lag pa skom tshugs bcas nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad
201a5(mdo sde): du thugs ngan mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas bcom ldan 'das ring zhig ma mthong ngo // nga ni bcom ldan 'das dang bde bar gshegs pa ring zhig ma mthong ngo // nga ni bcom ldan
201a6(mdo sde): 'das mthong bar 'dod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa la bzhugs pas/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos smon pa
201a7(mdo sde): gsan to// de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni/ mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtogs pa 'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med// sangs
201a8(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan pa'i don du zhugs pa/ srung ba cig dang ldan gcig du dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas
201b1(mdo sde): dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i bzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/
201b2(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi 'thil shin du rten pa/ brngu ba'i sngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi seng
201b3(mdo sde): ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ yan lags lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa/
201b4(mdo sde): rtag du gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gi phyug pa lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
201b5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang / phyogs bcur grags pas rab du rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pas kyang phyes khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis
201b6(mdo sde): nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyis spyan gyi 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga bar 'gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang
201b7(mdo sde): ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang / gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang / thar pa dang 'bras bu la
201b8(mdo sde): gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug gis dbang du bzhu
202a1(mdo sde): par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma skyed pa las skyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams skyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin
202a2(mdo sde): zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa la 'jug go/ 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyis gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul
202a3(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i sras rnams las// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ g.yar zla ba gsum
202a4(mdo sde): 'das nas chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed snams nas/ ljongs rgyu zhing mthar gyi gshegs pa las/ nags khrod gcig du byon pa dang
202a5(mdo sde): nags khrod de na ne rtso mis skad shes pa gcig gnas te/ snying bzed bsnams nas/ des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo // de nas shing du ring bar song ste/ bcom
202a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so legs so// gdag la phan gdags su gsol/ nags khrod 'di nar
202a7(mdo sde): gshegs dgongs gdab par gsol zhes byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ni rtso de la phan gdags pa'i phyir gshegs gang la ne rtso gnas pa de'i drung du rtsa'i gdan gting nas/
202a8(mdo sde): dkyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs so// nyan thos chen po rnams ni/ shing gzhan dag gis drung du 'khod do// de nas ne rtsos bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la/ mi 'am mi ma
202b1(mdo sde): yin pa 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ ri dgas sam/ gcan zan gnod pa byed du dogs te/ mtshan thog thag nas nags khrod de phan tshun du skor bar byed do// de nas nam langs pa
202b2(mdo sde): dang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor byas nas/ bzod gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dud 'gre'i skyes gnas su skyes pa lags pas/ bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ de lta
202b3(mdo sde): lags kyis kyang bdag sngon du mchis te/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bcom ldan 'das gshegs so// zhes par spyan 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de
202b4(mdo sde): ltar gyis shig/ de nas re shig na des bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon du chas te/ thar gyis rgyal po'i thang du phyin to// de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po ni khang bzang gi steng du bud med
202b5(mdo sde): 'ba' shig dang / sil snyan gyi rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de nas ni rtso mi skad shes pa des rgyal po la smras pa kye rgyal po khyed mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das
202b6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyod kyi yul du gshegs lags kyis/ lha khyod kyi bshos sta gon mdzad par rigs so zhes byas so// de nas rgyal po shin du rings pas khang
202b7(mdo sde): bzang gi steng nas babs nas/ blon po'i tshogs kyi zhab rim byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bdan bsham pa nas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / bdug pa dang /
202b8(mdo sde): spos dang / me tog rnam pa na tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das su'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi/ kan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas/ nang du
202b9(mdo sde): sman
203a1(mdo sde): drangs nas/ zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas so// de nas ni rtsod 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'byor pa 'di dag tham
203a2(mdo sde): cad ni bdag gi yon yin no snyam du rig nas/ dga' zhing 'gu la yid rangs nas/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / rangs pa yid bde ba skyes nas/ rgyal po'i mdun logs su phan tshun
203a3(mdo sde): lding ba las khras khyer te bsad do// bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed de/ shi bas ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes
203a4(mdo sde): nas ring por ma lon par ni/ chos nyid kyi sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes/ las gang gi skyes snyam mo// de nas dud 'gro las shi phos pa dang /
203a5(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo // de nas sngon ne rtso las gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sem
203a6(mdo sde): te/ bdag zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das lta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das lta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon ne
203a7(mdo sde): rtso las gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub 'khor dag gi 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang sems mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi brgyan pa'i bcod pan can/ lus gur
203a8(mdo sde): gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sbri ka la stsogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo// lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba
203b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis bu ba bkang nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gi gtor te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'ad/
203b2(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ne rtsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa thugs su chud pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/
203b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ne rtsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus/ 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo thon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes
203b4(mdo sde): bcom nas/ rgyan du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshigs lan gsum brjod de// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khrag dang 'chi ma'i
203b5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la las sgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/
203b6(mdo sde): mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong
203b7(mdo sde): dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin du mi zad khyod kyi mthu'i bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro
203b8(mdo sde): phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag gi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal
204a1(mdo sde): / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phangs thob// mi mchod dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad rnams spangs// srid pa stong du mthong bar
204a2(mdo sde): bka' yis// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' 'gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni skor ba byas nas ni//
204a3(mdo sde): lha'i 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon na rtsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu de// tshong pa khye bogs byin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal ba dang / dpa'o g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad zam
204a4(mdo sde): cad las thar pa bzhin du/ 'byor pa gang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar
204a5(mdo sde): brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gi bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen pos byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
204a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdangs gsum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i slad du mchis lags
204a7(mdo sde): sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi 'jed kyi bdag po mtshangs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la lta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no// ne co gang gis nga
204a8(mdo sde): nags khrod der nub mo'i dgong lam la spyan drangs pa de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
204b1(mdo sde): destsal pa/ dge slong dag ni rtsod nyid shi nas su bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin no// dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa sngon ne rtsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus/
204b2(mdo sde): las gang dag bgyis na/ des ne rtsor skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na/ des lha'i nang du na skyes te bden pa mthong bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
204b3(mdo sde): pa/ sngon ne rtsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bstsags pa na/ sngon ne
204b4(mdo sde): rtsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i las byas shings skyugs pa de dag gzhan su zhig gi nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing tsag pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams
204b5(mdo sde): la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing btsags pa rnams
204b6(mdo sde): ni bdag nyid kyi phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// skal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs
204b7(mdo sde): shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin
204b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skye bu 'dul bar bya ba'i kha lo sgyur
205a1(mdo sde): ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer ba ra na sen rten cing bzhugs
205a2(mdo sde): de nas re shig na dge snyen zhig 'dug pa des/ bslab pa lhod par byas te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas ni ni rtsor skyes so// nga la sems dga' byas pas ni lhar skyes so// des bslab pa'i
205a3(mdo sde): bzhi lhag ma rnams srungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar na las cig du nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang nges par gnagA 'gyur ro//
205a4(mdo sde): las cig du rnam par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig du nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge
205a5(mdo sde): slong dag de bas na/ las cig du nges par gnag par rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig du nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong
205a6(mdo sde): khyod kyi de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do
205a7(mdo sde): po nya zhes bya ba ni// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang
205a8(mdo sde): gyi mi rnams dang / tshangs dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi la
205b1(mdo sde): 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
205b2(mdo sde): lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /
205b3(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / bsnyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab 'od mi tshal bya ka lan da ka pa gnas
205b4(mdo sde): pa na dbyar gnas par dam bcas so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig sku tshe ring
205b5(mdo sde): par shog shig ces stong nas/ gsol ba btab pa lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring po zhig ma mthong ste/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal
205b6(mdo sde): bar skor lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so// de nas rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das da
205b7(mdo sde): dbyar gnas par khyod kyis ci thos/ mgon med zas sprin gyis smras pa/ lha bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab du dbyar gnas par dam bcas so zhes thos lagaso// de nas
205b8(mdo sde): kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin las stsogs pa/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi dang blon po rnams kyis mi zhig po nyas bkug ste/ kye sa
206a1(mdo sde): khyod tshur shog/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mgo'u phyag 'tshal nas/ bdag cag
206a2(mdo sde): gi ching nas/ bcom ldan 'das gnod pa nyung ngam/ nyam nga nyung mang / skyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga'
206a3(mdo sde): 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol/ 'di skad du btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po la/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams/ bcom ldan
206a4(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te/ bdag gi bcom ldan 'das yun ring po zhig du ma mthong bas/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags
206a5(mdo sde): so/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na thugs rtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su gsol zhes mchi'o// zhes gsol cig
206a6(mdo sde): ces sgo'o// de nas mi des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / yul mi rnams kyi sgo ba bzhin du nyan te/ rgyal po'i khab
206a7(mdo sde): du song nas thar gyi song song ba las/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du phyin to// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad du bstas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
206a8(mdo sde): song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ ko sa la'i rgyas
206b1(mdo sde): po gsas rgyal dang / mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 'os phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gnod pa nyung
206b2(mdo sde): ngam skyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam/ zhes mchi'o// 'di skad du bdag
206b3(mdo sde): cag gi bcom ldan 'das la ring mo zhig du mthong ste/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar
206b4(mdo sde): 'tshal na/ thugs rtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su gsol zhes kyang mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye gal te nga
206b5(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can snying po la/ gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa rgyal po gzugs can snying po
206b6(mdo sde): dad pa stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te/ gshegs su gsol zhes bskal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mi de la cang
206b7(mdo sde): mi gsungs par snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das dbyar zla gsum 'das nas/ chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas/ chos gos gsol to// lhung bzed bsnam/
206b8(mdo sde): zham ring 'khor mang po dag dang / mnyan du yod pa las logs su gshegs so// pho nya yang shing lta la zhon te chas so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhabs kyis
207a1(mdo sde): / gshegs pa mthong nas/ shing ta las bab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
207a2(mdo sde): gsol te// thugs rtse ba'i slad du/ bdag gi shing rta bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shing rta dang / yang dag rtsol
207a3(mdo sde): ba la gnas nas/ nyon mongs tsher mas ma snang bar// sa steng kun tu rgyu bar byed// pho nyas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis gshegs pa lags kyis kyang /
207a4(mdo sde): bdag la phan gdags pa dang / thugs rtse ba'i slad du mchis su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das po nyal phan gdags pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rti'i steng du bzhugs so// de
207a5(mdo sde): nas shing rta la 'chi bas bzhin du mnyan du yod par byon nas/ pho nyas kyang rgyal po la sbran no// de nas rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis bcom ldan
207a6(mdo sde): 'das bsu nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i mtshan mo// rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du 'khod do// po nya de tshe thung ste/ chos thos pa'i 'og du de nyid kyi mtshan mo shi ste/ de shi nas sum
207a7(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring por ma lon par ni/ chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos
207a8(mdo sde): gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos nas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur
207b1(mdo sde): pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag ma lon par nas bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag
207b2(mdo sde): lon par bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub dkor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang sen mo ngos brgyan pa/ nor
207b3(mdo sde): bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i bcod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka las stsogs pas byugs pa des/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang
207b4(mdo sde): pad ma dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gi gto/
207b5(mdo sde): te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang
207b6(mdo sde): bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos stan te/ de thos nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bus/ 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo thon po
207b7(mdo sde): nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshigs lan gsum brjod do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdag gi
207b8(mdo sde): khrag dang 'chi mi rgya mtsho skam pa dang / rus pA'i la sgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gzhag pa
208a1(mdo sde): 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la bas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs
208a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song
208a3(mdo sde): lam// shin du mi zad khyod kyi mthu'i cad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang gdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/
208a4(mdo sde): shin du rnams ngag khyod las rten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i dgo 'phangs thob// mi mchod dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/
208a5(mdo sde): skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar bka' ba yis/ thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' 'gyur te/ btud cing zhabs
208a6(mdo sde): gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni skor ba byas nas kyang // lha'i 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de/ tshong pa khye bogs phyin pa dang /
208a7(mdo sde): zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa'o g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du/ 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du 'ong ba'i 'byor pa de
208a8(mdo sde): nying gis/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsas rgyal/ khang bzang gis steng na 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de mthong nas/ nam langs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
208b1(mdo sde): la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ma dang gsum mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la lta ba'i phyir/ 'ongs pa ma yin gyis//
208b2(mdo sde): khyod kyi pho nya de nga la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang por skyes nas/ de ma dang gsum nga'i thad du 'ongs ste/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden
208b3(mdo sde): pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ kye ma sangs rgyas kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun 'di dag ni chu ngu zhig byas kyang / sgra rnam par
208b4(mdo sde): smin pa chen por 'gyur ro// zhes smras so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsas rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing / rjes su yid rangs ste/ bcom
208b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ stan las langs te song ngo // der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di gsum ni mchog tu bdagra
208b6(mdo sde): pa yin te/ gsum gang zhes na/ ngas rgyas mchog du gdags pa dang / chos mchog du gdags pa dang / dge 'dun mchog du gdags pa dang / sangs rgyas mchog du gdags pa
208b7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ sems can rkang med rnams dang / rkang gzhi rnams sam/ rkang bzhi rnams sam/ rkang mang rnams sam/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs can ma yin pa rnams sam/
208b8(mdo sde): 'du shes can rnams sam/ 'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes yod pa yang ma yin/ 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag nang na ni/ de bzhin gshegs
209a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ mchog yin par bstan to// sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su zhig yang rung ba de dag ni/
209a2(mdo sde): mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog las mngon par dga' ba de dag ni rnam par smin pa yang / lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnam
209a3(mdo sde): kyi mchog/ 'ba' shig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhes na/ 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi
209a4(mdo sde): chos rnams gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chag dang bral ba'i chos mchogs yin par bstan to// chos la mngon par dga' ba gang yang rung ba de dag ni/ mchog la mngon
209a5(mdo sde): par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni/ rnam par smin pa yang / lha rnams kyi nang na lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir 'gyur ba rnams kyi mchog
209a6(mdo sde): 'ba' shig du 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni chos mchog du gdags pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ tshogs sam 'dus pa 'am/ mang po 'am/
209a7(mdo sde): 'khor gang yang rung ste/ de dag ni nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog yin par bsten te/ dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog
209a8(mdo sde): la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dag pa de dag ni/ rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams
209b1(mdo sde): kyi mchog 'ba' shig tu gyur par shes par bya'o// 'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid
209b2(mdo sde): rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // / bam po bcu bzhi pa'o// // ma he zhes bya
209b3(mdo sde): ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpo/
209b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/
209b5(mdo sde): bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par bya ste/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs
209b6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / bskrun bsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa// nyan thos kyi dge
209b7(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa/ ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing / gshegs pa las/ nags khrod de nam he'i khyu chen po dang / ma he rdzi lnga brgya 'khod do// de nas re shig na de'i nang na ma he stobs dang ldan
209b8(mdo sde): zhing stobs kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod do// de mi gzhan zhig gi dri tshor na phyi bzhin rgyug par byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs so// de nas mahe rdzi lnga brgya rnams
210a1(mdo sde): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo // de nas de dag gis skad tsher bos te/ bcom ldan 'das
210a2(mdo sde): 'di na ma he ma rungs pa mchis kyi shul 'dir mi gshegs su gsol zhes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye ngas 'dir dus la bab par shes kyis/ khyed snying las
210a3(mdo sde): chu du gyis shig/ de nas ma he des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ba dang / rnga ma ldang du gzar nas bcom ldan 'das thag ring ga la ba der rgyugs so// de bcom ldan
210a4(mdo sde): 'das kyi mdun logs su/ seng ge ral pa can/ ral pa g.yengs pa lnga sprul te/ blo g.yas g.yos su me chen po gnyis sprul to// steng du ni lcags kyi pha 'ongad chen po bzhi sprul to//
210a5(mdo sde): de nas ma he des phyogs kun tu 'jigs pa chen po mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la lces ljags nas/ zhums pa'i
210a6(mdo sde): bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la ltas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la des brda phrad pa'i skad du/ bzhin bzang 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o// chos tham
210a7(mdo sde): cad ni bdag med pa'o// mya ngan 'das pa ni zhi ba'o// zhes chos tshigs gsum bstan pa/ nas tshe rabs kyang dran par mdzad de/ des thos nas dus so// de nas bcom ldan
210a8(mdo sde): 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gro skyes pa la/ nga ni nga yis byar med pas// mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis// don med ngus pas ci la ba na/
210b1(mdo sde): 'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can// nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la/ dud 'gre'o skyes gnas spangs na lags// 'on kyang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas mahe ma rungs des/ rang gi/
210b2(mdo sde): lus la smad de/ kha bcos nas dud 'gro'i skyes nas srog chags rnams ni/ ma'i drod che bas de rkyen par shi ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i
210b3(mdo sde): bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring por ma lon pa ni/ chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skyes par 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang skyes mnyam mo// de na/
210b4(mdo sde): dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon ma her
210b5(mdo sde): gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis bdag zhag ma lon par
210b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir/ 'gro mnyamo// de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i rna cha gdub dkor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo ngos rgyan pa/
210b7(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sbri ka las stsogs pas byugs pa des/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog
210b8(mdo sde): ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man dar ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ nags khrod de dag thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ ban
211a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la me tog gtor te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon maher gyur pa'i
211a2(mdo sde): lha'i bus/ 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshigs lan
211a3(mdo sde): gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdag gi khrag dang mchis mi'i rgya mtsho skams pa dang / rus pa'i ri la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa
211a4(mdo sde): dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la pas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/
211a5(mdo sde): rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs gyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyis mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge slong
211a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi zad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris
211a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gi thob// bdag gis di ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnams par khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya
211a8(mdo sde): mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dges pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa steng du mthong bar
211b1(mdo sde): bka' ba yis// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal mthong ba dga' gyur ste// 'dud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor
211b2(mdo sde): ba byas nas kyang // lha'i 'jigs rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas sgron ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de/ tshong pa khye spogs phyin pa dang // zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang // dpa'o//
211b3(mdo sde): g.yul las rgyal ba dang // nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du/ 'byor pa gang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ rang gi gnas su song ngo //
211b4(mdo sde): de nas ma he des ngag gi snang ba chen po mthong ngo // de mthong nas the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdang gsum bcom ldan 'das kyis
211b5(mdo sde): thad du mchis ste/ de ma dang gsum nga'i thang du 'ongs nas/ ngas de la chos bstan te bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas ma he rdzing de dag mchog tu ya mtshan
211b6(mdo sde): du gyur te/ ngo mtshar to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de yang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang phrad nas// lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar
211b7(mdo sde): gyur to// bdag cag gis ci ste khyad par thob par mi 'gyur snyam mo// de nas de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ zhal zas bzang pos
211b8(mdo sde): tshim par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ de dag gi brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid
212a1(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so// de nas dge slong dag 'di snyam du sems te/ the tsom thams cad bcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
212a2(mdo sde): brdzun pa sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na/ der ma her skyes lags/ las gang gis bgyis na de lci'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/
212a3(mdo sde): mahe de 'di rnams kyis ni las ci bgyis na des ma her gyur lags/ las gang bgyis pas ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa lags/ bcom ldan
212a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nyid kyis mngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan de/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong
212a5(mdo sde): ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 'di dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas
212a6(mdo sde): shing bsags pas na/ 'di dag nyid kyis sa'i khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rnams la rnam par smin par mi
212a7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur te// lus
212a8(mdo sde): can dag gis las rnams ni// skal pa rgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pas na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
212b1(mdo sde): dus na/ skal pa bzang po de nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan
212b2(mdo sde): pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skye bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba
212b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer ba ra na se na/ drang srong smra ba'i rigs kyi gnas na brten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong dag rten la 'beb par byed pa na/ dge slong dag
212b4(mdo sde): sde snod gsum pa zhig 'khor lnga brgya dang / rten la 'bebs pa'i nang na 'dug go// de'i nang na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong dag yod de sde snod gsum pa la 'dri bar byed
212b5(mdo sde): de/ des ni lan ma thebs pa dang / de khros nas ngag gis las rtsub po phyung ste/ nags kyi mahe dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes byas so// de'i slob ma rnams kyis kyang / mahe rdza
212b6(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba 'di dag ni ci shes shes smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems dge slong sde snod gsum pa gang yin pa
212b7(mdo sde): ni 'di yin no// slob ma dag ni mahe rdzi 'di dag yin te/ las des na tshe rabs lnga brgya ma her skyes so// slob ma rnams kyang mahe rdzing lnga brgyar gyur to// nga la sems dga'
212b8(mdo sde): bar gyur pa des ni lhar skyes so// dge slong gi dngos po thob ste tshul khrims bsrungs pas ni bden pa mthong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag
213a1(mdo sde): / de bas na/ ngag gis nyes pa spangs pa'i phyir/ 'bad par byas te/ kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyis tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge
213a2(mdo sde): sbyong dang bram ze rnams gyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi zad bdag gi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan
213a3(mdo sde): mtho ris 'gro ba bye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis theb// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid stong du mthong bar bka'
213a4(mdo sde): ba yi// thub pa khyod ni ded 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thul la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang //
213a5(mdo sde): lha'i 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas tshong pa khye bogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad
213a6(mdo sde): thams cad las thar pa bzhin du/ 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // de'i tshe dge slong dag srong dang tho rangs
213a7(mdo sde): mi nyal bar brtson par lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gi bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
213a8(mdo sde): la zhus pa/ ci lags/ 'dong gsum mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i slad du mchis lags/
213b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga lta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/
213b2(mdo sde): lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa/ nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos brten nas/ bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas
213b3(mdo sde): dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad bcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lha'i bu bsnyen gnas gang nas byang lags/ min ci las btags
213b4(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed mnyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'o na
213b5(mdo sde): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la bzung shig dngas bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin
213b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha
213b7(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyis ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer ba ra na se na drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nang na rten cing bzhugs so//
213b8(mdo sde): phyis re shig na rgyal po kri kri bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo // de nas re shig na bram ze gnyis drang srong smra ba'i ring don shig la song ba dang / de gnyis
214a1(mdo sde): @kyis rgyal pos 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa mthong ngo // de nas de gnyis rgyal srid la 'dod pa skyes nas/ de gnyis kyis dge bsnyen
214a2(mdo sde): zhig la dris te/ kye ma sangs rgyas kyi dge bsnyen las ci zhig byas na// ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes byas so// dge bsnyen kyis smras pa/ gang gis yan lag brgya
214a3(mdo sde): pa yongs su srung ba nges ni ci bsam pa dang / ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes byas pas/ de nas bram ze de gnyis kyis khyims bdag chu stod las bsnyen gnas
214a4(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad pa blang ste bsrung so// de nas gcig gis ni yongs su dag par bsrung ste/ de shi nas rgyal po kri kri'i bur skyes te/ de'i ming lags skyes zhes btags nas/ pa shi ba'i
214a5(mdo sde): 'og tu de rgyal por bcug go// gcig shos kyis ni snyen gnas nyams par byas te/ de ni shi nas klu'i nang du skyes te/ de'i steng du nyin gcig bzhin du/ len bdun bdun bye tshan 'bab
214a6(mdo sde): te/ ngos rus pa 'ba' shig lus par byed do// de nas 'di snyams du sems te/ 'di las gang gis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin na/ des bdag gis 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong
214a7(mdo sde): zhing 'dug mnyam mo// de nas bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ bdag gis blangs las/ bslab pa lhod par byas pa des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal bdag gis nyams su myong la/
214a8(mdo sde): bdag gis blang ste/ bsrungs pa des ni rgyal srid thob par gyur to// skam mo// yang des 'di snyam du sems ste/ da yang bdag gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa bsrung bar bya'o//
214b1(mdo sde): 'on kyang bdag klu'i skyes gnas las thar par 'gyur yang srid do snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i cha lugs su bdag nyid sprul nas/ rgyal po'i thad du song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po la rgyal
214b2(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ sku tshe ring bar shog shig ces ston nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag la 'tshal gyis/ lha bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang /
214b3(mdo sde): ldan pa brtsal du gsol/ gal te ma brtsal na gdon mi 'tshal bar/ lha'i dbu tshal ba bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro// zhes byas nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas
214b4(mdo sde): rgyal po 'jig shing skag ste mi dga' le/ kyi bung zhes byas te gser 'bum phrag yod pa'i snod rgyal mtshan kyi rtse mo la btag te/ bdag gi yul thams cad du dril sgrags nas/
214b5(mdo sde): su nga la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa ston pa de la gser 'bum de sbyin no// bkur sti chen pos kyang bkur bar bya'o// zhes sgo'o// de nas re shig na shing mkhan
214b6(mdo sde): kyi bu mo bud med rgan mo zhig 'dug pa des/ rgyal po la ka ba zhig bsten te/ sngon bdag gi pa rtag tu ka ba 'di la spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog gis mchod par bgyid
214b7(mdo sde): na 'di phyung ste gzigs shig ces byas so// de nas rgyal pos zham ring ba rnams la ka ba 'di phyung shig ces sgo'o// de nas rgyal po zhams ring ba rnams kyis ka ba phyung ba dang /
214b8(mdo sde): de'i 'og nas bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang / dge bsnyen gyi bslab pa'i bzhi lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gser gyi glegs
215a1(mdo sde): ba ma la bris pa zhig rnyed do// de nas rgyal pos klu de la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang / drang srong smra ba na gnas pa'i drang srong nyi khri stong gi/
215a2(mdo sde): kyang byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa gnyis mngon sum du byas so// klu des kyang bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrung nas/ thar la phyung ste/ lus
215a3(mdo sde): bor nas kha 'chos te/ 'dug go// de nas de shi ste/ g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// dge slong dag bsnyen gnas ni
215a4(mdo sde): de las byung ste/ ming yang de las btags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan kyis gsung pa la mngon par bstod do//
215a5(mdo sde): / ngang pa zhes bya ba ni// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang
215a6(mdo sde): 'khor gyis mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang /
215a7(mdo sde): mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas ste/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
215a8(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim
215b1(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams bsres pa/ nyan thos dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ gnyan du yod pa na/ rgya bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
215b2(mdo sde): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe gnyan du yod pa na/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed do// de'i ri la 'byor pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo mang
215b3(mdo sde): pos gang ba dang / brtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu ram shing dang /
215b4(mdo sde): ba lang dang / ma he dang / ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing bkrugs la/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid sbyangs so// phyis re shig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
215b5(mdo sde): rgyal bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bskur bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / pad tsa la'i rgyal pos/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la//
215b6(mdo sde): ngang pa lnga rgya skyes su bskur te/ gang gi tshe rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba de'i tshe/ ngang pa lnga brgya rgyal po de dag la phul lo// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ngang pa de
215b7(mdo sde): dag la mi 'jigs pa sbyin te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du btang nas/ gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa bshos
215b8(mdo sde): gsol zhing bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ dang ba de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du 'gro la/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang de rnams la khyos ma sbyin te/
216a1(mdo sde): de dag gis zos nas/ tshims zhing dbang po ltas te 'khod do// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jogs las bzhengs nas 'khor bzhi po
216a2(mdo sde): dag la chos bstan pa de'i tshe/ ngang pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/ chos nyan par byed de// de nas de dag tshe thung ste shi nas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul
216a3(mdo sde): bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyi sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las
216a4(mdo sde): gang gis skyos mnyam mo// de nas ngang pa lnga brgya shi 'phos pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur
216a5(mdo sde): pa de dag gis mthong ngo // de nas sngon dang bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdug dkor dag cing / mgul ba thogs pa lus do shal dang / se me dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che rna tshogs kyis
216a6(mdo sde): brgyan pa'i bcod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / s+thi ka las sogs pa byugs pa de dag gis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang /
216a7(mdo sde): ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man dar ba rnams kyis thu ba bskang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyis tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tog gi
216a8(mdo sde): gtor to// chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sngon dang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba
216b1(mdo sde): dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan nas/ de thos nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis//
216b2(mdo sde): 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshigs len gsum du
216b3(mdo sde): brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi khrag dang mchis ma'i rgya tshe skam pa dang / rus pa'i la sgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mthe ris dang thar pa'i sgo
216b4(mdo sde): rnams phye ba dang / bdag cag lha dang mi rnams kyis nang du bzhags pa 'di lta bu phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nad mi
216b5(mdo sde): dang / gnyen gyi tshogs rnams gyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang
216b6(mdo sde): por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin du mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ mya ngan 'das pa'i lam bdag cag rnams kyis thob//
216b7(mdo sde): bdag cag di ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la rten nas thob// bdag cag sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dges pa'i go 'phang thob// mi mche
