216b8(mdo sde): dbang po mi dang lha yis mchod// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'chang ba
217a1(mdo sde): dga' gyur to// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha'i 'jigs rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas
217a2(mdo sde): sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams tshong pa khye spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang // dpa'o g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor
217a3(mdo sde): pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyi gnas su song / de'i tshe dge slong dag srod dang mtho rang la mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur len pa la gnas te/ de
217a4(mdo sde): ngag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du snang bar chen po byung bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tshoms skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
217a5(mdo sde): mdang gsum mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin nam/ 'jigs rten skyong ba bzhi/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
217a6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la lta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no// dge slong dag ko
217a7(mdo sde): po gsal rgyal gyis/ ngang pa brgya 'dir btang ba khyed kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa/ de dag la sems dga' bar 'gyur te/ shi nas sum bcu rtsa
217a8(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ de dag mdang gsum nga'i thad du lhags nas/ de dag la chos bstan to// bden pa mthong bar gyur nas/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas
217b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad bcom pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las gang dag bgyis
217b2(mdo sde): na des ngang par skyes legs/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis
217b3(mdo sde): sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs brnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas/ sngon dang par
217b4(mdo sde): gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol kyi sa'i kham
217b5(mdo sde): la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnam
217b6(mdo sde): ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnams par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// bskal pa rgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs
217b7(mdo sde): shing dus las bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de
217b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten pa mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kham
218a1(mdo sde): sbyar ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jigs rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer ba ra na se nas drang srong smra ba'i ri dag
218a2(mdo sde): kyi gnas na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'di dag rab tu byung ba las/ bslab pa lhod par byas pa des na/ ngang par skyes so// nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so// bslab pa lhag
218a3(mdo sde): ma rnams srungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro//
218a4(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin par yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de
218a5(mdo sde): bas na/ las cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams par spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de
218a6(mdo sde): ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
218a7(mdo sde): rtogs pa brjod pa rgya las// // sdom kyi tshigs su bcad pa drug pa rdzogs s+ho// / sdom ni// // gser 'od dang ni dri zhim dang // byed bzang stobs
218a8(mdo sde): ldan sdug gu dang // pad ma mig dang rnga sgra dang // bu dang nyi ma gyad pa dang // ngan gser 'od ces bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams
218b1(mdo sde): dang / pho brang 'khor gyis mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnam
218b2(mdo sde): dang mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha
218b3(mdo sde): dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams mnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na shing kre de'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i
218b4(mdo sde): gnas na/ shakya phyug cing nor mang la long spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba dang / rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa 'gren pa zhig gnas
218b5(mdo sde): pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blang ste/ de dang lhan gcig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/ de rtse zhing dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba
218b6(mdo sde): brgyad dam dgu lon pa las bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ma thob pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo gser gyis mdog 'dra ba zhig
218b7(mdo sde): bcas te/ de'i gser gyi 'od kyis grong khyer skya'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas so// de nas pha ma dang / sems can gzhan dag gis de mthong nas/ ltas mo la lhags te/ sems
218b8(mdo sde): can gyis khyad par 'di lta bu las 'ongs zhig bu zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ sems pa la zhugs so// de nas de btsas pa'i brtsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad
219a1(mdo sde): gdags par bgyi'o// nye du rnams na re/ 'di btsas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad gser 'od kyis snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i
219a2(mdo sde): ming gser 'od ces gdags so// zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u gser 'od phang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khrud pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
219a3(mdo sde): brtse ba'i ma ma gnyis la te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed
219a4(mdo sde): bsrings nas/ mtshe'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang mkhas shing gsal la yid bzhungs pa dang / dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang la/ bdag dang
219a5(mdo sde): gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa dang / snying rje can/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go/ phyi re shig na/ de byad gzugs kyis rgyags pas myong te/ grong khyer kyis phyi rol na brtse
219a6(mdo sde): zhing 'dug go/ shakya mang po dag cig kyang / shing n+ya kro de'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo // de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis mthong nas dris pa/ khyed gar dong de dag gis smras pa/ sangs rgyas
219a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir/ shing n+ya kro da'i kun dga' ra ba na 'gro'o// de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas shes bya ba mthos te/ sngon ma thos pa'i ming thos nas/ spu thams
219a8(mdo sde): cad zing zhes bya ste/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ de 'di skams du sems te/ ma la bdag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lta ba'i phyir 'gro gor ma chags snyam nas/ de yang
219b1(mdo sde): shing n+ya kro ti'i kun dga' ra ba na song ba dang / khye'u gser gyi 'od kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ skra skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/
219b2(mdo sde): dpe byed bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gris brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhags pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/
219b3(mdo sde): mthong ma thag tu byad gzugs kyis brgyags pa med par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go//
219b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas/ des chos de ma thos pa dang / rab tu byung bar 'dod par gyur to// de nas re shig na pha ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thad
219b5(mdo sde): du song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar
219b6(mdo sde): ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// brdzun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs shing dge slong gi
219b7(mdo sde): dngos po thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du/ tshangs par spyod pa la spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog can/ glang po che'i
219b8(mdo sde): sna ltar 'dug pa rkyang nas/ khye'u gser 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu tshur shog/ tshangs par spyod shig/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal ba'i mod la sgra dang kha skra
220a1(mdo sde): @ni bregs nas/ zhag bdun lon tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni/ bsnyen pa rdzogs nas/ lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/ lag ni ni lhung bzed dang / chu snod
220a2(mdo sde): thogs par gyur to// 'dir smra bde bzhin gshegs pas tshur gshegs bka' stsal pas// de ni mgo bregs lus la snams sbyar gyon// sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pas go bgos nas
220a3(mdo sde): mod la dbang po zhi bar rab tu gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung pog ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang /
220a4(mdo sde): 'bad pa dang / pol mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi bstan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnams pa thams cad rnyil pa/ lhung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam
220a5(mdo sde): par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa nyid la khams pa'i 'dod chags dang bral
220a6(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur gsil bar gyur pa'i rigs pas/ sgo nga'i sgrub
220a7(mdo sde): bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
220a8(mdo sde): mchod cing brjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad bcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
220b1(mdo sde): btsun pa gser 'od kyis las gang bgyis na/ de 'di ltar gzugs bzang zhing blta na/ sdug la mdzes pa dang / rab tu byung ba na dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom
220b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gser 'od nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar
220b3(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i las de dag byas shing / bsags pas na/ gser 'od nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shi
220b4(mdo sde): bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol kyis sa'i khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khamos la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba
220b5(mdo sde): dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni/
220b6(mdo sde): bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byang ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la
220b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur
220b8(mdo sde): ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ des rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan rten cing bzhugs pa
221a1(mdo sde): las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyis 'phrin las mdzad nas shing zad nas shing zad me bzhin du phung po
221a2(mdo sde): lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gdung dang / sku gdung gyi mchod
221a3(mdo sde): pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten/ 'khor ra khor yug du dpag tshadadragacig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten kyis
221a4(mdo sde): nang dus ston kyang lugs bstod do// de nas re shig na khyims bdag cig mchod rten gyis dus ston byed pa der song ba las/ mchod rten de las gser gyi me long zhig lhung ba des mthong nas/
221a5(mdo sde): des de rna ba'i gong rgyan du bcom nas/ mchod rten de las btags te/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog gis mchod nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis
221a6(mdo sde): kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu bskyed par byed par gyur gcig/ ces mi mnyes pa byed par ma gyur cig byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
221a7(mdo sde): pa/ dge slong dag ji snyams du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyims bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u gser 'od 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzig
221a8(mdo sde): kyis mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na/ 'di lta bur byad gzugs kyis khyad par can du gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni/ tshe 'di las dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//
221b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las cig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa
221b2(mdo sde): yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres
221b3(mdo sde): ma yang nges par spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnam 'ba' shig la gtad par byas ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
221b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal ste/ dge slong dag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // dri zhim zhes bya ba ni// // sangs rgyas bcom
221b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyugs po rnams dang / po brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnam
221b6(mdo sde): dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri sa
221b7(mdo sde): mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
221b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / sun gsos dang / sman zong rnams mnyes pa nyan thos rnams
222a1(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul gser skya'i gnas na/ shing n+ya kro de'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// khyim bdag nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yong
222a2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa 'dran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang
222a3(mdo sde): lhan gcig tu brtse zhing dga' la dga' 'gur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na
222a4(mdo sde): sdug pa mdzes pa/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni thob pa zhig brtsas ste/ khye'u de'i ming ji skad gdags/ shes ming mdogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di'i mi/
222a5(mdo sde): ji skad gdags shes ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u 'di'i ming dri zhim zhes bya'o// phangs na 'tsho'i ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khrud pa'i ma ma gnyis
222a6(mdo sde): dang brtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cogs gis bskyed
222a7(mdo sde): bsring ste/ mtshe'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye grag par gyur to// de'ang sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs kyis shugs kyis/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge zhing bsams pa bzad la/ bdag dang gas
222a8(mdo sde): la phan pa la bzhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ gang gi tshe khye'u dri zhim/ dpung brgyan dang / 'dul ba'i do zhal dang / gdu bu'i rgyan te/ srang gi
222b1(mdo sde): nang du bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ tsan ngan kyis dri gsung gis grong khyer thams cad khyab par gyur te/ skye bo mang pos kyang lha'i spos kyi dri tshor nas mchog tu yang mtshan du gyur te/ 'di ska
222b2(mdo sde): du kyi ma bsod nams dag gi mthu zhes 'dzer to// phyis re shig na khye'u dri zhim shing n+ya ko da'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo // de nas de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ skra skyes bu chen
222b3(mdo sde): po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par rgyan pa/ dpe byed bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byed pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mang
222b4(mdo sde): ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag du des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das
222b5(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang // khams dang / rang
222b6(mdo sde): bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u dri zhim gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon
222b7(mdo sde): po ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum byas te/ nges bden pa mthong nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung de/
222b8(mdo sde): des brtson par bsgrubs pa dang / 'bad pas/ bol mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi bstan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnams pa thams cad rnal pa dang / ltung ba dang rnam
223a1(mdo sde): par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jigs pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas
223a2(mdo sde): te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan
223a3(mdo sde): spangs pa lta bur gsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag pa'i rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags
223a4(mdo sde): pa dang / skar sti la mi lta bar/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom
223a5(mdo sde): skyes te/ the tshom thams cad bcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dri zhim kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ de 'di'i nas ud pa la'i dri byung la/ lus
223a6(mdo sde): thams cad nas ni tsan dan kyis dri 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri zhim nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen gru ba dang
223a7(mdo sde): ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ dri zhim nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag/ gzhan su zhig nyams
223a8(mdo sde): su myong bar 'gyur to/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa de dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnams par smin par 'gyur ro// lus
223b1(mdo sde): can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byang ba 'das pa'i dus/ bskal
223b2(mdo sde): pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar shegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa
223b3(mdo sde): skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang
223b4(mdo sde): gnyen ldan rten cing bzhugs pa las re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me
223b5(mdo sde): bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gdung kyis mchod pa rim gror
223b6(mdo sde): byas nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra kho ra g.yug tu dpa' tshad gcig yod la/ 'phab tu rgyang grags cig yod pa gcig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyis dus ston
223b7(mdo sde): kyang lugs bstod do// khyim bdag cig gis kyang de la dad pa bskyes nas/ spos dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs phul te/ bdug pa dang me tog gis mchod nas/ smon lam ba ta
223b8(mdo sde): la/ dge ba'i rtsa dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bus
224a1(mdo sde): gnyen par byed par gyur cig/ mi gnyen par byed par ma gyur cig ces so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sem/
224a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u dri zhim 'di yin te/ nges yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis mchod rten la bkur sti
224a3(mdo sde): byas pa de ni 'di lta bur dri zhim por gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid sngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag
224a4(mdo sde): pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin par yang cig tu nges par gnag par gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang cig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// /
224a5(mdo sde): las 'dres mar gyur pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs
224a6(mdo sde): la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par byas te/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
224a7(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong dag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / bam po bco lnga pa
224a8(mdo sde): byad bzang shes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang
224b1(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnam
224b2(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'bye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /
224b3(mdo sde): gzim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams rnyed pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na/ shing n+ya kro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug
224b4(mdo sde): so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas ne shAkya phyug cing nor mang la long spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyis bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa
224b5(mdo sde): des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blang nas/ de de dang lhan gcig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pas/ chung ma la bu tshugs nas/ zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang /
224b6(mdo sde): bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa mdzad pa/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/ lus byad dpe med pa/ 'dom 'jam pa/ lus kyis
224b7(mdo sde): bdun mtho cher grags pa zhig bcas so// de nas de btsas pa'i bcos ston byas nas/ khye'u de'i ming ni ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do// nye du rnams
224b8(mdo sde): nare/ de'i lus dpe med pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming byang bzang zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de'i nang nas khye'u byang bzang phang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu
225a1(mdo sde): ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khrud pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang /
225a2(mdo sde): zhun mar dang / mar kyis snying khu dang / gzhan yod byed kyi khyed par bzang ngo cog skyed bsring ste/ mtshe'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye grag par gyur to// de yang
225a3(mdo sde): dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsams pa bzang la/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten thams
225a4(mdo sde): cad dang / tha na mi ma yin rnams kyis kyang mchod cing shes brjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// des sa phyogs gang du gom pa bor ba de dag kyang gtsang mar 'gyur
225a5(mdo sde): te/ de ltar bsod nams dang ldan zhing che bar grags so// sa phyis re shig na shing n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ skra skyes bu chen po'i
225a6(mdo sde): mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od
225a7(mdo sde): mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bza' ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu nges bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom
225a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyen pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba
225b1(mdo sde): dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u byed bzangs kyis 'jig tshogs
225b2(mdo sde): la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo 'thon po ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das
225b3(mdo sde): kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas/ bol mig lnga'i 'khor ba'i 'khor los 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rigs nas/ 'dra
225b4(mdo sde): byed kyi rnam pa thams cad brnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos yin par rtsad mchod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ da
225b5(mdo sde): bcom pa nyid mngon sum byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong ba mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra
225b6(mdo sde): ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur gsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
225b7(mdo sde): thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang / bcas pa'i lha'i rnams kyis mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i
225b8(mdo sde): gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams the tshom thams cad bcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa byang bzang kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des
226a1(mdo sde): 'di'i lus 'di lta bur gyur la/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byad bzang nyid kyis
226a2(mdo sde): sngon tshe rabs gzhan du/ tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su
226a3(mdo sde): zhig gis nyams su myong bar gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol kyi sa'i khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
226a4(mdo sde): dang / rlung gis khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
226a5(mdo sde): rnams 'ba' shig la rnams par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid
226a6(mdo sde): du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyu
226a7(mdo sde): reg pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jigs rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lnga dang mi rnams kyis ston pa/ sangs rgyas ba
226a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ rnam par gzigs shes byas pa 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gzhan ldan rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyu
226b1(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyis 'brin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zed pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das
226b2(mdo sde): so// de nas rgyal po gzhan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis skra gdung la/ ska gdung gi mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug du dpag chad
226b3(mdo sde): gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags cig yod pa zhigs brtsigs te/ der rgyal po gnyen yod/ gnyen gyis tshogs dang bcas pa/ blon po'i tshogs kyis zhams ring byas pa/
226b4(mdo sde): mchod rten gyi dus ston byas so// phyis re shig na/ nyi ma gcig mi dbul po zhig/ mchod rten kyis 'khor sa'i nang du song nas/ nges der me tog rnying pa dag dang / mchod rten rdul
226b5(mdo sde): gyis g.yog pa dag mthong ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas kyis yon tan rje su dran nas dad pa bskyes te phyag blang nas/ mchod rten yang chags/ me tog rnying pa yangs gsal to// /
226b6(mdo sde): de nas mchod rten la rdul med cing dri ma med pa mthong nas/ dga' ba skyes ste/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa 'dis na//
226b7(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par gyur cig/ mi mnyes pa byed par ma gyur cig/ ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das
226b8(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mi dbul por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ bud bzang 'di yin te/ des mchod rten la phyag dar byas pas na/
227a1(mdo sde): byad bzang por gyur to// smon la btab pa des ni tshe 'di nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na/ las cig du nges par/
227a2(mdo sde): gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang cig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang cig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro//
227a3(mdo sde): las 'dres pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las
227a4(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag
227a5(mdo sde): yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / stobs ldan zhes bya ba ni// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po
227a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
227a7(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
227a8(mdo sde): la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
227b1(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnam
227b2(mdo sde): mnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na/ shakya byug cing nor mang la/ long
227b3(mdo sde): spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rig mnyam pa las chung ma blang ste/
227b4(mdo sde): did dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' myugur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad/ dgur lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ khye'u
227b5(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ stobs kyis shugs gzhan las 'phags pa zhig rtsas so// de nas bcas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ni ji skad gdag
227b6(mdo sde): shes ming 'dogs par byed de nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di stobs kyis shugs dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming stobs dang ldan zhes gdags so// zhes zer ro// de na
227b7(mdo sde): khye'u stobs ldan pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khrud pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la btad nas/ de ma ma
227b8(mdo sde): brgyad kyis 'am dang zho dang / zhun mar dang / mar kyis snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyed par bzang de cog gis bskyed bsring ste/ mtsho nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye grag
228a1(mdo sde): par gyur to// de yang dang ba dang ldan pa/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rjes can/ bdag
228a2(mdo sde): che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go// de nas phyis re shig na/ de shing n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba na song ba dang des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa
228a3(mdo sde): gnyis kyis legs par rgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis rgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i 'gro ba
228a4(mdo sde): lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu nges bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba skyed nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal
228a5(mdo sde): te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/
228a6(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u stobs ldan gyis/ 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po ye shes rdo rje bcom nas/
228a7(mdo sde): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te des bden pa mthong nas/ pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang /
228a8(mdo sde): 'bad pa pol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi rten par rig nas/ 'du byed kyis rnam pa thams cad rnyil pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par mthor ba dang / rnam par
228b1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'i chos can yin par brtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong
228b2(mdo sde): bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur gsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mje/
228b3(mdo sde): par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha'i rnams kyis mchod
228b4(mdo sde): cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad bcod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
228b5(mdo sde): btsun pa stobs dang ldan pas gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i lus stobs dang ldan par gyur la/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
228b6(mdo sde): padage slong dag stobs ldan pa la nyid kyis/ sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ongs
228b7(mdo sde): pa'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ stobs ldan nyid kyis/ las byas shing bsag pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las
228b8(mdo sde): byas shing bsag pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnams par smin pa mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams lo rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las pa
229a1(mdo sde): ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnams par smin par 'gyur ro//
229a2(mdo sde): lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa rgyar yang chud mi za// tshegs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das
229a3(mdo sde): pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su lnga pa/ bde bar
229a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams par gzigs shes
229a5(mdo sde): bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang nyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs
229a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyis 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//
229a7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po mnyan yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la/ sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug dpag
229a8(mdo sde): tshad gcig yod la/ pang du rgyang grags cig yod pa/ zhig rtsigs te mchod rten gyis dus ston byed pa der skye bo phal po ches/ klu blangs gar byas pas/ mchod rten
229b1(mdo sde): rdul gyi g.yog par gyur to// phyis re shig na khyim bdag mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song ba dang / des mchod rten gyis 'khor sa rdul gyis yog pa mthong ngo // de nas khyim
229b2(mdo sde): bdag des sangs rgyas kyis yon tan rjes su dran nas/ dad pa skyes te spos kyis 'deg gu til mar du sbyar ba phul te/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan
229b3(mdo sde): 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag du gyur pa gang
229b4(mdo sde): yin pa de ni stobs ldan 'di yin te/ de bcom ldan 'das rnams par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na/ stobs dang ldan par gyur to// smon lam btab
229b5(mdo sde): pa des ni/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bus so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang cig tu nges par
229b6(mdo sde): gnag par 'gyur ro// las cig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang cig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur to// las 'dres ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa ya
229b7(mdo sde): 'dres mar 'gyur to// dge slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'bab
229b8(mdo sde): shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan
230a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / sdu gu zhes bya ba ni// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams
230a2(mdo sde): dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyis mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
230a3(mdo sde): sprin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas//
230a4(mdo sde): mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
230a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge
230a6(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na/ shakya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin
230a7(mdo sde): pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyis bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'dran pa zhigs gnas pa zhig rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang ldan
230a8(mdo sde): gcig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// des brtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byud
230b1(mdo sde): ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing bstan sdug pa mdzes pa che bar grags pa/ mthong na dga' ba zhig bertsas te/ de brtsas nas grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad grags pas
230b2(mdo sde): rgyas par gyur to// de nas de brtsas pa'i brtsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nyi du rnams na re khye'u 'di brtsas pa'i rtsas
230b3(mdo sde): ma thag tu skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming sdug gu zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u sdug gu phang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
230b4(mdo sde): nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khrud pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / brtse ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar
230b5(mdo sde): dang / mar gyis snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byed kyis khyad par bzang ngo cog gi bskyed bsring ste/ mtsho nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang ldan
230b6(mdo sde): la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rjes can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa dang / gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la
230b7(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba/ btong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ de dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / dkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs btong bas
230b8(mdo sde): sdung byed de/ de nas reg ga na khye'u sdug gu shing n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsags
231a1(mdo sde): kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe' byed bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od
231a2(mdo sde): mnga' ba/ rin po che'i 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das
231a3(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams
231a4(mdo sde): dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u sdug gus 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo
231a5(mdo sde): thon po ye shes rdo rje bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan la rab tu
231a6(mdo sde): byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / 'bad pas/ phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba/ ltung ba/ rnam par
231a7(mdo sde): mthor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can/ yin par brtsad chod te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa kham
231a8(mdo sde): sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa nyid khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bor bar mnyam par/ nam mkha' dang lag zil du 'dra ba'i sems dang
231b1(mdo sde): ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur gsil bar ma gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i
231b2(mdo sde): rnyed pa chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing shes te brjod pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge
231b3(mdo sde): slong dag the tshom skyes ste/ the tshom thams cad bcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sdug gus las gang dag bgyis na/ nges 'di grags pa chen
231b4(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa dang / sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
231b5(mdo sde): sdug gu nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu/ tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsag
231b6(mdo sde): pas na/ sbu gu nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi si'i
231b7(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags
231b8(mdo sde): pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang
232a1(mdo sde): chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gci
232a2(mdo sde): pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jigs rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha
232a3(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jigs rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na/ rten
232a4(mdo sde): cing bzhugs pa las re shig na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing bzang pa'i me bzhin du/ phung po lha ma med pa'i mya ngan las
232a5(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dbying su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la/ skra gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi
232a6(mdo sde): las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug du dpa' tshad cig yod la/ pang du rgyang grags cig yod pa zhig rtsigs so// de'i phyis re shig dpyid kyis dus shing rnams me tog
232a7(mdo sde): rgyas te/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs byung ba ni khyim bdag cig gis rgyal po la gsol pa/ bdag ni lha dang lhan gcig skyes du bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rte
232a8(mdo sde): la me tog gdags par 'tshal lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas khyim bdag de dang rgyal po dang / blon po dang / zhams ring ba rnams kyis dril sgrags te/
232b1(mdo sde): me tog rnam pa sna tshogs sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog gdags par 'tshal lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shig/
232b2(mdo sde): de nas khyim bdag de dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / zhams ring ba rnams kyis dril bsgrags te/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa lta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
232b3(mdo sde): gzigs kyis mchod rten la me tog btags te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas sems dga' ba skyes nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par skyed do// bcom ldan
232b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ sdug gu 'di yin te/ des skes po phal po che'i
232b5(mdo sde): don dang / lhan cig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa des na/ skye bo phal po che'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis ni blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur
232b6(mdo sde): la/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang cig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro//
232b7(mdo sde): las cig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang cig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag
232b8(mdo sde): de bas na/ las cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge
233a1(mdo sde): slong dag de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
233a2(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do// // pad ma mig ces bya ba ni// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams
233a3(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyis mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma
233a4(mdo sde): yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu
233a5(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams che
233a6(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams mnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa/
233a7(mdo sde): ser skya'i gnas na shing ca gro de'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas nas kya phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che
233a8(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyis bu'i nor dang 'gren pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyas pa las chung blang nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la
233b1(mdo sde): dga' mgur spyod de/ de rtse zhing dga' lnga dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs zhing blta na sdug
233b2(mdo sde): pa mdzes pa/ mig pad ma sngon po 'dra ba/ mgo bo la lha'i nor bu rin po che ka thogs pa zhig bcas ste/ des grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nor bu rin blo mthon kar
233b3(mdo sde): kha dog nas du byas so// de nas de bcas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdag shes ming 'dogs par byed do// de nye du rnams re khye'u 'di'i ming pad ma
233b4(mdo sde): 'dra bas ni/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming pad ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u pad ma mig phang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khrud
233b5(mdo sde): pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / brtse ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byed kyis khyad par
233b6(mdo sde): bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsring ste/ mtsho nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge zhing bsams pa bzang la bdag la phan pa dang
233b7(mdo sde): gzhan la phan pa la bzhugs bya snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa dang / gtong ba la srid pa sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong
233b8(mdo sde): chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dag dang 'dir lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjo da// de nas phyis zhig na/ khri'u pad ma'i mig shing rtsa gro de'i kun pag
234a1(mdo sde): ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan bzang po sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byed bzang po
234a2(mdo sde): brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis rgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pos lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri'i bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma
234a3(mdo sde): thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
234a4(mdo sde): spyan mngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsams pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtog
234a5(mdo sde): par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u pad ma'i mig gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo 'thon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rje bcom nas/ rgyu tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
234a6(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag sbyin te/ dge slong dang bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams tshims par byas
234a7(mdo sde): nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung te/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas po la mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi
234a8(mdo sde): brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnams pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par mthor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsang chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams
234b1(mdo sde): cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa nyid khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha'
234b2(mdo sde): dang lag thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar ma gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag
234b3(mdo sde): par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta bar dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjod pa dang / gus par
234b4(mdo sde): smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas re shig na/ de bsod snyoms la song ba dang / skye bo phal po ches de ltar bltas nas/ ngo mtshar bar gyur to// de nas pad ma'i mig bcom ldan
234b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu 'di ni las skyes pa yin pas na/ med par byar mi nus so// de lta mod
234b6(mdo sde): kyis/ ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis mi mthong bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do// de nas dge slong dag the
234b7(mdo sde): chos skyes te/ the tshom pas cad cod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa pad ma mig gis las gang bgyis na/ de 'di ru che bar grags pa dang /
234b8(mdo sde): bcom pazhid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ pad ma mig nyid kyis/ sngon tshe rabs bzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpag
235a1(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ pad ma mig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag
235a2(mdo sde): gzhan su yang su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang
235a3(mdo sde): mi'i khams dang / rlung gis khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched 'ba'
235a4(mdo sde): shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//
235a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
235a6(mdo sde): pa/ bde bar shegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams par gzigs
235a7(mdo sde): zhes bya 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa la/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyis
235a8(mdo sde): 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po ga
235b1(mdo sde): yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la/ sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che'i sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten/ kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad cig yod la/ 'bang
235b2(mdo sde): du dpag tshad cig rgyang grags cig yod la/ bcom ldan 'das der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar pa 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re shig
235b3(mdo sde): na ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru'i don grub ste/ phyir 'ong nas/ des 'di'i nang nas nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po zhig khyer 'ong ste/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod pa
235b4(mdo sde): mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ nor bu rin po che de bcom ldan 'das par gzigs kyis mchod rten kyi char khabs btags nas/ de'i mthus phyogs
235b5(mdo sde): 'tshams thams cad mthon ka'i kha dog lta bur 'dug par byas so// me tog pad ma dag gis kyang / mchod pa byas nas/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di
235b6(mdo sde): lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu bdag mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
235b7(mdo sde): pa/ dge slong dag ji mnyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pad ma'i mig 'di yin te des bcom ldan 'das rnams par gzigs kyi mchod
235b8(mdo sde): rten la/ nor bu rin po che btags pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung ngo // pad ma sngon po dag gis mchod pa byas pa des ni/ mig pad ma
236a1(mdo sde): sngon po lta bur gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar las cig tu nges
236a2(mdo sde): par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las cig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang cig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro//
236a3(mdo sde): las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin par yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na/ las cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las cig/
236a4(mdo sde): tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag yid
236a5(mdo sde): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // rnga sgra zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen
236a6(mdo sde): po rnams dang / phyag po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin
236a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod
236a8(mdo sde): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis tshod shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/
236b1(mdo sde): bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun bsos dang / sman zong rnams mnyes pa/ nyon thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na/ shing n+ya gro
236b2(mdo sde): de'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shakya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'jig pa yangs shing brgya che ba/ rnam thos kyis bu'i nor
236b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyis nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ des de dang lhan gcig tu rtse zhing / dga' la dga' zhing 'gur spong/
236b4(mdo sde): do// brtse zhing dga' la dag mgur sprod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba rgyad dam zla ba dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa
236b5(mdo sde): mdzes pa/ che bar grags pa/ bya dka' la pin ka ltar skad snyan pa/ rnga sgra ltar ga dang snyan pa zhig btsas so// de nas btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'o ming skad
236b6(mdo sde): gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di rnga sgra lta bur ga dang snyan pas na/ der khye'u 'di'i ming rnga sgra zhes gdags so// zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u rnga
236b7(mdo sde): sgra phang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khrud pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang mar nga/
236b8(mdo sde): kun mar dang / mar gyis snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byed bzang ngo cog gis bskyang bsring ste/ mtsho nang gi pad ma bzhin du skyed drag par 'gyur ro// de yang dang pa dang ldan la/
237a1(mdo sde): dge zhing bsams pa bzang la/ bdag la phan pa/ gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa dang / snying rje can/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong /
237a2(mdo sde): ba la srid pa sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go// de nas byis zhig na/ khye'u rnga sgra shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba
237a3(mdo sde): na song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byed bzang po rgyad bcus mdzes
237a4(mdo sde): par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang bar mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu nges
237a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go//
237a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsams pa dang / ba ga la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de
237a7(mdo sde): lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas khye'u rnga sgras 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon
237a8(mdo sde): sum du bya ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge slong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams/ tshims par byas
237b1(mdo sde): nas/ pa ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis snyan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / sgrubs pa dang / 'bad pas/ po la mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo
237b2(mdo sde): zhing mi brtan par rigs nas/ 'du byed kyi rnams pa thams cad brnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnams par 'thor ba dang / rnams par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod
237b3(mdo sde): do// nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bya ste/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang
237b4(mdo sde): bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur gsil bar ma gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa
237b5(mdo sde): dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i
237b6(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad bcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
237b7(mdo sde): 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ rnga sgra gang las dag bgyis na/ des 'di gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur
237b8(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnga sgra nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub par dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la/
238a1(mdo sde): gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas rnams ni rnga sgra nyid kyis las byas shig bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams
238a2(mdo sde): su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyis sa'i khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi
238a3(mdo sde): khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par
238a4(mdo sde): smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong
238a5(mdo sde): dag sngon byung ba las pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/
238a6(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha gu dang mi rnams kyis ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams par gzigs
238a7(mdo sde): shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan zhes bya ba na/ rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams par gzigs
238a8(mdo sde): kyis 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du/ phung po lpags ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gzhan
238b1(mdo sde): yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la/ sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpa' tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang
238b2(mdo sde): rgyang grags cig yod pa cig rtsigs te// der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho rigs dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re shig na khyim bdag
238b3(mdo sde): cig gis/ rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mi las rol mo bslabs te mchod rten de la nyin cig bzhin du rol mo'i sgra skad khyad dag gi bkur sti byed do// dge slong dag
238b4(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rnga sgra 'di yin ste/ des bcom ldan 'das rnams par gzigs kyis mchod rten la/ rol mo'i cha
238b5(mdo sde): byed rnam pa sna tshogs phul ba des na/ rnga sgra lta bur gdangs can du gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyi na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na/ las gcig
238b6(mdo sde): tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnags par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang cig tu nges par dkar
238b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las cig tu nges par gnag par rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams
238b8(mdo sde): spangs la/ las cig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar 'aslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces pas
238'a1(mdo sde): stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / bu zhes bya ba ni// / sangs rgyas
238'a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / phyag po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyis mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang /
238'a3(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang // nam mkha' lding rnams dang / ma 'am ca rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis/ bkur sti
238'a4(mdo sde): byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis/ mchod
238'a5(mdo sde): cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams
238'a6(mdo sde): mnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro ta'i gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shakya phyug cing nor mang la longs skye
238'a7(mdo sde): che ba yongs su 'dzin par yangs shing brgya che ba/ rnam thos kyis bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rig mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing
238'a8(mdo sde): dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dag lon te/ bu btsas nas sha snag gu chen
238'b1(mdo sde): bo byung ste/ pha ma dang khyim de na gnas pa/ gzhan dag dang / g.yog 'khor dang / zhen du rnams kyis de mthong nas/ 'di lta bu bcas pa ni ci yin zhes mi dga' bar 'gyur to//
238'b2(mdo sde): de nas re shig na/ khyim bdag de mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs te/ lag pa la skom btsugs bcas nas/ sems khong su chud cing 'dug ste/ 'di ci yin su la snyad las bla shes
238'b3(mdo sde): pa su yod snyam mo// des de'i blo skyes pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa yin te/ des khyim gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
238'b4(mdo sde): 'das la skud par bya'o snyam nas/ de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin na/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod ma
238'b5(mdo sde): 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ sha snag gu de ras bal legs par smras pa'i nang du chug la/ zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig bzhin/ dus gsum du lag pas bya bas te/
238'b6(mdo sde): 'o mas yang dang yang du gtor gcig dang / de'i 'og tu rdol te bu rgya 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de dag thams cad chen po che'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas khyim bdag des de
238'b7(mdo sde): thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ bsams pa bdag gi bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/ bdag gis brnyed pa legs par brnyed do snyam nas/ des de bzhin du byas pa dang /
238'b8(mdo sde): zhag bdun lon pa dang / sha snag gu de rdol nas bu rgya byung ste/ thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa chan
239a1(mdo sde): po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go// de nas re shig na mthar gyis bskyed bsring nas cher skyes pa dang / de dag thams cad byad gzugs dang / langs tshos
239a2(mdo sde): dregs pas brgyags te/ phan tshun 'khyam pa las/ shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa
239a3(mdo sde): gnyis gyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus legs par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pos lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po
239a4(mdo sde): che'i 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang bar mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
239a5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang
239a6(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston pa mdzad de/ de thos nas thams cad kyis 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo 'thon po nyi shu
239a7(mdo sde): ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan la rab tu byung
239a8(mdo sde): do// de dag thams cad kyis brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas po la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rigs nas/ 'du byed kyis rnams pa/
239b1(mdo sde): thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung dang / ma rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par brtsad chod do// nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs la/ dgra bcom
239b2(mdo sde): ba nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil tu 'dra ba'i/
239b3(mdo sde): sems can dang ldan pa tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/
239b4(mdo sde): srid pa'i snyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis brjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to//
239b5(mdo sde): de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad bcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gis/ las gang dag bgyis//
239b6(mdo sde): des sman du gyur la/ tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni mas kyi sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa
239b7(mdo sde): dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pas na/ 'di dag nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams
239b8(mdo sde): su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyir rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams
240a1(mdo sde): la/ rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba'
240a2(mdo sde): shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs zhing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//
240a3(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rigs pa dang zhabs
240a4(mdo sde): su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang / mi rnams kyis ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams par gzig
240a5(mdo sde): shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas
240a6(mdo sde): kyis 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal
240a7(mdo sde): po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la/ sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten 'khor ra 'khor yug tu dpag tshad cig
240a8(mdo sde): yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags cig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srogs chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas
240b1(mdo sde): re shig na/ mdza' sde po brgya phyir rol du byung ba dang / de dag gi mchod rten de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te de dag gis lhan cig tu/ til mar spos can
240b2(mdo sde): gyis byugs nas/ me tog dang / me tog phreng dag/ mar me phul ba dag gis kyang brten bkur byas nas/ lhan cig tu smon lam btab pa bdag cag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der
240b3(mdo sde): sman du gyur te/ lhan cig tu lto cig kho na nas 'byung bar gyur cig/ chen po che'i stobs kyis shugs thob pa dang / byad gzugs dang ldan par gyur cig/ ma 'ongs pa'i ba dus na
240b4(mdo sde): yang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi nyes par byed par ma gyur cig/ ces byas so// dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus
240b5(mdo sde): na/ 'dza' sde bor gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ chen po che 'di dag yin te/ de dag gis lhan cig tu mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na/ 'di ltar gcig tu skyes te/ chen po che'i
240b6(mdo sde): stobs kyis shugs thog par gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni gcig tu 'thun par rab tu byung nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar na/ las cig
240b7(mdo sde): tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang cig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las cig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang cig tu nges par dkar bar
240b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na/ las cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spang /
241a1(mdo sde): la/ las cig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
241a2(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // bam po bcu drug pa//
241a3(mdo sde): nyi ma zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyis mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang /
241a4(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
241a5(mdo sde): bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phyed chen po rnams
241a6(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / sun bsos dang / sman
241a7(mdo sde): zongs rnams mnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas ni/ shing n+ya gro ti'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ ser skya'i gnas na/
241a8(mdo sde): shAkya byug cing nor mang ma longs spyod chab/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyis bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam par las chungs/
241b1(mdo sde): blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon
241b2(mdo sde): pa dang / bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing bsta na sdug la mdzes pa/ nor bu rin po che mgo la thogs po/ zhig bcas nas de las khor 'khor yug du nyi ma'i 'od zer
241b3(mdo sde): lta bur 'gro ste/ de'i nang nas snang bas/ chen po che grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad khyab par gyur pas/ nyin mo bzhin snang bar byas so// de nas pha ma dang / khyim de na
241b4(mdo sde): gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor rnams dang / nye du rnam par ser skya'i gnas na/ 'khod pa'i shakya rnams kyis/ de mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur pa/ dga' bas rgyas so// de nas
241b5(mdo sde): btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u de'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming mdogs par byed de/ de nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di btsas ma thag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nyi
241b6(mdo sde): ma'i bzhin du snang ba byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming nyi ma zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u nyi mas pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma khrud
241b7(mdo sde): pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / brtse ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyis khyad par
241b8(mdo sde): bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsring ste/ mtsho na gis pad ma bzhin du/ skye drags par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsams pa bzang la/ bdag la phan
242a1(mdo sde): pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rjes can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa skyes dgu la byams pa gtong ba la srid pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba
242a2(mdo sde): rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dag pa/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/ de nas phyis re shig na/ khyi'u nyi ma shing n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcon
242a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas
242a4(mdo sde): lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri'i bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas// mthong ma thag tu nges bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas
242a5(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la
242a6(mdo sde): nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu chos stan te/ des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa/ rab tu sbyin pa dag byin
242a7(mdo sde): te/ dge slong dag bram ze dang / dkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams tshims par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // de nas
242a8(mdo sde): brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas pho la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi bstan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyis rnams pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /
242b1(mdo sde): ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sums du byas te/ dgra
242b2(mdo sde): bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa tsan dan spangs pa
242b3(mdo sde): lta bur gsil bar ma gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa
242b4(mdo sde): dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang brjed pa dang // gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas gang gis che che/
