242b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa nyi ma bsod snyoms la 'gro ba de tshe/ bram ze dang khyim bdag ma dad pa rnams 'phya zhing smod la rkog byas byed de/ nga 'di 'di ltar nor bu rin po che mgo la thogs nas/ lam
242b6(mdo sde): po che'i dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum d+mo dag tu 'khyad pa lags na/ shakya'i bu'i dge slong rnams kyis dge slong gi tshul 'di tshig pa'o// bram ze'i tshul ni ma tshig pa'o// zhes 'dzer
242b7(mdo sde): to// de nas de shin tu ngo tsha bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
242b8(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gis nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu 'di las las skyes pa yin
243a1(mdo sde): yin pas na/ med par byar mi nus so// de lta mod kyis ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis ni mi thong bar bya'o// de nas bcom
243a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do// dge slong dag the tshom thams cad bcod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nyi mas las gang dag bgyis na de che
243a3(mdo sde): bar grags pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu/ tshogs cing rkyen grub pa dang
243a4(mdo sde): ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'gyur la/ gdon mi za bar las byas shing bsags pas na/ nyi ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag thams cad gzhan su zhig gis nyams
243a5(mdo sde): su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol kyi sa'i khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi kham
243a6(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par
243a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// skal pa rgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba
243a8(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshes
243b1(mdo sde): pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten
243b2(mdo sde): du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na/ rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyis 'phrin las thams
243b3(mdo sde): cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen ldan na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i
243b4(mdo sde): sku gdung la/ sku gdung gis mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra 'khor yug tu dpag tshad cig yod la/ pang du rgyang grags cig yod pa zhig
243b5(mdo sde): rtsigs te/ der song ba srogs chags 'bum brag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten de'i mchod la bab pa na/ bram ze
243b6(mdo sde): dang / khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis/ spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis
243b7(mdo sde): mchod pa byed do// de nas re shig na mi zhig rgyal po dang / rgyal pos rtses nas skags su nor bu rin po che shel mig thob bo// de nas dad pa bskyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzig
243b8(mdo sde): kyis mchod rten gyi char khabs la btags te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su btong ba 'dis
244a1(mdo sde): na bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes pa byed par ma gyur cig/ nor
244a2(mdo sde): bu rin po che 'di lta bu yang spyi bo la thogs pa bzhin du/ ma'i lto ba nas byung bar gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i
244a3(mdo sde): tshe de'i dus na mchod rten la bkur sti byed pa gang yin pa ste/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyis mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa dang / nor bu rin po che btags pa des
244a4(mdo sde): na 'di'i mgo la rin po che byung la/ rgyu de nyis kyis gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas/ dge slong dag de bas na las
244a5(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang cig tu nges par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro//
244a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na las cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed
244a7(mdo sde): kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
244a8(mdo sde): gyad kyi ba dan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po rnams dang po zang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dpa/
244b1(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
244b2(mdo sde): kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas ste/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto baphye chen rnam
244b3(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bzla dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong
244b4(mdo sde): rnams rnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul gser skye'i gnas na/ shing n+ya kro ta'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na ser skya'i gnas na/ shakya
244b5(mdo sde): phyag cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gren pa zhigs gnas pa des/
244b6(mdo sde): rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu brtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas zla
244b7(mdo sde): brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ khyi'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni thob pa shig bcas pa de'i tshe lha rnam
244b8(mdo sde): kyis khor 'khor yug nas lha'i ba dan dag sgreng ngo // lha'i rol mo'i cha byad dag kyang bdud ngo // lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dag
245a1(mdo sde): gis kyang gtor te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad du grags pas rgyas par gyur to// khyim thams cad du yang ngo'i phyir ba dan bsgreng ngo // de nas
245a2(mdo sde): btsas nas btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di btsas pa na/ 'jig rten thams cad du grags pas rgyas pa
245a3(mdo sde): na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming snyan grags shes gdags so// zhes zer ro// de nas khyi'u snyan grags pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khrud
245a4(mdo sde): pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / brtse ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ma ma brgyad la btang nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar kyis snying khu dang / gzhan
245a5(mdo sde): yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gi bskyed bsring te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skyes drag par gyur te/ de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang la/ bdag
245a6(mdo sde): la ban pa/ gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa ka go// de nas re shig na/ khye'u snyan grags/ shing n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra bar song
245a7(mdo sde): ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byed bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od
245a8(mdo sde): 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lpags pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das
245b1(mdo sde): la sems dga' bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom
245b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i chos bstan te de
245b3(mdo sde): thos te/ khye'u snyan grags kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes rdo rje bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang /
245b4(mdo sde): rab tu sbyin pa dag sbyin nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / dkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams tshoms par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa
245b5(mdo sde): la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi rten par rig nas/ 'du byed kyis rnams pa thams
245b6(mdo sde): cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par brtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid
245b7(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa dang / na mkha' dang lags 'thil tu 'dra ba'i sems
245b8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag pa'i rig pa thob pa/
246a1(mdo sde): srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta bar dang / dang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang /
246a2(mdo sde): gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de la gsol ba btab te/ phul ba'i gos spyod de gsol btab te/ phul ba ma yin pa'i nyung ngu spyod do// gsol ba btab ste phul
246a3(mdo sde): ba'i zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad sos dang / sman zongs spyod de// gsol btab ste/ phul ba ma yin de nyung ngu spyod do// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tsom
246a4(mdo sde): thams cad bcod pa da/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa snyan grags kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des btsas ma thag tu lha rnams kyis ba ngan bsgrengs te/
246a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten du grags pas rgyas par gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag snyan grags nyid
246a6(mdo sde): kyis/ sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal gzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sran
246a7(mdo sde): grags nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la
246a8(mdo sde): rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams
246b1(mdo sde): ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skyes mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs
246b2(mdo sde): shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
246b3(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jigs rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnam
246b4(mdo sde): kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen lnga na/ rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re
246b5(mdo sde): shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan la
246b6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la/ sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las
246b7(mdo sde): byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags cig yod pa cig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho
246b8(mdo sde): ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re shig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyis mchod rten de la dus ston byas nas/ mchod rten gyi dus ston byas pa der/ gyang 'gyed pa rnams kyis/
247a1(mdo sde): ba dan dag bsgred do// de nas re shig na rgyal po'i gyad cig gis/ gyad cig non pa dang / des gyad kyis ba dan thob nas des de blang ste/ srog
247a2(mdo sde): chags 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor gyi steng gi srog shing btags nas/ smon lam gdab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta
247a3(mdo sde): bu bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes pa byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus ni gyur pa gang yin
247a4(mdo sde): pa de ni skan grags 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la/ bstan bkur byas pa des na/ 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas pa myong bar
247a5(mdo sde): 'gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yangs
247a6(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams ni
247a7(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa yang ma 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na/ las cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu
247a8(mdo sde): nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong
247b1(mdo sde): ngag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bston do// gang po las sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa rgya pa las/ rtogs pa brjod pa sna tshogs shes
247b2(mdo sde): bya ste/ sdom ni tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// // sdom ni// / 'od bzang ma dang // rab sdug ma// dkar mo zla ba ud pa la/ mche
247b3(mdo sde): ldan ma dang mu tig dang // ka tsang ga la bde byed ma// mig sdug sde tsan bcad de rten// / 'od bzang zhes bya ba ni// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/
247b4(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon pa rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
247b5(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/
247b6(mdo sde): mchod par byas ste/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgya/
247b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bzla' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams mnyes pa/ nya
247b8(mdo sde): thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyis tshal/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na bzhugs so// de
248a1(mdo sde): tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos
248a2(mdo sde): bu'i nor dang 'dren pa zhig gnas pa des na/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu brtse zhing dga' la/ dga' mgur spyod do// de brtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur
248a3(mdo sde): spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ lha'i rgyan gyis klubs pa/ nor bu rin
248a4(mdo sde): po che mgul na thogs pa zhig btsas te/ de las 'od byung ba des gnyen du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas so// de nas de btsas pa'i tsas ston byas nas/ bu mo de'i ming ji skad gdags
248a5(mdo sde): zhes ming mdogs par byed do// nye du rnams na re bu mo 'di btsas ma thag tu nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis gnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar bya na de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i 'od bzang ma zhes bya'o// /
248a6(mdo sde): zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo de 'od bzang ma phangs na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'am ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khrud pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / brtse ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ma ma
248a7(mdo sde): brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang zhus mar dang / mar gyis snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyis khyad par bzang po cog gis bskyed bsring ste/
248a8(mdo sde): mtsho'i nang gis pad ma bzhin du skyes drag par gyur/ bu mo de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang la/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig te/ de
248b1(mdo sde): la slong ba su dang su 'ongs kyang rung ba de dag la mgul nas rgyan bkrol te sbyin par byed do// byin nas kyang yang brgyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gang gis che bu mo de mthar gyis
248b2(mdo sde): chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyis bu mang po dag de slong du 'ong ngo // de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/ de'i pha la/
248b3(mdo sde): pa la skom bcugs byas te/ bsams pa gal te cig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gis dgrar 'gyur ro// snyam nas sems khong su chud cing 'dug go// de nas re shig na bu
248b4(mdo sde): mo des/ pha sems khong su chud pa mthong nas smras pa/ yab ci zhig gis sems khong su chud cing bzhugs/ de nas de'i don rgyas par rnyed de// de nas bu mo de na re/ yab thugs
248b5(mdo sde): ngan ma mdzad cig dang / da ste zhag bdun na/ bdag nyid kyis khyim thabs 'dam par bya'o// zhes zer ro// de nas tshong dpon des rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol te/ gnyen du
248b6(mdo sde): yod par dril bsgrags te/ da ste zhag bdun na bu mo 'od bzang ma rang nyid kyis khyim 'thab 'dam par chas kyis/ khyed kyis bya ba gang yin pa gyis shig ces byas so// de nas/
248b7(mdo sde): zhag bdun lon pa dang / bu mo 'ong bzang ma shing rta la zhon te/ chos gos tshon can gyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis skra gzugs ri mor bris
248b8(mdo sde): te/ bstod pa mngon cing srang du zhugs so// de nas deng rgyal po'i bu rnams dang blon pa'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyis bu rnams dang / des ming smon byed cing blta ba de dag la
249a1(mdo sde): gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bya bar bshad de bdag gis khyed la gang gis sgo nas log go// bu mo 'od bzang ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/
249a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom 'das kyi de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang /
249a3(mdo sde): khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas bu mo 'od bzang ma stan las lang ste// bla gos
249a4(mdo sde): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar bar btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
249a5(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po thob tu rung na/ bdag
249a6(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du/ tshangs par spyod sprad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la/ gdul bar bya ba mang po de dag des 'dres mar 'gyur
249a7(mdo sde): bar thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo song la 'khor rnams kyang ltos shig/ de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyis tshal nas byung ste/
249a8(mdo sde): mang du thos pa'i nang du song ba dang / der so so nas bsams pa/ 'dir thus dbrog par bya'o snyam ste/ de dag gis de bzung bar byas so// de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma de dag gis bskan
249b1(mdo sde): pa dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dam ma rkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags ste/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par
249b2(mdo sde): bya ste/ de nas de dag gis lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang spu zing zhes byas nas/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du/ rkang pa la phyag
249b3(mdo sde): 'tshal nas/ gsol ba btab pa/ sru mar byon khyod kyis chos 'di lta bu sngon sum du byas pa las na/ khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid do// zhes byas so// de nas bu mo 'od bzang
249b4(mdo sde): me nam mkha' las babs nas/ skye bo phal po che'i gul la 'dug te/ gang thos pas/ srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bsten to//
249b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad de/ de rab tu byung ste/ snyen pa rdzogs par byas so// de nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad
249b6(mdo sde): pas phol mig lnga ba'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi bstan par rig nas/ 'du byed thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par mthor ba dang / rnam par 'jig
249b7(mdo sde): pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur
249b8(mdo sde): nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan ngan spangs pa lta bur gsil bar gyur pa/ rigs pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/
250a1(mdo sde): rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / dbang po dang
250a2(mdo sde): nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis/ mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyed de/ the tsom thams cad bcod pa/
250a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ 'od bzang mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mgul pa nas kyang
250a4(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'od bzang ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan
250a5(mdo sde): dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 'od bzang ma nyid kyis
250a6(mdo sde): las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byis shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnams par
250a7(mdo sde): smin par mi 'gyur la/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin
250a8(mdo sde): pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// bskal pa rgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs
250b1(mdo sde): shing dus bab pa// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
250b2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyis
250b3(mdo sde): ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams par gzigs zhes bye ba 'jig rten du byang ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang
250b4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po dpang pa lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan la/
250b5(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i ska gdung la/ skra gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che
250b6(mdo sde): sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug du dpag ma tshad cig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig rtsigs so// de nas re shig na/ rgyal po
250b7(mdo sde): gnyan yod kyi btsun mo dam pa rgas nas rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs lus las bkrol te/ mchod rten de la phul lo/ de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ smon lam btab pa/
250b8(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems skyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong 'dis na/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan
251a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po gnyen yod kyi grong khyer btsun mo dam par gyur pa gang yin pa de
251a2(mdo sde): ni'od bzang ma 'di yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs btags pa des na/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug
251a3(mdo sde): la mdzes pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de
251a4(mdo sde): ltar na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas nas/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
251a5(mdo sde): ni rnam par smin pa yang nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu
251a6(mdo sde): nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar
251a7(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs par la mngon par bstod do//
251a8(mdo sde): rab sdug ma zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / bo brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /
251b1(mdo sde): tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang
251b2(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
251b3(mdo sde): dang / lto 'byo chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan
251b4(mdo sde): dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams rnyed pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ gnyen du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin kyis
251b5(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin kyi chung ma la bu chags de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta
251b6(mdo sde): na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad ldan pa/ gnyen du yod pa na gsan pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyi snying du rab tu sdug pa zhig btsas so// de nas de
251b7(mdo sde): bcos pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdag zhes ming 'dogs byas byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ bu mo 'di skyes po thams cad kyis snying du sdug pas
251b8(mdo sde): na de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming rab sdug ma zhes gdags so// zhes zer ro// de yang tshe rabs dran te/ skyes ma thag tu tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ sbyin pa byin pa mang
252a1(mdo sde): myur ci yang rung // zhing gi khyed par gzhi las 'phel bar 'gyur// de'i phyir mkhas pas sgrims te// rten du 'dod pas lha dang / mi'i dbang phyug
252a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sbyin// de nas pha ma dang / gzhan yang khyim de na gnas pa'i rnams kyis/ tshig brjod pa de thos nas skrag cing spangs te mi dga' bar gyur la kyi bung zhes byas
252a3(mdo sde): nas smras pa/ kye ma bu mo 'di ni sha za mo zhig go/ des smras pa/ yum bdag ni sha za mo yang ma lags so// bdag ni bu mo lags te/ sbyin pa dag byin par 'tshal lo// de nas
252a4(mdo sde): de'i mas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la/ bu mo 'di skad ces 'chi'o zhes gtad do// de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge
252a5(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ khyim bdag kyi nang du gsol te/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i rab 'don du bcugs go/ de nas gang gis tshe bu mo de mthar kyis lo bdun lon pa de'i
252a6(mdo sde): tshe/ pa ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ de dge slong ma thams cad la sdug pa dang / phangs pa dang / snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar
252a7(mdo sde): gyur to// re shig na de'i tshe/ mu ge'i bar gyi skal ba dang 'dra ba'i mu ge chen po byung nas/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bza' ba dang ltung ba med bshig go// de nas der btso
252a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la/ rab sdug ma la nga na re/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la khyod kyi zla ba gsum gyi bar du
252b1(mdo sde): gos dang / zas dang / lam cha dang stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams phul gcig ces bgyis shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rab sdug ma'i thad du song
252b2(mdo sde): nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod kyis 'khor bzhi po rnams la zla ba gsum kyi bar du/ gos dang zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang
252b3(mdo sde): sman zong rnams phul gcig ces bka' stsal to// de nas rab sdug mas thal mo sbyar ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi bos mnos nas/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras
252b4(mdo sde): so// de nas rab sdug spyod yul gyi grong khyer blta ba'i phyir/ gtun du yod par chas so// de nas re shig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi gtam de thos nas/ shin du
252b5(mdo sde): ring par rab sdug ma'i mdun du song ste smras pa/ rab sdug ma gar 'gro// des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de zla ba gsum gyi bar du/ zhal ta ba'i las byed/
252b6(mdo sde): bar sgom pa/ mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ khyed kyis de dag thams cad bdag gis sbyar gyis/ khyod kyis bya mi dgos so// rab sdug mas smras pa/ gal te/
252b7(mdo sde): yab bden pa mthong ba lags la/ sa'i 'og tu smras pa'i gter rnams kyang mngon du gzigs na/ sbyar ba 'di ngo mtshar che ba ci mchis/ 'on kyang bdag ni skye bo dbul
252b8(mdo sde): bo la phan gdags pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid do// de bzhin du dag brnyed lnga rgya dang / btsun mo phreng rgyud ma dang / rgyal rigs kyi bu mo dbyar tshul ma dang / btsun
253a1(mdo sde): mo 'khor gyi bla drang srong sbyin dang / gna' mi dang / ri dwags 'dzin kyi ma sa ga dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal rnams kyis kyang / skabs bye ste/ khyod
253a2(mdo sde): kyis bya mi dgos so zhes byas so// de nas nags khung du song nas/ der mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can dag gis kyang skabs phye'o// de ltar skabs bye nas/ des bcom ldan
253a3(mdo sde): 'das gnyen yod kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ zla ba gsum kyi bar du/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang /
253a4(mdo sde): sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// de zla gsum po 'di nyid kyis bskabs su brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo
253a5(mdo sde): zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam par thams cad rnyil ba/ ltung ba dang / rnams par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin brtsad chod do// zhon/
253a6(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad spangs pa nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum dus te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / nam
253a7(mdo sde): mkha' dang / lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes
253a8(mdo sde): pa dang / so so yang dag rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing
253b1(mdo sde): brjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum 'das pa dang / chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin zin nas/ lhung bzed snams
253b2(mdo sde): nas/ chos gos gsol te/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu gnyen du yod pa nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu chas te gshegs so// de nas rab sdug mas/ bcom
253b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das dang lam du 'jal nas/ 'o rgyal mi 'tshal zhes gsol to// de nas re shig nas nags khung chu dang ldan pa zhig tu phyin nas/ grol bab pa na rgyags kyang med nas/
253b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs par gsol to// de nas lhung bzed lag pa g.yon pa la bzhag ste/ tshig su smras pa/ gal te bsod nam
253b5(mdo sde): dag gis rnam par smin pa yod ce na// de dag gi lhung zed bza' ba dang / bca' ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs gyis gang bar gyur cig/ ces byas so// de nas lha'i bdud
253b6(mdo sde): brtsis bskang ngo // de nas rab sdug gis gral rim bzhin du/ dge slong ma rab sdug gis dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung bzed rnams zhal zas kyis bkang nas/ de bcom ldan
253b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos ma bsod nams byas pa rnams kyi mchog 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma rab sdug ma yin no// de nas dge slong
253b8(mdo sde): dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ rab sdug mas las gang dag bgyis nas/ de phyug po'i rigs su
254a1(mdo sde): skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyis bkur la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du bgyis
254a2(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rab sdug ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du/ tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du
254a3(mdo sde): 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pas na/ rab sdug ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong rab 'gyur te/ dge
254a4(mdo sde): slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol kyi sa'i khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par
254a5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi
254a6(mdo sde): las rnams ni// bskal pa rgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang
254a7(mdo sde): po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
254a8(mdo sde): skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer ba ra na sen/
254b1(mdo sde): drang srong smra ba'i rigs dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung / snga dro shams thabs dang / chos gos dgos te/
254b2(mdo sde): lhung zed bsnams nas/ dge slong tshogs kyi zhams ring byas te/ mdun du bdar nas ba ra na sir bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re shig na tshong dpon zhigs g.yog
254b3(mdo sde): 'khor dang / bcas te skyed mos tshal du song nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / mang po de dag kyang khyer ro// de nas re zhig na de'i mngag zhug bu mo zhig 'bras pa can gyi
254b4(mdo sde): gzeb khyer te/ jo bo'i phyi bzhin 'gro ba las bu mo mngag bzhag ma des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lam kar mthong nas/ de dga' bar gyur te/
254b5(mdo sde): blo skes pa/ bdag la dzes lan gnyis su bran mor byar ci yod kyis/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas des gsad pa dang /
254b6(mdo sde): bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsngos nas/ 'bras can gyi gze ba phye ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ zhal zas sna tshogs kyis tshims par
254b7(mdo sde): byas so// de nas tshong dpon gyi thad du song ba dang / re shig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo 'bras can gyi gzeb de ga re zhes dris so// des smras pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang
254b8(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od bsrung la zhal zas phul lo zhes byas pa dang / tshong dpon gyis de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to// de nas de dga' zhing mgu la rab
255a1(mdo sde): tu dga' nas smras/ bu mo khyod dang phyin chad/ bran mo las byung gis song shig/ khyod kyis bdag nyid kyis log pa na/ mel tse byas pa yin no//
255a2(mdo sde): zhes smras so// de nas dathal mo sbyar te khyim bdag la gsol pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi brtan pa la rab tu byung bar cig gnang zhes byas so// de nas khyim bdag des/
255a3(mdo sde): lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang byin nas/ de jo bos byin pa'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ de bcom ldan 'das 'od
255a4(mdo sde): srung gis gsung rab la/ lo dgu stong gis bar du zhal ta pa'i las byas te/ 'bras can dang / skyo ma dang / thug pa btung ba dang / 'dron du 'bod pa dang / mar me'i phreng ba
255a5(mdo sde): dang / chos gos sra rkyang rnams dang / sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa rnams kyang phul te/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis dkar bas bsgrubs te/ bcom ldan 'das 'od
255a6(mdo sde): srung la byin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems skyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag bcom ldan
255a7(mdo sde): 'das shakya thub pa'i gsung rab la rab tu byang ba thob par gyur cig/ ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i
255a8(mdo sde): tshe de'i dus na/ bu mo mngag bzhugs mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab tu ga ma 'di yin te/ de bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la zhal zas phul ba des na/ phyug po'i
255b1(mdo sde): rigs su skyes ste/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyis bkur bar gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni/ da ltar dgra brtsi
255b2(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du bya so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang cig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las
255b3(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnams par smin pa yang nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge
255b4(mdo sde): slong dag de bas na las cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/
255b5(mdo sde): dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
255b6(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do// // dkar mo zhes bya ba ni// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams
255b7(mdo sde): dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang /
255b8(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri sor byas/ mchod pa byas te/
256a1(mdo sde): lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgus
256a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams gnyis pa/ nyan thos
256a3(mdo sde): kyis dge 'dun dang bcas/ ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe shakya rnams kyis nang na/ shAkya rnam zhes bya ba/ phyag cing nor mang la
256a4(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyis bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'dran pa shig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las
256a5(mdo sde): chung ma blangs nas/ de dang ldan gcig tu brtse zhing dga' la dga' mgar sprod kyang / bu yang med te/ lag pa la skom btsug bcas nas/ bsam pa bdag gi khyim nor/
256a6(mdo sde): du ma dang / ldan du zin kyang bdag la bu yang med bu mo yang med pas/ bdag ma 'ong ba'i 'og tu ni bu mo med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro//
256a7(mdo sde): snyam te sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ de nas dge slong dang / bram ze dang / bltas mkhan dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / rtsa lag gzhan su zhig dag gis lha la
256a8(mdo sde): gsol ba thob shig ces de la bsgo'o// de nas de bu 'dod pas gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs la sogs pa dang / lha khyed par can gzhan
256b1(mdo sde): dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i
256b2(mdo sde): lha dang / chos 'thun pa'i lha dang // rtag tu phyi gzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so// 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab so// rgyas bu dang bu mo skyes
256b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// zhes pa'i gtam yod mod kyis/ de yang de lta ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skyes par 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur
256b4(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// de gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skyes par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhes na/ pha ma
256b5(mdo sde): gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab pa ci zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro//
256b6(mdo sde): de nas de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dag la/ sems can zhig kyang sems can kyis rigs zhig nas shi 'phos nas/ de'i chu'i ma'i ltor zhugs nas de khyim thab
256b7(mdo sde): la bran no// de nas khyim thab kyis smras pa/ bzang po gal te khye'u zhig btsas na ni legs/ de ma yin te bu mo zhig btsas na ni/ de nyid dang bcas te khyed khyim nas kar te//
256b8(mdo sde): btong ngo // de nas re shig na de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing bstan sdug la mdzes pa/ mi kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dzin
257a1(mdo sde): ma thob pa/ gos dkar po gyon pa/ mngal gyi dri mas ma gos pa zhig btsas so// de nas re shig na/ shAkya rnar mas khyod kyi chung ma las byung ste/ bu
257a2(mdo sde): mo zhig btsas so zhes thos pa dang / de khros te nang du song ngo // de nas de'i chung mas lha'i gos gyon pa'i bu mo phul lo// de nas shakya rnar mas bu mo mthong nas/ mchog tu ya
257a3(mdo sde): mtshan tu gyur to// de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di gos dkar po gyon bzhin du gnas pas na/ de'i phyir bu
257a4(mdo sde): mo 'di'i ming dkar mo gdags so zhes smras so// de nas bu mo dkar mo pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / sna ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khrud pa'i ma ma gnyis
257a5(mdo sde): dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma rgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byed kyi khyad
257a6(mdo sde): par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsring ste/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// bu mo dkar mo ci tsam du gos de dag kyang skye ste dri ma can du yang ma 'gyur la/
257a7(mdo sde): de'i lus la yang dri ma gos par mi 'gyur ro// de nas gang gi che bu mo dkar mo mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po bu rnams dang / blon po bu rnams dang / tshong dpon
257a8(mdo sde): kyis bu la sogs pa mang po dag de slong du 'ong ngo // de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/ de'i pha lag pa la skom tshugs bcas te/ bsams pa/ gal te cig la byin
257b1(mdo sde): na ni/ gzhan dag bdag gis dgra 'gyur ro snyam nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de nas re shig na/ bu mo nges pa sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa mthong
257b2(mdo sde): nas smras pa/ yang ci zhig gis sems khongs su chud cing bzhugs/ de nas de'i don rgyas par rnyed do// de nas bu mo ni re yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig bdag ni 'dod
257b3(mdo sde): pa la don du gnyer ba ma lags gas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung gis/ yab gyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas re shig na//
257b4(mdo sde): de pha ma gnyis la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ gos gang dag gyon te btsas pa de dag nyid chos gos lnga tshang bar gyur to// de nas
257b5(mdo sde): des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas po la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rigs nas 'du byed kyi rnams pa thams cad rnyil
257b6(mdo sde): ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnams par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
257b7(mdo sde): sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang /
257b8(mdo sde): ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsel bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa gsum
258a1(mdo sde): thob pa dang / srid pa'i sbed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang /
258a2(mdo sde): gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dkar mos lnga
258a3(mdo sde): gang dag bgyis na/ des phyug pa'i rigs su skyes te gzug bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / gos dkar mo gyon pa dang rab tu byung nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsuM
258a4(mdo sde): du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dkar mo nyid kyis sngon che rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin
258a5(mdo sde): du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas dkar mo nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/
258a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol kyi sa'i khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnams par
258a7(mdo sde): smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skyes mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnams par smin par 'gyur ro//
258a8(mdo sde): lus can dag gis las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
258b1(mdo sde): na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i rtse mo ki khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten/
258b2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong
258b3(mdo sde): khyer ba ra na si na/ drang srong smra ba'i rigs kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas re shig na tshong dpon gyi chung ma dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba cig 'dug
258b4(mdo sde): pa don cig la drang srong smra ba'i gnas su song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par rgyan pa/ dpe byed
258b5(mdo sde): bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ste//
258b6(mdo sde): mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis/
258b7(mdo sde): de la chos bstan nas des dad pa rnyed de/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim bdag kyi nang du shos gsol nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos
258b8(mdo sde): srab brkyang bul lo// de nas mthar gyis pa ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis snyan pa la rab tu byung ngo // dge slong dag 'i snyam du sems/ da'i cha de'i dus sa chod/
259a1(mdo sde): bya bya/ dpon gyis chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong ma dkar mo 'di yin te/ des dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra kyang phul pa des na//
259a2(mdo sde): gos dkar po gyon bzhin du btsas so// tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa de'i tshe/ tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig
259a3(mdo sde): tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang cig tu nges par gnags par 'gyur ro// las cig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang nges par dkar
259a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na/ las cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams/
259a5(mdo sde): spangs la/ las cig tu dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste// dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
259a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag yin rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bston do// // bam po bcu bdun pa/
259a7(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang/
259a8(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnam
259b1(mdo sde): kyi bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
259b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / grwa zim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / spun zong rnam
259b3(mdo sde): mnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ gnyen du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba nA bzhugs so// de'i
259b4(mdo sde): tshe gnyen du yod pa na bram ze byug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyis bu'i nor dang 'gren
259b5(mdo sde): pa zhig gnas so// de yang rig byed gsum gyi mthar phyin te/ ming gi rnams grangs dang / shes gsol ba dang / bcas pa dang / yi ge rab tu dbye ba dang / lnga pa ste/ gtam
259b6(mdo sde): rgyad dang / bcas pa rnams tshigs re re nas bde bcod nus pa zhig go// de nas de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya/ bram ze'i sngags 'don pa'i slob dpon byed do// de nas de bu dgro
259b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blang nas/ de dang lhan gcig tu brtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de brtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la
259b8(mdo sde): bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa
260a1(mdo sde): zhig btsas so// de nas btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// nye du rnams na re/ bdag cag
260a2(mdo sde): gi bu tsa phal cher zla ba zhes 'dogs pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming zla ba zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo zla ba phang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / num snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khrud pa'i ma baN+Di dang
260a3(mdo sde): dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byed kyi khyed par
260a4(mdo sde): bzang ngo cog bskyed bsring ste/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de nas mo zla ba mthar gyis chen por gyur pa dang / des de kho na shing gsal ba/ yid bzhud
260a5(mdo sde): pa dang / bya ba la gsal ba dang / dran pa dang / ldan pa dang / thos pa 'dzin par gyur to// de nas re shig na/ de'i pha ma bram ze'i khye'u rnams la sngags bslob pa na/ de thos
260a6(mdo sde): pa tsam gyis lob so// thos nas kyang bstan bcos de dag lhag 'od sbyar zhing 'cha' nus so// de nas de'i grags pas gnyan du yod pa thams cad rgyas par gyur to// mu
260a7(mdo sde): stegs can dag kyang nyin cig bzhin du de la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ de dang ldan gcig tu gtad la 'beb par byed do// de nas gang gis che/ bcom ldan 'das bla na
260a8(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ gnyen du yod par gshegs nas mkhas pa rnams dang / mkhas par bgrang ba de dag/
260b1(mdo sde): phal cher bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir der 'dong bar byed do// de nas ngag mi rnams na/ nang gi rnams la smras pa/ kye ci'i phyir bstan shes pa dag mi 'ong bar 'di la rgyu ci
260b2(mdo sde): yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ shakya thub pa 'dir gshegs te/ de dag thams cad de la gzhol bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas
260b3(mdo sde): bya ba'i sgra/ sngon ma byung ba thos nas/ de spu zing thams cad zin zhes byas so// de nas bu zla bas/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra thos na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du
260b4(mdo sde): song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dbye bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas
260b5(mdo sde): pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang bar mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan
260b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bu mo zla ba'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal
260b7(mdo sde): ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas bu mo zla bas 'jig tshogs
260b8(mdo sde): la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo thon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas ste bden pa mthong nas/ skye dgu'i bdag me chen mo'i thad du rab
261a1(mdo sde): tu byung ngo // de nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing ma brtan par rig nas/
261a2(mdo sde): 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang rnam par mthor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra
261a3(mdo sde): bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa nyid khams sum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du
261a4(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bu gsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par thob pa/
261a5(mdo sde): srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur
261a6(mdo sde): to// de nas gang gis tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong khyed cag gis zla ba phyed byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo bshad pa nod par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/ skye dgu
261a7(mdo sde): bdag mo chen mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i lung dbog tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas so sor thar pa'i lung dbog tu gsol/ bcom ldan
261a8(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ dge slong ma'i cho ga re re nas chos kyis lung 'dog par mi mdzad do//
261b1(mdo sde): gal te khyed las lan cig smras pas 'dzin nus pa 'ga' zhig yod na ni ngas lung 'bog go// de nas de'i tshe dge slong ma zla ba 'khor de nyid kyis nang du/ 'dus par gyur te/
261b2(mdo sde): 'dug go/ de nas dge slong ma zla ba stan las lang ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
261b3(mdo sde): lan cig bka' stsal pas bdag gis bzang bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i lung dbog tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas so sor thar pa'i lung
261b4(mdo sde): dpog tu gsol de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas par lung dbog par mdzad nas/ lan cig bka' stsal pas/ dge slong ma zla bas lobs so// der bcom ldan 'das
261b5(mdo sde): kyis dge slong rnams la stsal pa/ de'i nyan thos kyis dge slong ma mang du thos pa rnams dang / thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin no// /
261b6(mdo sde): de nas dge slong dag ce tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong ma zla bas las gang dag bgyis shing
261b7(mdo sde): bsags pa des na/ phyug po'i rigs su skyes ste/ gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ thos pa 'dzin par gyur lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
261b8(mdo sde): dge slong dag zla ba nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'gyur la/ gdon mi za bar 'ongs pa'i las de dag
262a1(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pas na/ zla ba nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur to// dge slong dag las
262a2(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur
262a3(mdo sde): te/ las dge ba dang mi dge byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnams par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag
262a4(mdo sde): gis las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/
262a5(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen
262a6(mdo sde): pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur po/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung te de grong khyer ba ra na sa
262a7(mdo sde): na drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas re shig na bram ze'i bu mo zhig bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // de nas de la lung nod
262a8(mdo sde): de bslab pas kha ton tu byas te/ bu mo khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par
262b1(mdo sde): byas so// mthar thug pa'i ye shes ni bskyed ma nus so// de mkhan po gang dag las rab tu byung ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis mchog tu bsta
262b2(mdo sde): to// de nas dge slong ma de'i chi ba'i tshe smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar bdag gis mkhan po thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis mchog tu bstan pa bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus
262b3(mdo sde): nabacom ldan 'das 'od srung gis/ bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
262b4(mdo sde): thub par 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das shakya thub pas/ bdag thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis mchod tu sa
262b5(mdo sde): lnga'o// mtsho ldan bA kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bram ze'i bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin te/ des smon lam btab pa des
262b6(mdo sde): na/ thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis mchog tu bstan to// ngas der lung bsnos te gnas nas kha ton byas pa des ni/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas/
262b7(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro//
262b8(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na/
263a1(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las cig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad
263a2(mdo sde): par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
263a3(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bston to// // ud pa la zhes bya ba ni// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams
263a4(mdo sde): dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshengs dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang /
263a5(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
263a6(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas
263a7(mdo sde): pa/ rgyal po'i khyab na 'od ma'i 'tshal na bya ka lan da ka gnas na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyis grong khyer na/ klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang / yid 'ongs ga
263a8(mdo sde): grang ba zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/ der grong khyer chen po drug po thams cad nas skye bo mang po 'du'o// de nas re shig na/ lde phyog na/ zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon
263b1(mdo sde): zhig 'ongs pa de'i/ bu mo ud pa la zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba lta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ lang tshe dang nad med pa'i
263b2(mdo sde): rgyags las dreg pa zhig yod de// de gang gi tshe ltad mo pa'i nang du 'ong ba de'i tshe/ ltad mo ba thams cad kyis/ yid smon byed cing lta ba byed de/ gang so sor rtogs pa'i
263b3(mdo sde): shas chung ba de dag gi yid 'phrog par byed do// der gang tshe dus ston byung ba de'i tshe/ rdzogs byed la sogs pa'i ston pa drug kyang 'ong ngo // de nas bu mo ud pa las skye bo
263b4(mdo sde): mang po la smras pa/ rgyal po'i khab kyis grong khyer na mir gyur pa'i nang na/ bdag dang byed gzugs kyis mnyam 'am/ khyad par 'phags pa'i de lta bu 'ga' lta yod dam/ skyes
263b5(mdo sde): bo mang pos smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'khor dang bcas pa yod do// ud pa las smras pa/ ngag spang ga' ta ma 'khor dang bcas pa yod de/ ci de
263b6(mdo sde): mi yin nam/ 'on te lha yin nam/ skye bo mang pos smras pa/ mi ni yin mod kyi de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin no// de nas tshig de thos nas/ ud pa la rgyan thams cad kyis grub
263b7(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du song ngo // song nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go// gar byed cing klu len la rol mo byed do// bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams
263b8(mdo sde): gas pa/ bud med kyi rnga rnams dang / bud med rtsed mo rnams kyang ston par byed do// der dge slong 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ des ci bya tos med par gyur te/
264a1(mdo sde): dang dag slang 'dod chags dang bral bar gang yin pa de dag ni/ ngas tsa bya tas med par gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dod chags
264a2(mdo sde): kyi shas me 'bar ba'i rnams gdul ba dang / ud pa la'i byad gzugs dang / lang tsho'i brgyags pa bsal ba'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gis ud pa la/
264a3(mdo sde): rgas zhing 'khogs la mgo skye ba dang / so rdo zhing byam dgu po ltar skur bar 'gyur pa/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas de ltar sprul pa'i mod la/ ud pa las
264a4(mdo sde): bdag nyid mi sdug par mthong nas/ byad gzugs dang lang chos rgyags pa de med par gyur to// dge slong 'dod chags kyis shas che ba rnams kyang skyo bar gyur to//
264a5(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyis shas tsha ba rnams kyang ska bar gyur to// de nas ud pa la rgyags pa med par 'gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
264a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag ci nas rgag can gyis lus 'di las/ tshegs chung ngus yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan
264a7(mdo sde): du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ud pa la dang / dge slong 'dod chags dang bral bar de dag gis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin du
264a8(mdo sde): su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de nas kha cig gis ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo 'thon po nyi shu ye ges rdo rjes
264b1(mdo sde): bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
264b2(mdo sde): bu mngon sum du byas so// kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// ud pa las yang dad pa rnyed nas/
264b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis zad du rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas/ phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi bsten pa'i rig nas/
264b4(mdo sde): 'du byed kyis rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnams par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod do/ nyon mong thams cad spangs nas/
264b5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa dang / nam mkha' dang lag 'thil
264b6(mdo sde): du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spang ba lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i skabs bcom pa/ rig dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa
264b7(mdo sde): srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur
264b8(mdo sde): to// zlos gar mkhan de dag gis kyang / skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// de nas dge slong dag ba tsam
265a1(mdo sde): skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zlos gar mkhan kyi bu mo ud pa la
265a2(mdo sde): gzugs dang / lang tshos brgyags pa 'am/ rgas pas skyo bar mdzad nas/ bzha' rtsang gis mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i rab tu bzhags pa'i ngo mtshar lags so//
265a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral bar zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi
265a4(mdo sde): ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
265a5(mdo sde): shes bya thams cad la dbang thob zin pa'i tshe/ bu mo ud pa la byad gzugs dang / lang tsho'i rgyags las dregs pa las/ rga bas skyo bar byas nas/ gzha' rtsang gis mthar
265a6(mdo sde): thug pa/ mya ngan las 'das 'das pa'i bar du bzhags pa 'di lta ba ngo mtshar che ba ci yod de/ 'das pa'i dus na/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti
265a7(mdo sde): mug dang bcas pa/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las
265a8(mdo sde): yongs su ma grol ba na yang nges/ bu mo ud pa la rga bas skyo bar byas nas rtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhig pa/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yin la zungs shig dang ngas bsha
265b1(mdo sde): do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer ba ra na sen/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde
265b2(mdo sde): ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad med pa rnam
265b3(mdo sde): dang / 'bras sa lu dang bu mar shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod par byed cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu cig pa la bya bzhin du/ rgyal srid rkyang so// de
265b4(mdo sde): nas re shig na/ rgyal po de'i btsun mo dang lhan gcig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ phyis btsun mo la bu chags nas//
265b5(mdo sde): de zla ba brgyad dam dag lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ khyi'u gzugs bzang zhing ba lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mdog bzang ba/ gser gyi mdog can mgo bo gdugs ltar du 'dug
265b6(mdo sde): pa/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ sna che ba/ sna legs pa smin ma stug pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ zhig bcas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston
265b7(mdo sde): byas nas/ khyi'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ ke du rnams na re 'di yi sa pa yul ki'i rgyal po yin la/ 'di yang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug
265b8(mdo sde): a mdzes pa na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming ka shi'i mdzes ldan zhes gangags so// de nas khye'u ka shi'i mdzes ldan pa ngan 'tsho ba'i mam gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis
266a1(mdo sde): dang / dri ma 'khrung ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang /
266a2(mdo sde): zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byed kyi khyed par can bzang ngo cog gis bskyed sring ste/ mtsho'i nang gis pad ma bzhin du skye dreg par gyur to// de nas gang
266a3(mdo sde): gis tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ rgyal tshab du dbang skur ro// de nas des rgyal po byed pa ni/ nyes pa du ma dang ldan zhing / gnod pa du ma'i rtsa ba yin par rig nas/ drang srong rnam
266a4(mdo sde): kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo // de yang gangs kyi sul zhig na gnas te 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / chus mtsho zhing ri dgas kyi g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun gyon la/ mi'i sbyin bsreg
266a5(mdo sde): byed do// phyis re shig na 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba'i phyir ri'i lus shig tu song ba dang / re shig na de mi 'am ci'i bu mo shig gis drang srong gzhon nu de mthong nas/ chags par gyur te/
266a6(mdo sde): gar byed cing klu len la rol mo byed do// bud kyis mtshan pa rnams dang / bud med kyi brda rnams dang / bud med kyi rtsed mo rnams kyang ston par byed do// de nas re shig na drang srong
266a7(mdo sde): ka shing mdzes ldan gyis/ de la chos bshad de/ che zhes khyed rgas de khyod kyi ro dang po ni snyan zhing gnyen la/ 'jug ni ra bor gyur to// zhes byas so// de nas des chos de lta/
266a8(mdo sde): bu bstan te/ de thos nas mi 'am ci'i bu mo'i byed gzugs kyis/ rgyags pa de med par gyur to// de nas de dad pa skyes nas smon lam btab pa/ gang gis tshe khyod bla na med
266b1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag khyod kyi slob mar gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
266b2(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ drang srong gzhon nur gyur pa gang yin par de ni nga yin no// mi 'am ci'i bu mo de ni ud pa la 'di nyid yin no// de nas bcoM
266b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ ud pa las las gang dag bgyis na des/ gzugs bzang la lta na sdug la mdzes par gyur lags las gang dag bgyis
266b4(mdo sde): na des dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ud pa la nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen
266b5(mdo sde): grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gnod mi za bar 'ongs pa'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ ud pa la nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pas de dag
266b6(mdo sde): gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myongs par 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyir rol kyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i kham
266b7(mdo sde): dab me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni// zin pa'i phung po dang / kham
266b8(mdo sde): rab skyematshad rnams 'ag gags rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// bskal pa brgya yang chung mig/ tshogs shing dus la bab pan/
267a1(mdo sde): 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/
267a2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi
267a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas re shig na/
267a4(mdo sde): lho phyog nas blo skar mkhan gyi slob dpon zhigs 'ongs so// der gang gi tshe rgyal po mdzes pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa de'i tshe/ zlos gar mkhan
267a5(mdo sde): kyis slob dpon la sgo la/ nga'i 'dus du sangs rgyas kyis zlo gar mkhan thabs gyis shig byas nas/ de dag gis rgyal po'i bka' spyi bos nos te/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
267a6(mdo sde): byas so// de nas sangs rgyas kyis zlo gar sbyar te/ legs par sbyangs nas/ rgyal po blon po'i tshogs dang / bcas pa'i mdun du zlos gar gyis gar thabs byas so// de nas
267a7(mdo sde): de zlo gar gyi slob dpon nyid ni/ sangs rgyas kyi cha lugs kyis nang du 'ongs so// zlos gar mkhan gzhan rnams ni/ dge slong gi cha lugs kyis nang du 'ongs so// de nas rgya
267a8(mdo sde): po dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/ zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon la sogs pa/ zlos gar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams nor kyi phung po chen po byin no// de nas deg bcom ldan
267b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/ sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag sbyin nas/ yang dag pa'i smon lam gdab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i
267b2(mdo sde): chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so//
267b3(mdo sde): dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ zlos gar mkhan gang yin pa de dag ni/ ud pa la la sogs pa 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag gis der smon lam btab pa des na/ da ltar dgra bcu
267b4(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong de ltar na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin par yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig
267b5(mdo sde): tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dres ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro// dge slong
267b6(mdo sde): dag de bas na// las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya te/
267b7(mdo sde): dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
267b8(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do// / mdzes ldan ma zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / byag
268a1(mdo sde): po rnams dang / bo brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang
268a2(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu
268a3(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams chen po da/
268a4(mdo sde): ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ba ra na sen drang srong smra
268a5(mdo sde): ba'i ri dgas kyis nang na bzhugs so// de'i tshe grong khyer ba ra na si na/ rgyal po tshangs pa byin rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang /
268a6(mdo sde): skye bo mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nang rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu cha ram shi
268a7(mdo sde): shing dang / ba lang dang / mahe dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu cig pa la byams pa bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// de nas re shig na/ rgyal po de
268a8(mdo sde): btsun mo dang lhan gcig tu brtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de brtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las khyim bdag mo la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon
268b1(mdo sde): pa dang / bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lags thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de nas de bcas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/
268b2(mdo sde): bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do// nye du rnams na re/ bu mo 'di ka shi'i rgyal po'i bu mo yin la/ byad gzugs kyang bzang bas de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming ka shi mdzes
268b3(mdo sde): ldan ma shes bya bar gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khrud pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma
268b4(mdo sde): ma gnyis dang / de ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma rgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yo byed kyis khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsring
268b5(mdo sde): ste/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skyes drag par 'gyur te/ de nas gang gis tshe bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ nyi 'og gis rgyal po drug gis/ rgyal po tshangs las byin la
268b6(mdo sde): po nya btang te/ khyed kyis bu mo btsas shes bdag gis thos kyi/ gzhan la ma sbyin pa bdag gi bu la byin cig ces spring ngo // de nas rgyal po tshangs pa byin mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs nas/ la
268b7(mdo sde): bsgom tsug bcad ste/ bsam pa/ gal te cig la byin na ni/ gzhan rnams bdag gis dgrar 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas re shig na/ bu mo ka shi
268b8(mdo sde): mdzes ldan ma rgyan thams cad kyi klubs te/ ba'i bang du seng nas dang / nges pa mya ngan gyis non pa mthong nas dris pa/ yab ci'i slad du myong na mdzad/ de nas re shig na denas pas kyang des
269a1(mdo sde): ji ltar gyur pa rnyed do// yab ci nyi 'og gis rgyal po rnams lang ste/ zhag bdun na bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma rang nyid khyim thab 'das par chas kyis/ khyed kyis
269a2(mdo sde): bya ba gang yin pa de gyis cig ces po nya btang du gsol zhes byas so// de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug po rnams 'dus so// bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma/ yang
269a3(mdo sde): shing rta la zhon te/ chos gos tshos ma rnams kyis bdan bsgrengs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gzugs lag na thogs te/ rgyal po 'dus pa'i nang du song nas smras
269a4(mdo sde): pa/ kye nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams nyon cig/ bdag ni khyed kyis gzugs dang lang tsho dang / rigs dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug la mi sems kyis/ bdag ni 'dod pa rnam
269a5(mdo sde): la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/ bdag ni ras 'di las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs bris pa gang yin pa de ni slob ma legs te de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // zhes
269a6(mdo sde): byas nas drang srong smra bar song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / snyen pa rdzogs
269a7(mdo sde): shing dge slong mi'i dngos po thob rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du tshangs par spyod pa/ spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo
269a8(mdo sde): chen mo la gtang ngo // de nas de kyang rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas nas/ des brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di
269b1(mdo sde): nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnams par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mod
269b2(mdo sde): pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/
269b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /
269b4(mdo sde): so so yang dag pa'i rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /
